translation.zh: Dominic Raab：政府不能为隔离西班牙的决定道歉
translation.en: Dominic Raab: Government can't make apologies for Spain quarantine decision

translation.zh: 针对政府突然做出重新对西班牙实施隔离措施的决定，Dominic Raab 做出了辩解。
translation.en: Dominic Raab has defended the Government's decision to re-introduce quarantine measures on Spain at short notice.

translation.zh: 部长们于周六宣布，如果度假者未能在午夜之前从西班牙及其离岛返回，将需要强制自我隔离 14 天。
translation.en: Ministers announced on Saturday that holidaymakers who had not returned from Spain and its islands by midnight would be forced to self-isolate for 14 days.

translation.zh: 西班牙一直在唐宁街制定的可以安全旅行的“旅行走廊”名单上，然而，新冠病毒病例近期激增，引发了公众对第二波疫情的担忧。
translation.en: The country had been on a list of "travel corridor" nations deemed safe to visit by Downing Street, but a recent surge in coronavirus cases has sparked fears of a second wave of the disease.

translation.zh: 周日，针对突然重新实施旅行限制措施，外交大臣做出了辩解，称此举是对该地区报告的感染病例激增做出的“实时反应”。
translation.en: On Sunday, the Foreign Secretary defended the sudden reimposition of restrictions as a "real-time response" to a worrying spike in infections reported in the region.

translation.zh: 他表示已于前一天下午对局势进行了评估，“我们尽快做出了决定。”
translation.en: He said the situation was then assessed yesterday afternoon "and we took the decision as swiftly as we could."

translation.zh: 他还补充道：“我们不能为此道歉。”
translation.en: "We can't make apologies for doing so," he added.

translation.zh: “我们必须有能力采取迅速、果断的行动，特别是在关系到本土或西班牙及特定国家的情况下，我们必须采取行动。”
translation.en: "We must be able to take swift, decisive action, particularly in relation to localised, or internationally in relation to Spain or a particular country, where we see we must take action."

translation.zh: “否则，英国会再次面临感染风险，引发第二波疫情，然后再次实施封锁。”
translation.en: "Otherwise, we risk re-infection into the UK, potentially a second wave here and then another lockdown."

translation.zh: 运输大臣与前往西班牙的度假者一样面临强制隔离
translation.en: Transport secretary among Spain holidaymakers forced to quarantine

translation.zh: 在西班牙连续两天报告每日新增新冠病例突破 900 个之后，政府做出了这一决定。
translation.en: The decision was made after Spain recorded more than 900 new daily Covid-19 cases for two days running.

translation.zh: 外交大臣承认，很多游客都来不及取消或更改他们的旅行计划。
translation.en: The Foreign Secretary acknowledged that many tourists had been left with no time to cancel or alter their plans.

translation.zh: 他说：“我知道，对于那些身在西班牙或一直在考虑前往西班牙的人来说，这一决定非常不近人情，但我们必须有能力采取迅速、果断的行动来保护英国。”
translation.en: "I understand it is disruptive for those going through this who are in Spain or have been considering going but we must be able to take swift, decisive action to protect the UK," he said.

translation.zh: “在减少病例数量和防控疫情反扑方面，我们已经取得了不小的成果。”
translation.en: "We've made such progress in getting the virus down and preventing the virus re-taking hold in the UK."

translation.zh: 影子卫生大臣 Jonathan Ashworth 谴责政府的处理方式“毫无章法”。
translation.en: Shadow Health Secretary Jonathan Ashworth condemned the Government for its "frankly shambolic" handling of the measure.

translation.zh: 他表示，唐宁街突然的决定让度假者“既困惑又沮丧”。
translation.en: He said Downing Street's sudden decision had left holidaymakers "confused and distressed."

translation.zh: 这位工党议员告诉 Sophy Ridge：“我理解他们为什么做出这个决定，但是，他们在过去 24 个小时内做出这样一个决定毫无章法。
translation.en: The Labour MP told Sophy Ridge: "I understand why they've made the decision but, of course, the way in which this decision has been made in the last 24 hours is frankly shambolic.

translation.zh: “此时此刻身在西班牙的度假者会感到困惑和沮丧，计划前往西班牙和特内里费等岛屿度假的人也会感到困惑，他们不知道雇主是否能接受他们隔离两周。”
translation.en: "There are holidaymakers in Spain at the moment confused and distressed, there are people about to go on holiday to Spain and the islands like Tenerife who are confused, and they don't know whether their employers will allow them to take two weeks" quarantine.

translation.zh: “政府只是在说‘我们希望雇主合作。’”
translation.en: "The Government is just saying, "we hope that employers co-operate.""

translation.zh: “他们在过去 24 个小时内做出这个决定毫无章法。”
translation.en: "The way in which this decision has been made in the last 24 hours is frankly shambolic."

translation.zh: 将西班牙列入隔离名单对度假者而言意味着什么？
translation.en: What does Spain being on quarantine list mean for holidaymakers?

translation.zh: 他敦促部长们进行“澄清”，如果雇主拒绝在隔离期间支付工资，这些被要求隔离的人是否可以得到财政支持。
translation.en: He urged ministers to offer "clarity" on whether those who are asked to quarantine will receive financial support if their employers refuse to pay them during the quarantine period.

translation.zh: 他还补充说，“对于那些目前身在西班牙的度假者来说，他们可能为这次家庭旅行攒了整整一年的钱，他们会感到既困惑又沮丧”，因此这些人也需要获得明确的信息。
translation.en: He added that clear information was also needed "for those holidaymakers who are currently in Spain who have properly saved up all year for their family holiday who are confused and distressed."

translation.zh: 他强调：“传达这一决定的方式显然引起了焦虑。”
translation.en: "The way in which this decision has been communicated is obviously causing anxiety," he stressed.

translation.zh: Raab 先生表示，遵循新指导方针的员工不应受到雇主的处罚，例如列入病假工资名单。
translation.en: Mr Raab said no worker following the new guidance should be penalised by employers, including by being put onto sick pay.

translation.zh: 他说：“我们仍在修改规定的内容——涉及修改的内容与度假者和游客相关，当然，我们希望雇主能够灵活地处理那些因为法律要求而被隔离的员工。
translation.en: He said: "We are changing the rules - the law is changed in relation to holidaymakers and travellers - and of course we expect employers to show those employees who will have to quarantine because of the law the flexibility they need.

translation.zh: 如果是为了遵循有关隔离的法律并进行自我隔离，他们就不应当受到处罚。”
translation.en: "If someone is following the law in relation to quarantine and self-isolating the way they should, they can't have penalties taken against them."

translation.zh: 美国的“失误”阻碍了新冠药物的研发
translation.en: US "failures" are holding back search for coronavirus drugs

translation.zh: 一位英国新冠药物研发项目的专家称，由于美国研究人员“随心所欲地”测试药品，影响了全球研发新冠药物的进度。
translation.en: The global effort to produce useful anti-Covid medicines is being hampered by the US because researchers are testing drugs in "an arbitrary, willy-nilly way," the expert leading the UK's programme has warned.

translation.zh: 目前为止，已有 12,000 名来自数百家医院的患者加入了英国康复试验计划，该计划确定了一种可能用于治疗新冠的新药，并指出之前认为的另外两种可以治疗该疾病的药物其实没有效果。
translation.en: Britain's Recovery Trial programme, which has involved 12,000 patients at several hundred British hospitals, has already pinpointed one promising new drug to tackle the disease and also highlighted two others - previously thought to be potential life-savers - as being useless.

translation.zh: 但是，由于美国医疗体系未实行类似的康复计划，意味着原本可获准并广泛使用的其他有效治疗方式仍有待评估。
translation.en: But the failure of the US medical system to match this output has meant that other promising treatments that could have been cleared for widespread use have still to be evaluated.

translation.zh: 需要特别指出的是，恢复期血浆（即取自新冠康复患者的血浆）含有新冠病毒抗体，后续仍需对其进行大规模临床随机试验。
translation.en: In particular, convalescent plasma (blood plasma that is taken from Covid-19 patients and which contains antibodies that could protect others against the disease) has still to be properly tested on a large-scale randomised trial.

translation.zh: 康复计划的发起人之一、大规模药物临床试验专家 Martin Landray 教授表示：“未经临床随机试验的情况下，美国已经有成千上万的人接受了恢复期血浆治疗。”
translation.en: "Tens of thousands of people have already been given convalescent plasma in the US but these treatments were not randomised," said Professor Martin Landray, one of the founders of the Recovery programme.

translation.zh: Landray 补充道：“他们只是给个人提供恢复期血浆，但并不知道是否有效。尽管他们已经向大量民众提供了恢复期血浆，但仍不明确该血浆是否有效果、是否对人体有害、是否有副作用。”
translation.en: "They just give individuals convalescent plasma in the hope it will work. Vast quantities have been given and they still have no idea whether it helps or harms or has no impact," added Landray, an expert in the setting up of large-scale drug trials.

translation.zh: 美国未进行大规模临床随机试验，最终提供了不良药物
translation.en: The US is failing to do large, randomised trials and that ends up providing bad medicine

translation.zh: 临床随机药物试验是判断药物是否有效的黄金标准。
translation.en: Randomised drug trials are the gold standard for pinpointing useful medicines.

translation.zh: 通过试验，可消除可能影响临床医生判断的无意识偏见。
translation.en: They remove unconscious biases that might cloud clinicians' judgments.

translation.zh: 在临床随机药物试验中，受试者分为治疗组和安慰剂组。
translation.en: Thousands of people are given a drug and thousands of others are given a placebo.

translation.zh: 没人知道受试者接受了哪种药剂。
translation.en: No one knows which they have been given.

translation.zh: 然后，比较试验结果以得出哪种药剂具有治疗效果。
translation.en: Then results are compared and the efficacy of the treatment revealed.

translation.zh: 通过这种方式，康复计划证明了类固醇地塞米松可将通过呼吸机治疗的新冠患者的死亡率降低三分之一。
translation.en: In this way, Recovery was able to demonstrate that the steroid dexamethasone reduced deaths by a third in Covid-19 patients on ventilators.

translation.zh: 计划还表明，大肆宣传的药物羟氯喹以及洛匹那韦和利托那韦的联合疗法对患者无效。
translation.en: It also showed that the much-hyped drug hydroxychloroquine - as well as the combined therapy of the drugs lopinavir and ritonavir - had no effect in saving patients' lives.

translation.zh: 最重要的是，这些试验需要大量的患者参与，然而没有一家医院有足够的患者供其研究。
translation.en: Crucially these trials needed very large numbers of patients and no single hospital has enough for such research.

translation.zh: 英国的关键优势在于其集中的国家医疗服务体系。
translation.en: Britain has had one key advantage - a centralised National Health Service.

translation.zh: 相较而言，美国的医疗服务体系并不完善，其唯一的成果就是指出价格昂贵的瑞德西韦并不能加速新冠患者的康复。
translation.en: By contrast, the US health service is fragmented and its only success in pointing a possible treatment has been highlighting the usefulness of the highly expensive drug remdesivir for speeding recovery of some Covid-19 patients.

translation.zh: Landray 补充道：“在美国，正进行着许多几十名或几百名患者参与的小规模药物试验，但是并未取得实质性成果。
translation.en: "There are lots and lots of small drugs trials involving a few dozen or a few hundred patients going on in the US but nothing of any substance," added Landray.

translation.zh: 他们并未进行大规模临床随机试验，最终提供了不良药物。这使得医疗效果和患者预后情况都很差。”
translation.en: "They are failing to do large, randomised trials and that ends up providing bad medicine. It makes the practice of medicine poorer and the outcomes for patients poorer."

translation.zh: Landray 表示，很多医生认为恢复期血浆能在针对新冠重症病人的治疗中起到重要作用，但实际情况并非如此。
translation.en: Landray said this failure was particularly exasperating when it came to the use of convalescent plasma, which many doctors believe could have a key role to play in treating seriously ill Covid-19 patients.

translation.zh: 他补充道：“美国在未经临床随机试验的情况下，向大量患者采取了恢复期血浆疗法。与美国相比，我们取得了巨大成就。”
translation.en: "If you look at the US, huge quantities of this treatment have been used on an arbitrary willy-nilly basis. The UK excels beyond measure compared with what's going on there," he added.

translation.zh: 另一位康复计划发起人、传染病专家 Peter Horby 教授说：
translation.en: Professor Peter Horby, an expert on infectious diseases and the other founder of the Recovery programme, said:

translation.zh: “有报道称，一个队列中有 20,000 名患者接受了恢复期血浆治疗，但是他们并不是临床随机试验患者。如果他们也对这些患者进行了临床随机试验，那么我们现在也就能明确知道恢复期血浆的效果。”
translation.en: "There have been reports of 20,000 patients getting convalescent plasma in a cohort but none of those patients were randomised. If they had put these patients into randomised trials, we would now have a clear answer about the effectiveness of convalescent plasma."

translation.zh: Horby 补充道，目前英国康复试验计划已经启动了恢复期血浆的临床随机试验，但预计要到今年年底才会有研究结果。
translation.en: Horby added that UK Recovery has now launched a randomised trial of convalescent plasma but does not expect results to be ready until later this year.

translation.zh: 23 个州爆发沙门氏菌疫情，已致 212 人感染
translation.en: Salmonella outbreak sickens 212 people in 23 states

translation.zh: 7 月 25 日（合众国际社）——美国疾病控制与预防中心（CDC）正在对 23 个州爆发的沙门氏菌疫情展开调查，此次疫情已致 212 人感染。
translation.en: July 25 (UPI) -- The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is investigating an outbreak of salmonella that has sickened 212 people in 23 states.

translation.zh: 在周五发布的新闻中，CDC 报告称，自上周二更新疫情以来已发现 87 例感染患者。
translation.en: In a Friday press release the CDC reported that 87 people had become ill since its last update on the outbreak Tuesday.

translation.zh: CDC 表示，6 月 19 日至 7 月 11 日开始有人表现出感染沙门氏菌的相关症状（可能需要二到四周的时间才会显现症状）。
translation.en: The agency said people began showing symptoms linked to a strain of salmonella, which can take two to four weeks to manifest symptoms, between June 19 and July 11.

translation.zh: 自疫情爆发以来，已有 31 位患者被收治入院，目前尚无死亡报告。
translation.en: Thirty-one people have been hospitalized since the outbreak began, but no fatalities have been reported.

translation.zh: CDC 指出，沙门氏菌菌株的具体来源尚不明确。
translation.en: According to the CDC, a specific source for the salmonella strain has not been identified.

translation.zh: CDC 没有发布禁食或禁用特定食物的建议，也没有提到任何可能销售受污染商品的零售商。
translation.en: It has not issued any advisement against eating or consuming particular foods, nor named retailers that might be selling contaminated products.

translation.zh: 俄勒冈州报告的沙门氏菌病例最多，共有 51 例；犹他州紧随其后，共报告了 40 例。
translation.en: Oregon has had the most cases of salmonella, with 51 infections, with Utah following close behind with 40 reported cases.

translation.zh: CDC 表示，沙门氏菌是一种细菌性食源性疾病，每年导致 135 万人感染，26,500 人住院治疗和 420 人死亡。
translation.en: Salmonella is a bacterial, foodborne illness that causes 1.35 million infections, 26,500 hospitalizations, and 420 deaths each year, according to the CDC.

translation.zh: 感染沙门氏菌后的常见症状包括腹泻、发烧和胃痉挛，这些症状可能在接触病菌后的六小时到六天内开始显现。
translation.en: The most common symptoms of salmonella infection are diarrhea, fever, and stomach cramps, which can begin between six hours and six days after exposure.

translation.zh: 病状通常会持续四到七天，大多数人无需治疗即可康复，但某些病例需要住院治疗。
translation.en: The illness usually lasts four to seven days, and most people recover without treatment, but some cases require hospitalization.

translation.zh: 加州狗狗公园夫妇被袭，皆因午餐时未戴口罩（视频）——RT 电视台美国新闻
translation.en: Couple MACED at California dog park for not wearing face masks while having lunch (VIDEO) - RT USA News

translation.zh: 先是口罩羞辱，后有拳打脚踢。
translation.en: There's mask-shaming and then there's full on assault.

translation.zh: 加利福尼亚的一对夫妇在狗狗公园与他们的爱犬一起共进午餐时就遇到了这种情况。一位妇女怒冲冲地向他们喷射胡椒喷雾，就因为他们没有在吃东西时戴上口罩。
translation.en: A California couple having lunch with their puppy at a dog park experienced the second, when an irate woman pepper-sprayed them for refusing to mask up... while eating.

translation.zh: Ash O’Brien 和丈夫 Jarett Kelley 称，周四他们带着三个月大的巴哥犬在圣地亚哥的 Dusty Rhodes 狗狗公园吃午餐。
translation.en: Ash O'Brien and husband Jarett Kelley say they were grabbing a bite to eat at Dusty Rhodes dog park in San Diego on Thursday, with their three-month-old pug in tow.

translation.zh: 夫妇二人取下口罩准备吃东西时，一个“不知从哪冒出来的老太太”走过来叫他们“白痴”，因为他们没有戴口罩，虽然他们说“戴着口罩怎么吃东西”。
translation.en: The pair had their masks off to eat, when a "random old lady" approached, calling them "idiots" for not masking up, even though "you can't wear a mask and eat at the same time."

translation.zh: O’Brien 让这名女子离开公园并停止她的骚扰行为，这时，女子对着两人喷射胡椒喷雾。
translation.en: O'Brien told the woman to leave the park and stop harassing her, at which point the woman unleashed a can of mace at the couple.

translation.zh: 旁观者拍下的视频从 Kelley 与女子争夺喷雾罐开始，他因此被喷了一脸。
translation.en: Video footage captured by a bystander begins with Kelley wrestling the spray can from the woman, and getting a dose of mace into the face for his troubles.

translation.zh: 袭击者带着狗离开后，背景声里可以听到 O’Brien 哭泣。
translation.en: O'Brien can be heard crying in the background as the attacker walks away with her dogs.

translation.zh: O’Brien 将这段视频上传到脸书网，并向 ABC 10 频道表示希望这名女子“进监狱”。
translation.en: O'Brien shared the video on Facebook and told ABC 10 that she wants to see the woman "go to jail."

translation.zh: 加州全域强制要求佩戴口罩，即使是在空气新鲜的地方。
translation.en: Face masks are mandatory across the state of California, even in fresh air.

translation.zh: 人们只能在规定的时段取下口罩，譬如饮食的时候。
translation.en: These masks can only be removed at a select few times, including when eating or drinking.

translation.zh: 但是，该州的新冠疫情防控指南并没有提及旁观者可以使用非致命性武器来督促这一规定的执行。
translation.en: However, nowhere in the state's coronavirus guidelines does it say that bystanders may use non-lethal weapons to enforce this policy.

translation.zh: 即使在当前这个“口罩羞辱”时代，这也是一种犯罪，会被处以 1,000 美元罚款或州监狱三年以下刑期。
translation.en: Even in the current era of "mask-shaming," that's still a crime carrying a penalty of a fine of $1,000 or up to three years in a state prison.

translation.zh: 卖鸡蛋的印多尔男孩因拒绝行贿车被掀翻，后获得一套公寓及免费教育100 卢比的贿赂
translation.en: Flat, Free Education For Indore Egg Seller Paras Raykar Whose Cart Was Overturned Allegedly Over Rs. 100 Bribe

translation.zh: 据报道，周四，Paras Raykar 装满鸡蛋的小车被印多尔市政官员掀翻。
translation.en: Paras Raykar's cart carrying eggs was allegedly overturned Thursday by the civic officials in Indore.

translation.zh: 这名 13 岁男孩卖鸡蛋不成，小车被市政官员掀翻的故事在社交媒体上传播开来，两天后，这名住在印多尔的男孩收到了来自全国各地的支持，帮助他们家挽回损失，重新开始做生意。
translation.en: Two days after the story of a 13-year-old egg seller's cart being overturned by civic officials went viral on social media, the Indore-based boy has found overwhelming support from people across the country, helping them recover from the losses and manage to start their business again.

translation.zh: 男孩的家人还说，包括国民大会党党魁 Rahul Gandhi、德里首席部长 Arvind Kejriwal 在内的政客也联系他们并提供帮助。
translation.en: The boy's family also claimed that politicians including Congress leader Rahul Gandhi and Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal have reached out to them and offered support.

translation.zh: 男孩的家人还获赠一套公寓，并收到为孩子们承担教育费用的承诺。
translation.en: The boy's family also received a flat and offer to take care of the educational expenses of the children in the family.

translation.zh: 据报道，周四，Paras Raykar 卖鸡蛋的小车被印多尔市政官员掀翻，在疫情肆虐之际，市政府实施了“从左到右”交错开店的措施。
translation.en: Paras Raykar's cart carrying eggs was allegedly overturned Thursday by the civic officials in Indore, where the administration has implemented the "left-right" rule for the staggered opening of shops amid the coronavirus pandemic.

translation.zh: 在一段视频里，男孩说，当天上午，官员警告他，如果不支付 100 卢比的贿赂金就把他的小车掀翻，这段视频在社交媒体上迅速传播开来。
translation.en: A video in which the boy alleged that the officials had warned him in the morning to remove his cart or pay Rs 100 as bribe had gone viral on social media.

translation.zh: 男孩说，他拒绝交出 100 卢比后，那些官员就把他的小车掀翻，把所有鸡蛋砸碎。
translation.en: When he refused, the officials tipped his cart over, destroying all the eggs, the boy alleged.

translation.zh: 男孩还在视频里说，受疫情影响，鸡蛋的日均销量都下降了，损失的这些鸡蛋对他来说更是雪上加霜。
translation.en: The boy had also claimed that his daily sale has been down due to the pandemic and the loss of his stock will put additional financial burden on him, in the video.

translation.zh: 自周四以来，男孩的家人收到了大量来自全国各地的支持，许多人向他们提供了现金或者善意的帮助。
translation.en: Since Thursday, the boy's family has been overwhelmed with support from people across the country, many of them offering help in both cash and kind.

translation.zh: 当地人也向这家人伸出援手。
translation.en: The family has also received help from locals.

translation.zh: 前首席部长 Digvijaya Singh 对他们进行了资助，并帮助孩子们入读一所学院；人民党议会议员 Ramesh Mendola 也保证将根据 Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana 住房计划为男孩一家提供一套公寓。
translation.en: While former chief minister Digvijaya Singh has offered financial support and help to get the children admitted in a college, BJP MLA from Indore, Ramesh Mendola, has assured to provide a house under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana to the child.

translation.zh: 印多尔记者俱乐部还为男孩提供了口粮和金钱。
translation.en: Indore Press Club has also provided ration and money to the boy.

translation.zh: 国民大会党党魁 Rahul Gandhi 的办公室和德里首席部长 Arvind Kejriwal 也伸出了援手。
translation.en: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi's office and Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal has also offered help.

translation.zh: Paras 的爷爷说：“我们获得全国各地很多人的支持。
translation.en: "We are overwhelmed by the support from people across the country.

translation.zh: （人民党议会议员）Ramesh Mendola 保证会根据 Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana 住房计划为我们提供一套公寓。
translation.en: (BJP MLA) Ramesh Mendola has assured a flat under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana.

translation.zh: 他提供了一辆自行车和 2,500 卢比的资助。
translation.en: He has also provided a cycle and Rs 2,500.

translation.zh: Digvijaya Singh 则资助了 10,000 卢比，还承诺照顾两个孩子的教育。
translation.en: Digvijaya Singh has provided Rs 10,000 and assurance to look after the education of the two children.

translation.zh: Rahul Gandhi 的工作人员也给我们打电话提供帮助。
translation.en: Rahul Gandhi's office has also called and offered support.

translation.zh: （代表）德里首席部长 Arvind Kejriwal 的一位女性工作人员也给我们打电话并帮助我们。
translation.en: A woman from Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal called and offered help.

translation.zh: Jyothiraditya Scindia 也给予了支持，”。
translation.en: Jyothiraditya Scindia has also offered support," Paras's grandfather said.

translation.zh: 内政大臣 Priti Patel 要求 Twitter 和 Instagram 就 Wiley 发布的不妥内容做出解释
translation.en: Home Secretary Priti Patel demands explanation from Twitter and Instagram over 'abhorrent' Wiley tweets

translation.zh: 由于 Twitter 和 Instagram 未能及时删除 Wiley 发布的不妥内容，Priti Patel 要求两个平台做出解释。
translation.en: Priti Patel has demanded an explanation from Twitter and Instagram over the length of time it took to remove "abhorrent" posts made by Wiley.

translation.zh: 警方目前正对这位 Grime 歌手在社交媒体上发布的一系列反犹太言论展开调查。
translation.en: Police are currently investigating a series of antisemitic comments posted on the Grime artist's social media accounts.

translation.zh: 内政大臣周日发推称：“Wiley 发布的反犹太主义内容极度令人不豫。”
translation.en: The Home Secretary tweeted on Sunday: "The antisemitic posts from Wiley are abhorrent.

translation.zh: “Twitter 和 Instagram 没有及时删除这些内容，我已要求他们作出充分的解释。
translation.en: "They should not have been able to remain on Twitter and Instagram for so long and I have asked them for a full explanation.

translation.zh: 社交媒体公司必须更快采取行动，将这些令人震惊的仇恨言论从平台上删除。”
translation.en: "Social media companies must act much faster to remove such appalling hatred from their platforms."

translation.zh: 他批评 Twitter “无视反犹太主义”，因为 Wiley 的推文在发布 12 个小时后仍然可见。
translation.en: Twitter was accused of "ignoring antisemitism" as Wiley's tweets were still visible 12 hours after they were first posted.

translation.zh: 此后网站删除了多条推文并将这位 41 岁歌手的账号封禁七天。
translation.en: A number of tweets have since been removed and the 41-year-old has been issued a seven-day ban by the site.

translation.zh: Twitter 此前表示，“因为违反了我们的仇恨行为政策”，已暂时关闭 Wiley 的账户，Facebook 则表示 “Instagram 上不允许存在仇恨言论”。
translation.en: Twitter previously said Wiley's account had been temporarily locked "for violating our hateful conduct policy," while Facebook said there was "no place for hate speech on Instagram."

translation.zh: 周六，大都会警察局称：“大都会警察局极其关注所有关于反犹太主义的报告。我们正在对相关材料进行评估。”
translation.en: The Metropolitan Police said on Saturday: "The Met takes all reports of antisemitism extremely seriously. The relevant material is being assessed."

translation.zh: 同时，Wiley 的经纪公司 A-List 经纪公司也与这位明星“断绝一切关系”。
translation.en: Meanwhile, Wiley's management company, A-List Management, "cut all ties" with the star.

translation.zh: 这位歌手的前经纪人 John Woolf 也是犹太人，他在推特上写道：“鉴于 Wiley 今天发布的反犹太内容，我们 @A_ListMGMT 已经与他断绝一切关系。这个社会没有反犹太主义的容身之处。”
translation.en: The artist's now former manager, John Woolf, who is Jewish, wrote on Twitter: "Following Wiley's antisemitic tweets today we at @A_ListMGMT have cut all ties with him. There is no place in society for antisemitism."

translation.zh: 早些时候，他曾表示既不支持也不纵容 Wiley 的言论，但会私底下进行交流并“教育他”。
translation.en: He had earlier said he did not support or condone what Wiley posted but that he would speak to him privately and "help educate him."

translation.zh: 然而，一段 Instagram 视频显示，似乎是 Wiley 与其经纪公司断绝了关系。
translation.en: However, in a video on Instagram, Wiley appeared to say it was him who had cut ties with his management.

translation.zh: 其他议员也批评 Twitter 未能及时删贴。
translation.en: Other MPs criticised Twitter for allowing the tweets to remain visible.

translation.zh: 工党议员 Jess Phillips 于周六表示：“我刚刚看了 Wiley 发布的东西。为什么 @Twitter 让如此明目张胆的反犹太主义和仇恨内容得以保留？它涉及很多危险的观点：犹太人得到了你得不到的东西，他们掌控一切，他们认为自己更优秀，等等。这样的内容很危险，应当予以删除。”
translation.en: Labour MP Jess Phillips said on Saturday: "Just seen all the Wiley stuff. Why on earth have @Twitter left up such blatant antisemitism and hatred? It hits all the dangerous beats, Jews get things you don't get, they are in control, they think their better... This is dangerous stuff. Surely it should come down."

translation.zh: 议员 Neil Coyle 补充说：“他的经纪公司似乎比 @Twitter 反应更快，我再重申一下，应当通过立法（包括《在线危害法案》）确保社交媒体平台不会被用来散播仇恨。”
translation.en: Fellow MP Neil Coyle added: "His management appear able to act quicker than @Twitter emphasising, once again, that legislation (including the Online Harms Bill) should ensure social media platforms are not used to spread hate."

translation.zh: 政府反犹太主义独立顾问 John Mann 称这些推文“精准地反映了为什么需要对法律做出修改，从而合理地进行责任追究。”
translation.en: John Mann, the government's independent adviser on antisemitism, said the tweets "demonstrated precisely why the law needs changing to hold them to reasonable account."

translation.zh: 打击反犹太主义运动也要求警方调查 Wiley 的内容并呼吁关闭他的社交媒体帐户，“以防再度喷出反犹太毒液”。
translation.en: Meanwhile, the Campaign Against Antisemitism asked police to investigate Wiley's content and called on his social media accounts to be shut down "to prevent further outpouring of anti-Jewish venom."

translation.zh: Wiley 本名 Richard Cowie，有 Grime 音乐教父之称，曾因在音乐方面的贡献于 2018 年被授予 MBE 勋章。
translation.en: Wiley, known as the Godfather of Grime and whose real name is Richard Cowie, received an MBE for services to music in 2018.

translation.zh: Kudlow 称下一个新冠救助计划有更多纾困支票并延长暂停驱逐时间
translation.en: Kudlow says next coronavirus stimulus bill will include more checks, extend moratorium on evictions

translation.zh: 白宫经济顾问 Larry Kudlow 周日承诺，根据下一个新冠疫情救助计划，联邦政府将延长暂停驱逐的时间，并发放新一轮纾困支票。
translation.en: White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow promised on Sunday that the federal government will extend the moratorium on evictions and send out another round of checks as part of the next coronavirus stimulus package.

translation.zh: Kudlow 作出承诺的前一周，白宫的工资税削减方案才被国会否决。
translation.en: Kudlow's comments come after a week where the White House's hoped for payroll tax cuts were shot down by Congress.

translation.zh: “我们还会发放 1,200 美元的纾困支票。这将是新计划的一部分。除了纾困支票，我更希望削减工资税，” Kudlow 在 CNN 的 State of the Union 节目上表示。
translation.en: "There's a $1,200 check coming. That is going to be part of the new package. I would have preferred a payroll tax cut, on top of that check," Kudlow said on CNN's "State of the Union.

translation.zh: “即便如此，这在政治上却行不通。”
translation.en: "But, be that as it may, politically, it doesn't work."

translation.zh: 虽然政府还未公布任何计划，但财政部长 Steve Mnuchin 和白宫办公厅主任 Mark Meadows 最近都在国会与国会领导人们探讨新一揽子救助计划的细节。
translation.en: While no deal has been officially announced, Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin and White House chief of staff Mark Meadows have been on Capitol Hill recently to discuss the details of a new relief package with congressional leaders.

translation.zh: 在终止联邦政府额外提供的 600 美元失业救济金的问题上，Kudlow 表示，这笔钱不利于小企业雇工。
translation.en: On ending the additional $600 in unemployment benefits the federal government was supplying, Kudlow argued that the extra money was hurting small businesses from hiring workers.

translation.zh: 他说：“我们接到了大量的询问、电话和投诉，称小商店、小企业和小饭馆雇不到人了。”
translation.en: "We have had a flood of inquiries and phone calls and complaints that small stores and businesses, restaurants can't hire people back," he said.

translation.zh: “这项福利带来了副作用。去年 3 月，我们可能必须提供这项福利，但实际情况是，人们不回去工作会造成一定的后果。”
translation.en: "They went too far. Maybe last March, it was necessary for that, but, really, there are consequences of people not returning to work."

translation.zh: 当日早些时候，Mnuchin 在《福克斯周日新闻 》节目中说得更直白一些：“我认为，工人和美国人都明白这样一个概念：待在家里的人收入不应该比去工作的人还要多。”
translation.en: Mnuchin earlier in the day on "Fox News Sunday" said it a little more bluntly: "I think workers and Americans understand the concept that you shouldn't be paid more to stay home than to work."

translation.zh: Mnuchin 表示，新的救助计划将提供额外的失业救济金，但他也指出，金额会少于根据《冠状病毒援助、救济和经济安全法案》 (CARES Act) 提供的救济金。
translation.en: Mnuchin said the new bill will provide additional unemployment benefits, but noted that it will be less than the payments issued under the CARES Act.

translation.zh: 他表示，部分工人获得的救济金比他们的工作收入还要多。
translation.en: He said some workers were collecting more than they earned on the job.

translation.zh: 于是，企业复工后部分雇员就没有动力回去上班了。
translation.en: As a result, when businesses were reopening some employees did not have an incentive to return to work.

translation.zh: Mnuchin 表示，Trump 政府和共和党参议员在 1 万亿美元救助计划上的态度是一致的，但他也指出，为了尽快通过这项救助计划，与民主党人谈判比较困难的问题可以先缓一缓，等待另一项政策的出台。
translation.en: The secretary said the Trump administration and Senate Republicans are on the same page with a $1 trillion package, but noted that in the interest of passing a bill quickly, issues that are more difficult to negotiate with Democrats could be held off for another bill.

translation.zh: 皇后乐队和 Adam Lambert：Brian May 为 Roger Taylor 庆祝生日
translation.en: Queen and Adam Lambert: Brian May celebrates Roger Taylor's birthday

translation.zh: 今天，皇后乐队传奇鼓手 Roger Taylor 和滚石乐队灵魂人物、现年 77 岁的 Mick Jagger 一起庆祝生日。
translation.en: The Queen legend shares his birthday today with The Rolling Stones frontman Mick Jagger, who is now 77-years-old.

translation.zh: 7 月 19 日，也就是上周末，Brian May 刚过完 73 岁生日，并感谢粉丝们送上生日祝福。
translation.en: Brian May celebrated his 73rd birthday last weekend on July 19 and thanked fans for the birthday wishes.

translation.zh: 身为摇滚巨星的他在与妻子 Anita Dobson 的合影旁边写道：“Anita 为我准备的生日晚餐，即便在家里过生日，我们还是精心打扮了一番！”
translation.en: The rock star wrote next to a snap of him and his wife Anita Dobson: "Birthday dinner for me - created by Anita - we dressed up to stay home !"

translation.zh: 埃及法庭将谋杀三名儿童的男子移送精神医学评估
translation.en: Egypt court refers man who murdered three children to psychiatric evaluation

translation.zh: 南明亚检署首席检察官 Tamer Motea 周日判处将一名农民收监四天，等待对其谋杀三个孩子的调查得出结论，同时将疑犯移送精神医学评估。
translation.en: The South Minya Prosecution's Attorney General Tamer Motea on Sunday sentenced a farmer to four days imprisonment pending investigations into why he murdered his three children while also referring him to a psychiatric committee.

translation.zh: 7 月 24 日，56 岁的 Mohamed Ali 在马拉维火车站将他的三个孩子——4 岁的 Khadiga、8 岁的 Mena 和 6 岁的 Omar 扔到了行驶的列车前方。
translation.en: On July 24, 56-year-old Mohamed Ali threw his children Khadiga, four, Mena, eight, and Omar, six, in front of a moving train at the Mallawi Railway Station.

translation.zh: 在案件调查期间，Ali 有胡言乱语的表现，因此被疑精神崩溃。
translation.en: Ali was found to be babbling incoherently during investigations, leading to suspicion he was suffering a mental breakdown.

translation.zh: Ali 的妻子否认他此前出现过任何问题，并将他的行为归咎于心理因素。
translation.en: His wife denied she had suffered any problems with him and attributed his behavior to psychological issues.

translation.zh: Massart Mallawi 村的居民不愿就此事件发表言论，仅向孩子们的家人表示慰问。
translation.en: Villagers from Massart Mallawi refrained from speaking about the incident, offering only their condolences to the children's family.

translation.zh: 国家妇女儿童委员会顾问 Khalid Darwish 在十月说过，约有 93% 的 1 到 14 岁埃及儿童遭受过暴力侵害。
translation.en: Roughly 93 percent of Egyptian children aged one to 14 years old suffer from violence, said Khalid Darwish, advisor to the National Council for Childhood and Motherhood back in October.

translation.zh: 他还补充道，起诉是消除儿童虐待最主要的手段之一，强调了委员会与公诉机关在这方面务必要加强合作。
translation.en: Prosecution is one of the most important pillars in eliminating child abuse, he added, stressing the importance of cooperation between the council and Public Prosecution in this regard.

translation.zh: 国家妇女儿童委员会的一项研究发现，即便是在家庭、学校或社团这种本应相当安全的地方，儿童也可能遭受暴力侵害，加害者包括本应照顾他们的人——例如父母或老师。
translation.en: According to a study prepared by the National Council for Childhood and Motherhood, children are subjected to violence in places that are supposed to be safe, such as home, school or clubs, and exposed to violence from people who are supposed to care for them, such as parents or teachers.

translation.zh: 美联社批评白宫新闻秘书 Kayleigh McEnany 的“政治性”简报，但记者不断提问政治问题——RT 电视台美国新闻
translation.en: AP blasts White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany for "political" briefings - but reporters keep asking political questions - RT USA News

translation.zh: 美联社指责白宫新闻秘书 Kayleigh McEnany 使得新闻发布会的政治性多过新闻性，令媒体感到担忧，却显然忘记了是记者选择的这些问题。
translation.en: The Associated Press has accused White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany of worrying the media by making her briefings political rather than informational -- apparently forgetting that reporters choose the questions.

translation.zh: 美国最大的新闻机构美联社周六发表文章称，白宫新闻发布会可能“打破了传统”，因为 McEnany 将新闻发布会变成了“为争取总统连任进行简短高调的宣传和攻击媒体的场所”，而关于政府所作所为的“信息相对匮乏”。
translation.en: An article Saturday by the AP, the largest US news agency, said White House press briefings may be a "broken tradition," as McEnany has made them "a streamlined, full-throated advertisement for a president facing re-election, a venue for attacks on the media and a forum relatively light on information" about what the government is doing.

translation.zh: 最后一个评价无可厚非，因为发布会上几乎没有披露任何新信息。
translation.en: The last of those assertions is indisputable, as hardly any new information is revealed at the briefings.

translation.zh: 美联社没有提到的是，几乎没有人在发布会上询问任何新消息。
translation.en: What the AP failed to mention is that hardly any new information is actually sought at the briefings.

translation.zh: 记者们经常利用白宫新闻官来让自己被注意到，CNN 的 Jim Acosta 将这一手段发挥到了极致。
translation.en: Reporters frequently use White House pressers to draw attention to themselves, an art form perfected by CNN's Jim Acosta.

translation.zh: 他们超越了媒体与政府之间常见的对抗关系，会互相重复地问一些有陷阱得问题，为的只是质疑 Donald Trump 总统。
translation.en: They go beyond the typical adversarial media-administration relationship, repeating each other in asking gotcha questions aimed only at impugning President Donald Trump.

translation.zh: 在某些场合，他们会让自己成为新闻，比方说，哥伦比亚广播公司新闻记者 Weijia Jiang 在回应 Trump 反驳的“去问中国”时就做出了不那么微妙的暗示：“先生，为什么您特别对我说这番话？”
translation.en: In some cases, they make themselves the news, such as when CBS News reporter Weijia Jiang responded to an "ask China" retort from Trump by making a not-so-subtle hint at racism: "Sir, why are you saying that to me specifically?"

translation.zh: 7 月 6 日的发布会就是一个很好的例子，体现出它不再是美国民众获取有效信息的来源。
translation.en: A July 6 briefing offered a prime example of the disconnect over how the briefings have ceased to be a source of meaningful information for Americans.

translation.zh: 当天早上，Trump 发推文称 NASCAR 收视率下降是因为对车手 Bubba Wallace 所谓的仇恨犯罪做了虚假报道并决定禁止在赛事中展示邦联旗帜。
translation.en: Trump tweeted that morning that NASCAR's television ratings had been hurt by a false allegation of a hate crime against driver Bubba Wallace and by its decision to ban display of the Confederate flag at its events.

translation.zh: 跟预料的一样，记者们一个接一个地向 McEnany 提问与这条推文相关的问题，想让她亲口承认 Trump 支持邦联旗帜。
translation.en: Predictably, most of the questions were about the tweet as reporter after reporter asked McEnany questions designed to prompt her to say that Trump supports the Confederate flag.

translation.zh: McEnany 并没有让记者得逞，那样说会有损 Trump 的利益，但她一再回应表示总统在邦联旗帜方面没有立场，他的推文主旨是 NASCAR 车迷被错误地描绘成了种族主义者。
translation.en: McEnany didn't provide the answer reporters wanted - a sound bite that would hurt Trump - but she repeatedly responded by saying the president wasn't taking a position on the Confederate flag and that the gist of his message was that NASCAR fans were wrongly being portrayed as being racist.

translation.zh: 美联社称她在发布会的过程中听起来“恼羞成怒”。
translation.en: The AP said she sounded "exasperated" during the briefing.

translation.zh: 美联社的故事与本月早些时候美国广播公司新闻记者 Jonathan Karl 发表于《华盛顿邮报》的专栏文章交相呼应，他也是白宫通讯员协会主席。
translation.en: The AP's story echoed a Washington Post op-ed column earlier this month by ABC News reporter Jonathan Karl, who also is president of the White House Correspondents Association.

translation.zh: Karl 说：“否认现实并且把白宫讲台用于纯粹的政治目的有违公众信任。”
translation.en: Karl argued, "denying reality and using the White House podium for purely political purposes is a violation of public trust."

translation.zh: McEnany 于四月接任新闻秘书，并在 5 月 1 日主持了她的首场发布会，她的机智和好斗作风让一部分 Trump 支持者将她视为英雄。
translation.en: Yet McEnany's quick wit and combative style have made her a hero of some Trump supporters, since she gave her first briefing on May 1 after taking over as press secretary in April.

translation.zh: 在她被任命之前，新闻官这个职位已经空缺了一年多。
translation.en: The pressers had been absent for more than a year before her appointment.

translation.zh: 与华盛顿政治生活的其他方面一样，Trump 时代的白宫新闻秘书与媒体之间的关系也发生了巨大变化。
translation.en: Like other aspects of political life in Washington, the White House press secretary's relationship with the media has changed dramatically in the Trump era.

translation.zh: 这种变化来自双方，在 McEnany 到来之前就已经发生。
translation.en: That change has come from both sides and predated McEnany's arrival.

translation.zh: 在 2018 年 4 月举行的白宫通讯员晚宴上，喜剧演员 Michelle Wolf 对前新闻秘书 Sarah Huckabee Sanders 发出了恶毒拷问，就连 MSNBC 主持人 Mika Brzezinski 也称之“令人震惊”。
translation.en: A roast of former press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders by comedian Michelle Wolf at the White House Correspondents" dinner in April 2018 was so vicious that even MSNBC host Mika Brzezinski called it "deplorable."

translation.zh: 美联社白宫记者 Jill Colvin 在 McEnany 的首场发布会上问她：“你能否承诺绝不会在那个讲台上对我们撒谎？”
translation.en: AP White House reporter Jill Colvin greeted McEnany at her first briefing by asking, "Will you pledge never to lie to us from that podium?"

translation.zh: 福克斯新闻频道政治分析师 Brit Hume 是一位拥有 50 多年经验的资深新闻人士，曾在 1989 至 1996 年间担任美国广播公司（ABC）首席白宫通讯员，他说，现如今的记者在新闻发布会上表现出“攻击性行为”是因为他们看不起 Trump。
translation.en: Fox News political analyst Brit Hume, a veteran of more than 50 years in journalism who had a 1989-1996 stint as ABC's chief White House correspondent, said reporters today display "aggressive behavior" in the briefing room because of their contempt for Trump.

translation.zh: 他在福克斯电视台本周的《Tucker Carlson Tonight》节目中说，这是因为记者们的重心是与 Trump 唱反调，忽略了政策新闻的收集。
translation.en: It is because of their anti-Trump focus, he said this week on Fox's Tucker Carlson Tonight program, journalists are neglecting to gather policy news.

translation.zh: “这不只是一场猫捉老鼠的游戏，” Hume 在谈到媒体人的预期目的时表示，
translation.en: "It's not just a gotcha game," Hume said of the intended purpose of the pressers.

translation.zh: “我们的目的不仅仅是让政府官员下不来台，而是要获得信息。”
translation.en: "It's not just an attempt to embarrass a public official. It's to extract information.

translation.zh: 加利福尼亚示威者焚烧法院
translation.en: Courthouse set on fire during protest in California

translation.zh: 奥克兰（加利福尼亚）——奥克兰警方称，周六晚些时候，加利福尼亚和平示威活动演变为冲突事件。示威者向法院纵火，打砸警局并袭击多名警官。
translation.en: OAKLAND, Ca. -- Protesters in California set fire to a courthouse, damaged a police station and assaulted officers after a peaceful demonstration intensified late Saturday, Oakland police said.

translation.zh: 奥克兰相关部门在推特上称，示威者损毁窗户，喷洒涂鸦，并对警务人员发射烟火和使用激光器。
translation.en: Demonstrators broke windows, spray painted graffiti, shot fireworks and pointed lasers at officers, the Oakland department said on Twitter.

translation.zh: 一些人则在推特上呼吁和平，这些推文中写道：请求组织者“帮助我们为示威人群提供安全的空间和地点”。
translation.en: Several tweets called for peace and asked organizers to "help us provide safe spaces and safe places for demonstrators."

translation.zh: 示威活动于周六晚开始，参与示威的组织包括“妈妈之墙”（与俄勒冈州波特兰市的相关组织类似）等组织。与此同时，示威人群与部署在联邦法院负责安保工作的警务人员发生对峙。
translation.en: The protest began earlier Saturday evening with groups such as the "Wall of Moms," similar to a group that formed in Portland, Oregon, as protesters faced off with U.S. agents deployed to that city to guard a federal courthouse.

translation.zh: 自从 5 月 25 日明尼阿波里斯市的 George Floyd 事件发生后，总统 Donald Trump 便派遣联邦警察每晚对示威活动进行压制。
translation.en: President Donald Trump had sent the federal agents to clamp down on protests that have occurred nightly since the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis on May 25.

translation.zh: 起初，示威人群在奥克兰进行和平示威，但在晚间演变为暴力冲突。
translation.en: The protest in Oakland began peacefully, but turned violent later into the night.

translation.zh: 晚上 11:30 左右，警方宣布此次示威为“非法集会”，并要求示威人群解散。
translation.en: An "unlawful assembly" was declared by police around 11:30 p.m. and officers asked the crowd to disperse.

translation.zh: 据新闻媒体报道，阿拉米达县高等法院发生纵火事件，但火势在短时间内得到了控制。
translation.en: The fire broke out at the Alameda County Superior Courthouse and was contained a short time later, news outlets reported.

translation.zh: 警方称，示威者一度“砸碎玻璃并对居民进行带有种族歧视的谩骂”。
translation.en: Police said protesters at one point were "breaking windows and chanting racial slurs at residents."

translation.zh: 相关部门在推特上发布的照片中，警局大楼的玻璃被砸碎，墙上也布满了涂鸦。
translation.en: Photos tweeted by the department showed broken glass and paint splattered at a police building.

translation.zh: 联合国高级官员因航班原因取消对巴基斯坦的访问
translation.en: Senior UN official skips Pakistan visit, citing flight issue

translation.zh: 伊斯兰堡（美联社）——即将履新的联合国大会主席于周日宣布，“由于航班发生技术故障”，推迟了原定对巴基斯坦的访问。
translation.en: ISLAMABAD (AP) - The incoming president of the United Nations General Assembly announced Sunday that he was postponing a scheduled visit to Pakistan "due to some technical flight problems."

translation.zh: 上个月，土耳其外交官 Volkan Bozkir 成功当选联合国大会第 75 届会议主席，原定于周日抵达伊斯兰堡。
translation.en: Turkish diplomat Volkan Bozkir was elected president of the 75th session of the United Nations General Assembly last month and was scheduled to arrive in Islamabad on Sunday.

translation.zh: 然而，他发布推文称，访问巴基斯坦首都的计划不得不延后。
translation.en: But in a Twitter post, he said the visit to Pakistan's capital would have to wait.

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦外交部长 Shah Mahmood Qureshi 发布推文回应 Bozkir，表示“热忱欢迎您尽快到访巴基斯坦，进行富有建设性和成果的访问。”
translation.en: Pakistan's foreign minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi tweeted in response to Bozkir that "I look forward to welcoming you to Pakistan soon for a constructive and fruitful visit."

translation.zh: 就在一天前，Qureshi 兴高采烈地发布了此次访问的消息，表示希望与 Bozkir 就克什米尔等一系列问题展开讨论，克什米尔地处巴基斯坦和邻国印度之间，两国均宣称对克什米尔全境拥有主权。
translation.en: A day earlier, a jubilant Qureshi, while announcing the visit, had hoped he would discuss a range of issues with Bozkir, including Kashmir, which is split between Pakistan and neighboring India and claimed by both in its entirety.

translation.zh: 自 1947 年脱离英国统治实现独立以来，巴基斯坦和印度之间发生过三场战争，其中两场均涉及该争议地区。
translation.en: Pakistan and India have fought two of their three wars over the disputed region since gaining independence from British rule in 1947.

translation.zh: 双方频繁在克什米尔交火，造成军队和平民伤亡。
translation.en: The two sides often exchange fire in Kashmir, causing troops and civilian casualties on both sides.

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦希望联合国通过决议，允许居住在喜马拉雅地区的人决定是与印度或巴基斯坦合并还是独立，从而推动克什米尔问题的解决。
translation.en: Pakistan wants the United Nations to play its role in resolving the issue of Kashmir under its resolutions by allowing people living in the Himalayan region to decide whether they want to merge with India, with Pakistan or whether they prefer independence.

translation.zh: 曼联拿到欧冠入场券，Paul Pogba 暗示继续留在球队
translation.en: Paul Pogba drops hint over his future after Man Utd seal Champions League spot

translation.zh: 在红魔锁定四强席位之后，曼联球星 Paul Pogba 暗示今年夏天会继续留在球队。
translation.en: Manchester United star Paul Pogba has suggested he will stay at the club this summer after the Red Devils sealed a place in the top four.

translation.zh: 2:0 拿下莱斯特城意味着曼联最终排名第三，领先于 Frank Lampard 执鞭的切尔西队。
translation.en: A 2-0 win against Leicester meant United finished in third, ahead of Frank Lampard's Chelsea.

translation.zh: 在 12 场比赛前，莱斯特城仍领先曼联 14 分，然而红魔一路高歌猛进闯入四强。
translation.en: United were 14 points off Leicester just 12 matches ago but a sensational run of form saw the Red Devils finish in the top four.

translation.zh: 过去两年中 Pogba 曾两次要求离队，因此球迷预测 Pogba 会在今年夏天离开球队。
translation.en: Pogba had been expected to leave the club this summer after twice requesting to leave in the last two years.

translation.zh: 然而，疫情来袭意味着很少有球队会在今年夏天大量花钱，此外没有买家能够同时负担得起转会费和吸引 Pogba 离开老特拉福德的薪资。
translation.en: However, the pandemic means few clubs will be spending big this summer and there's not a buyer available that could combine a transfer fee and Pogba's salary to entice him away from Old Trafford.

translation.zh: 做出这样的说明在过去几周对 Pogba 颇有帮助，他的表现和肢体语言都有改善。
translation.en: That clarification has helped Pogba in recent weeks as his performances, as well as his body language, have improved.

translation.zh: 在球队以 2:0 获胜后，这位法国球员在 Instagram 上发贴，暗示他将留在球队。
translation.en: And the Frenchman has dropped the latest hint that he's set to stay at the club by posting on his Instagram after his side's 2-0 win.

translation.zh: 尽管 Pogba 可能只是在庆祝球队重获欧冠资格，但许多球迷理解为他在强烈地暗示自己会继续留在球队与欧洲顶尖球员一决高下。
translation.en: While Pogba may have been simply celebrating the club's return to the competition, many fans are interpreting it as a strong suggestion that he'll still be at the club as they compete with Europe's best again.

translation.zh: Pogba 目前的合同还剩下一年，但球队可以续约一年，也就是说他实际上还要服务两年。
translation.en: Pogba has a year to run on his existing deal, though the club can extend that by 12 months meaning he effectively has two years to run.

translation.zh: 曼联渴望延长 Pogba 的合同，希望在下个赛季之前明确他的情况。
translation.en: United are keen on extending Pogba's deal and they want clarity over his situation before next season.

translation.zh: 对 Pogba 而言，他在球队呆得很舒服，Bruno Fernandes 的加盟更让他如虎添翼。
translation.en: Pogba, for his part, feels comfortable at the club and has been buoyed by the arrival of Bruno Fernandes.

translation.zh: 这位葡萄牙中场成为了老特拉福德的核心，他的到来使得 Pogba 能够长驱直入更深的中场位置，也改善了他的情绪。
translation.en: The Portuguese playmaker has been a revelation at Old Trafford and his arrival has allowed Pogba to play in a deeper central midfield position, which has also improved his mood.

translation.zh: Aubameyang 助力阿森纳送沃特福德英超降级
translation.en: Watford relegated from Premier League as Aubameyang fires Arsenal win

translation.zh: 沃特福德一些球员跪倒在地，还有一些则头也不回地离开了赛场。
translation.en: Some of Watford's players sank to their knees; others made for the tunnel without a moment's delay.

translation.zh: 沃特福德重返英超第五年的哨声才刚刚吹响，但没有人能说，在需要沃特福德全力追击阿森纳之际，沃特福德不战而降。
translation.en: The whistle had just blown on their five years in the Premier League and nobody could say that, when the occasion demanded them to hurl the kitchen sink at Arsenal, they went down without a fight.

translation.zh: 实际上，这是沃特福德五年来最为斗志昂扬、势如破竹的一场比赛，在落后 3 分的情况下，沃特福德差点逆转战局，最终不敌阿森纳。
translation.en: This was a performance full of the crispness, urgency and aggression that have hallmarked their best work over the last half-decade but it came too late, as did the fightback that almost completely overhauled a three-goal deficit on the day.

translation.zh: 比赛结束前 16 分钟，Danny Welbeck 后脚跟推射，门将 Emiliano Martínez 将球扑出，若非如此，Welbeck 将为沃特福德拿下第三分，追平阿森纳，守住英超席位。
translation.en: Had Emiliano Martínez not brilliantly saved Danny Welbeck's backheel 16 minutes from time, shortly after his former teammate had tapped in to put Watford within two goals of safety, there is every chance they could have completed a comeback for the ages.

translation.zh: 但最终沃特福德未能如愿，其看守主教练 Hayden Mullins 表示，如果之前的状态都像这场比赛一样，他也不必如此劳神费力。
translation.en: In the end they fell short and their caretaker manager, Hayden Mullins, might reflect that he would have never been handed this most thankless of tasks if his team had shown comparable application previously.

translation.zh: 整个赛季，沃特福德都萎靡不振，老板 Pozzo 对球队的管理也是混乱不堪。
translation.en: Across the season they have not been good enough, but then nor has the organisation that employs them.

translation.zh: 一场失败的战役可能无法摧毁一个帝国，但 Pozzo 家族却无法为沃特福德奠定可确保其再次回归英超的基石。
translation.en: One poor campaign may not wreck an empire, but nor do the foundations put in place by the Pozzo family offer any kind of guarantee they will sail straight back up from the second tier.

translation.zh: 沃特福德频繁换帅已经成为了无法逃脱的命运。
translation.en: It is hard to escape the sense that Watford's habit of flipping managers has run out of road.

translation.zh: 粗略算来，下次换帅将是八年来的第 12 次，但换帅能注入的新鲜血液却十分有限。
translation.en: Their next permanent - perhaps in the loosest sense of - appointment will be the 12th in eight years and there is only so much fresh air a new broom can sweep in.

translation.zh: 队长 Troy Deeney 面临随队降级，虽然他还能参加阿联酋超级联赛。
translation.en: Troy Deeney faces up to relegation despite getting on the scoresheet at the Emirates.

translation.zh: 某些球员也可能选择离开，例如攻击手 Ismaïla Sarr 就再一次表示，9 月打英冠简直难以置信，但保存实力是现阶段的首要任务。
translation.en: Players will depart, Ismaïla Sarr showing again here that it should be inconceivable he will be playing Championship football in September, and a steady hand should be a priority.

translation.zh: 阿森纳主教练 Mikel Arteta 表示，两军相交胜率难料，这让比赛更加精彩。
translation.en: There was nothing stable about the boom-or-bust fare in an encounter Mikel Arteta described as "a bit of a basketball game," although it certainly made for fine entertainment.

translation.zh: Arteta 还表示，沃特福德的前锋一直在“作弊”，很快又改口为足球术语“力图保级”。
translation.en: Arteta said afterwards Watford's forwards had been "cheating," although he quickly clarified that as a football term for "gambling, staying up front."

translation.zh: 阿森纳这么说其实也无可厚非，阿森纳比分领先，沃特福德必须步步紧逼追回比分。
translation.en: They certainly needed to: any suggestion a battling point might eventually suffice was quickly scotched and they might wonder how things would have transpired if they had not been obliged to play catch-up.

translation.zh: 沃特福德开场就丢了一个点球。
translation.en: Instead they conceded a penalty almost immediately.

translation.zh: 开场 40 秒，Craig Dawson 意外撞倒 Alexandre Lacazette，经 VAR 长达约 3 分钟的核实后判罚点球，Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang 主罚点球命中。
translation.en: Craig Dawson had bundled carelessly into Alexandre Lacazette within 40 seconds but it took VAR almost three minutes to be confident of awarding the spot kick, which Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang dispatched unfussily.

translation.zh: 沃特福德全力紧逼，Sarr 快速反击右侧得球，Roberto Pereyra和 Troy Deeney 保驾护航，逼近球门。
translation.en: Watford gathered themselves to press relentlessly, with Sarr in electric form on the right, and came close through Roberto Pereyra and Troy Deeney.

translation.zh: 但之后 Aubameyang 得球，回敲给 Kieran Tierney，在第一次中场休息时，战局焦灼，尽管阿森纳大比分领先，Arteta 依然批评了球员。
translation.en: But then Aubameyang teed up Kieran Tierney for a deflected second and, at the first drinks break, the game had been so oddly skewed that Arteta was the manager tearing a strip off his players despite Arsenal's advantage.

translation.zh: Tierney 大力手抛球，Aubameyang 控球，随后倒勾将球打入，此时，Aubameyang 离金靴奖仅一球之隔，若非 Ben Foster 在比赛快结束时拦截了最后一球，Aubameyang 本可跟 Jamie Vardy 同享金靴殊荣。
translation.en: Aubameyang then controlled Tierney's long throw and converted a masterful overhead kick that left him one goal short of the golden boot, an award he would have shared with Jamie Vardy if Ben Foster had not blocked one last chance near the end.

translation.zh: 此时，沃特福德已然精疲力尽但仍不屈不挠地发起进攻，David Luiz 禁区犯规，沃特福德获得点球机会，Deeney 在中场休息前主罚命中。
translation.en: Watford appeared done for but they persevered and, after David Luiz had produced another rash penalty-area challenge for the album on Welbeck, Deeney rammed in his own penalty before the break.

translation.zh: 整个赛季 Deeney 都是带伤上场，在球场上艰难前行，犹如一个角斗士。
translation.en: Deeney, walking wounded for most of the season, hauled himself around the pitch and was in gladiator mode throughout.

translation.zh: 他抓住了 Adam Masina 在第二阶段早期错过的机会，也拒绝因伤缺席。
translation.en: He would probably have gobbled up the chance Adam Masina missed early in the second period and further openings were spurned, too.

translation.zh: 比赛之初，经 Arteta 确认将参加足总杯决赛的门将 Martínez 大挫沃特福德，Sarr 低平球横敲门前扭转战况，沃特福德得球。
translation.en: Welbeck was thwarted for a first time by the excellent Martínez, who Arteta confirmed will start Saturday's FA Cup final, and then had the entire Watford contingent pitchside on their feet upon converting a fizzing cross from Sarr.

translation.zh: 在 Sarr 再次进攻被截后，沃特福德遗憾败北，沃特福德全体人员需要进行深刻反省。
translation.en: But Watford's prospects faded when his next effort was repelled and the soul-searching, from top to bottom, will need to be extensive.

translation.zh: 以清澈闻名的太浩湖，遭受气候变化污染
translation.en: Famously clear Lake Tahoe has been polluted by climate change

translation.zh: 加利福尼亚南太浩湖——虽然疫情阴影犹在，但即便是工作日，太浩湖的教皇沙滩依然人满为患。
translation.en: South Lake Tahoe, California - Despite the pandemic, even on a weekday, people still crowd Pope Beach at Lake Tahoe.

translation.zh: 一位名叫 Dakota 的女孩说：“我喜欢在湖边露营和骑行，也喜欢在湖中游泳。”
translation.en: "I like camping and having a bike ride and going swimming at the Lake," said one girl named Dakota.

translation.zh: Emerica Benitas 说：“这里太美了，吸引了大家前来参观。”
translation.en: "This is something beautiful everybody wants to visit," said Emerica Benitas.

translation.zh: 正因为如此，即时在疫情期间，Matt Meunier 的潜水业务仍然做得风生水起。
translation.en: Which is why Matt Meunier's dive business is still going strong, even in a pandemic.

translation.zh: 他说他眼里的湖清澈见底：“我认为太浩湖是国内最干净、最梦幻的湖。”
translation.en: He says he sees "exceptional clarity. Lake Tahoe is the cleanest, most wonderful lake, I think, in the country."

translation.zh: 然而，现在的情况是，太浩湖不如二十多年前他搬到这里时那般纯净、清澈。
translation.en: Now the bad news: Lake Tahoe's not as clean, not as clear, as it used to be when he moved here over two decades ago.

translation.zh: Meunier 说：“我们越来越频繁地看到湖底的岩石发生变化。
translation.en: "The thing that we're noticing more and more is down on the rocks," Meunier said.

translation.zh: 岩石上长出了这种奇怪的藻类。”
translation.en: "You're getting this strange algae on the rocks."

translation.zh: 科学家们认为，气候变化影响到了水温，导致湖水的清澈度不如从前。
translation.en: Climate change, scientists believe, has affected the water temperature and thus, the clarity.

translation.zh: 每年有 1,500 万游客到太浩湖游玩，同时也留下许多垃圾。
translation.en: And 15 million people visit the lake annually - along with the garbage they leave.

translation.zh: Meunier 说，在对湖底进行潜水清理的过程中发现了不少从前遗留的垃圾。
translation.en: Meunier said dive trips to clean up the bottom of the lake found old trash.

translation.zh: “我说的从前指的是上世纪 6、70 年代，” Meunier 说，
translation.en: "And when I say old trash, I mean '60s, '70s," Meunier said.

translation.zh: “湖底有过去的啤酒罐、汽水罐还有教堂钥匙罐。”
translation.en: "Beer cans, soda cans, church key cans from the old days."

translation.zh: 科学家们每年都会对太浩湖的清澈度进行监测，他们采取的方法是将一个白色圆盘沉入湖水中，然后测量能看得见圆盘的湖水深度。
translation.en: Scientists monitor the clarity of Lake Tahoe every year by dropping a white disc, then measuring how far down they can see it.

translation.zh: 加州大学戴维斯分校的 Geoff Schladow 教授表示，这是“反映湖水健康程度的重要指标”。
translation.en: UC Davis professor Geoff Schladow said it's an "important indicator of how healthy the lake is."

translation.zh: 去年的测量结果显示，湖水的清澈度大约为 80 英尺。
translation.en: When it was measured last year, the clarity of the lake was about 80 feet.

translation.zh: 也就是说，我们能够看到深入水下 80 英尺的圆盘。
translation.en: That means you can see that disc 80 feet down.

translation.zh: 然而，大约在 20 年前，湖水的清澈度是 100 英尺。
translation.en: But, consider this, about 20 years ago, the clarity of lake was 100 feet.

translation.zh: 科学家们试图扭转这一趋势。
translation.en: That's the trend scientists are trying to reverse.

translation.zh: 他们努力应对各种影响：气候变化、湖区的发展以及上世纪 60 年代扔到湖中的垃圾。他们采取的方法是引入一种细小的入侵虾来喂鱼。
translation.en: But they're fighting the impacts of climate change, development around the lake and something added to the lake in the 1960's: A tiny invasive shrimp brought in to feed the fish.

translation.zh: 这种方法并没有奏效。
translation.en: It didn't work.

translation.zh: Schladow 说：“引入了小虾之后，湖中的自然清洁工突然都消失了。”
translation.en: "Once the shrimp came in, there were suddenly no natural cleaners in the lake," Schladow said.

translation.zh: 世界各地的湖泊和水体都面临类似的问题。
translation.en: Similar challenges are facing lakes and bodies of water around the world.

translation.zh: “我们得到的教训是，如果这种方法不能在太浩湖奏效的话，国内那么多绝对不会有如此高的关注度和如此多资源的河流、河口、溪流和湖泊该怎么办？” Schladow 说。
translation.en: "The lesson here is, if you can't do it at Tahoe, then what hope is there for all the rivers and estuaries, streams and lakes around the country that are never going to have the same degree of attention, the same level of resources?" Schladow said.

translation.zh: Meunier 表示他“抱有希望”，因为“我想疫情带来的一线希望就是，大自然具有恢复和自愈的能力，而我们只要减轻压力，减轻人类造成的压力，让它自己复原就好了。 现在的事实就是这样。”
translation.en: Meunier said he is "hopeful" because "if there's a silver lining of our pandemic, I think it showed that nature will come back and heal itself if we just relieved that pressure, that human pressure, off of it and allow it to happen. There's facts there now."

translation.zh: 电光队签下四分卫 Herbert 及其他三名新秀
translation.en: QB Herbert among 4 draft picks signed by Chargers

translation.zh: 加州科斯塔梅萨（美联社）——洛杉矶电光队签下四分卫 Justin Herbert 等四名新秀，并与获选名单中的其他两名球员达成协议。
translation.en: COSTA MESA, Calif. (AP) - The Los Angeles Chargers have signed four of their draft picks, including quarterback Justin Herbert, and have agreed to terms with the other two members of their draft class.

translation.zh: 球员们于周六前往训练营报道进行体检并领取装备，电光队在同日与新秀们签订合同。
translation.en: The Chargers were able to get contracts done with their draft class on Saturday when they reported to training camp for physicals and equipment.

translation.zh: Herbert 以第六顺位被选中，同期签约的还有外接手 Joe Reed（第五轮）、KJ Hill（第七轮）和安全卫 Alohi Gilman（第六轮）。
translation.en: Along with Herbert, who was selected with the sixth overall pick, the team announced the signings of wide receivers Joe Reed (fifth round) and KJ Hill (seventh round) along with sixth-round safety Alohi Gilman.

translation.zh: 球队与第一轮入选的后卫 Kenneth Murray Jr. 以及第四轮入选的跑卫 Joshua Kelley 达成了协议。
translation.en: They have agreed to terms with first-round linebacker Kenneth Murray Jr. and running back Joshua Kelley, who was selected in the fourth round.

translation.zh: Herbert 在俄勒冈队首发出战 42 场，凭借 10,541 码传球距离和总共 108 次触地得分斩获 29:13 的战绩。
translation.en: Herbert started 42 games at Oregon, compiling a 29-13 record with 10,541 passing yards and 108 total touchdowns.

translation.zh: 上赛季他带领鸭队摘得帕克十二联盟桂冠，在 14 场比赛中奉献 32 次触地得分，完成 6 次拦截。
translation.en: He led the Ducks to the Pac-12 championship last season, throwing 32 touchdowns and six interceptions in 14 games.

translation.zh: 他在玫瑰碗球场战胜了威斯康星队，跑出触地得分三次并被提名进攻型 MVP，打出职业生涯最佳成绩。
translation.en: He capped his career with a win over Wisconsin in the Rose Bowl, where he ran for three touchdowns and was named the offensive MVP.

translation.zh: Herbert 将与久经沙场的 Tyrod Taylor 竞争首发位置。
translation.en: Herbert will compete with veteran Tyrod Taylor for the starting job.

translation.zh: 在效力 14 个赛季之后，首发球员 Philip Rivers 以自由球员身份离开，电光队将迎来一名新四分卫。
translation.en: The Chargers will have a new quarterback after Philip Rivers departed via free agency after 14 seasons as the starter.

translation.zh: 洛杉矶队与新英格兰队达成交易回到第一轮，Murray 以第 23 顺位被选中。
translation.en: Murray was the 23rd overall pick after Los Angeles traded with New England to move back into the first round.

translation.zh: 他带领捷足者队打出过 102 次擒抱（含 69 次单人擒抱），成功入选上赛季美联社第三阵容。
translation.en: He was a third-team Associated Press All-America selection selection last season after leading the Sooners with 102 tackles, including 69 solo.

translation.zh: 多名球星列入转会名单，巴塞罗那今夏“全盘待价而沽”
translation.en: Barcelona 'have whole side to sell' this summer as Coutinho, Dembele, Rakitic and Vidal all listed for transfers

translation.zh: 据报道，巴塞罗那球队今年夏天会被称为销售俱乐部。
translation.en: BARCELONA will be known as a selling club this summer, according to reports.

translation.zh: 《马卡报》称，这支西甲豪门队伍已将至少 12 名一线球星列入转会名单。
translation.en: No fewer than 12 first team stars have been transfer-listed by the La Liga giants, claim Marca.

translation.zh: Philippe Coutinho 名列巴塞罗那转会名单
translation.en: Philippe Coutinho has been reportedly transfer-listed by Barcelona

translation.zh: 名单还包括英超联赛目标球员 Philippe Coutinho、Ousmane Dembele、Ivan Rakitic 和 Samuel Umtiti。
translation.en: And those include Premier League targets Philippe Coutinho, Ousmane Dembele, Ivan Rakitic and Samuel Umtiti.

translation.zh: Coutinho 和 Umtiti 都将转战阿森纳，而切尔西也对这名巴西球员情有独钟。
translation.en: Coutinho and Umtiti have both been linked with moves to Arsenal, with the Brazilian also being eyed up by Chelsea.

translation.zh: 曼联和热刺据称正在争夺 Rakitic。
translation.en: While Manchester United and Tottenham are said to be in a battle for Rakitic's services.

translation.zh: 在诺坎普球场冲锋陷阵的法国世界杯冠军得主 Dembele 最近通过与 Neymar 交换转投 PSG。
translation.en: French World Cup winner Dembele, who has struggled for game time at the Camp Nou, was recently linked with a move to PSG in a swap deal with Neymar.

translation.zh: 其他富余球员还有 Neto、Nelson Semedo、Junior Firpo、Arturo Vidal、Martin Braithwaite、Carles Alena、Rafinha Alcantara 和 Jean-Clair Todibo。
translation.en: The other players who are deemed surplus to requirements include Neto, Nelson Semedo, Junior Firpo, Arturo Vidal, Martin Braithwaite, Carles Alena, Rafinha Alcantara, and Jean-Clair Todibo.

translation.zh: 巴塞罗那希望通过球员交易来改善财务状况，同时为他们未来的转会业务打下基础。
translation.en: Barcelona are hoping a clear out will not only boost their finances, but aid their future transfer business.

translation.zh: Ousmane Dembele 据称也是富余球员
translation.en: Ousmane Dembele is also said to be surplus to requirements

translation.zh: 根据西班牙报纸报道，巴塞罗那已经确定了他们下一赛季的转会目标，其中阿根廷籍前锋 Lautaro Martinez 位列名单首位。
translation.en: According to the Spanish newspaper, Barcelona have already identified their transfer targets for next season - with Argentinian forward Lautaro Martinez top of their hit list.

translation.zh: 但是，国际米兰要求先满足 Martinez 1.01 亿英镑的解约费用条件才会继续与西班牙人谈判。
translation.en: But Inter Milan are continuing to ask for his £101million release clause to be met before negotiating with the Catalans.

translation.zh: 因此，巴塞罗那不得不先出售部分球员筹集资金，但他们仍对与意甲方面达成交易充满信心。
translation.en: Barcelona will have to sell before they can buy, but remain confident that they can strike a deal with the Serie A side.

translation.zh: 阿森纳试图放弃中场球员，巴塞罗那“用 Philippe Coutinho 与阿森纳交换坏男孩 Guendouzi”
translation.en: Barcelona "offer Arsenal Philippe Coutinho in swap transfer for bad-boy Guendouzi" as Gunners try to offload midfielder

translation.zh: 汽车冲入示威人群，科罗拉多抗议者中枪
translation.en: Car drives through crowd, protester shot in Colorado

translation.zh: 科罗拉多州奥罗拉（美联社）——汽车冲入反种族歧视游行示威人群，一名抗议者在丹佛奥罗拉郊区中枪。
translation.en: AURORA, Colo. (AP) - A car drove through a crowd and a protester was shot in the suburban Denver suburb of Aurora during demonstrations against racial injustice.

translation.zh: 奥罗拉警察局在推特上发布消息称，周六有一辆汽车冲入了在 225 号州际公路上游行的示威人群。
translation.en: The Aurora Police Department said on Twitter that protesters were walking on Interstate 225 Saturday when a vehicle drove through.

translation.zh: 警方表示，一名抗议者开了枪，造成至少一人受伤，中枪者送入医院后伤势稳定。
translation.en: Police said a protester fired a weapon, striking at least one person who was taken to a hospital in stable condition.

translation.zh: 当局称这辆车已被拖走，他们正在对事件展开调查。
translation.en: Authorities said the vehicle was towed and they are investigating.

translation.zh: 警方称，抗议者还打破了法院的窗户，并在一间办公室纵火。
translation.en: Protesters also broke windows to the courthouse and a fire was started in an office, police said.

translation.zh: 当局称该集会为非法集会，警察命令抗议者离开该地区。
translation.en: An unlawful assembly was declared and police ordered protesters to leave the area, authorities said.

translation.zh: 自联邦官员被派往俄勒冈州波特兰镇压示威以来，最近针对种族歧视的抗议活动紧张局势加剧。
translation.en: Tensions have been heightened at recent protests against racial injustice since federal officials were sent to quell demonstrations in Portland, Oregon.

translation.zh: 周六警方宣布西雅图发生骚乱。
translation.en: Police declared a riot in Seattle on Saturday.

translation.zh: 5 月 25 日，明尼苏达州黑人 George Floyd 被一名白人警察用膝盖抵住脖子跪压致死，事件引发的抗议活动也反映出警方存在其他暴力执法现象。
translation.en: Protests sparked by the May 25 death of George Floyd, a black man in Minnesota who died after a white officer held him to the ground with a knee to his neck, have also highlighted other cases of fatal police violence.

translation.zh: 科罗拉多州的抗议者一直在呼吁公众关注 Elijah McClain 的死，此人于 2019 年 8 月在奥罗拉街道上行走时被警察拦住，此前有人打 911 报警称他行迹可疑。
translation.en: In Colorado, protesters have been drawing attention to the death of Elijah McClain, who was stopped by police while walking down an Aurora street in August 2019 after a 911 caller reported him as suspicious.

translation.zh: 警察扣住了他的脖子，医护人员给他注射了 500 毫克的氯胺酮镇静剂。
translation.en: Police placed him in a chokehold, and paramedics administered 500 milligrams of ketamine, a sedative, to calm him down.

translation.zh: 他先是发生心脏骤停，后被宣布脑死亡并摘掉生命维持设备。
translation.en: He went into cardiac arrest, was later declared brain dead and taken off life support.

translation.zh: 工党反犹太主义检举者要求起诉 Corbyn 或开除其党籍
translation.en: Labour anti-Semitism whistleblowers demand Corbyn be expelled or face lawsuit

translation.zh: 报道称，工党或需支付 300 万到 800 万的赔偿金。
translation.en: Labour could have to pay damages of between £3million and £8million, according to reports.

translation.zh: 现任党魁 Keir Starmer 面临开除 Corbyn 党籍的压力。
translation.en: Now leader Keir Starmer is under pressure to expel Mr Corbyn.

translation.zh: 昨晚，有前工党工作人员称，如果 Corbyn 被开除党籍，他们将放弃诉讼。
translation.en: Last night ex-party staff said they would drop the legal action if Mr Corbyn was ejected from the party.

translation.zh: 截至目前，工党仍拒绝对此要求置评。
translation.en: The Labour Party has so far declined to comment on the demand.

translation.zh: 不过，工党议员 Jon Trickett 表示：“这是个荒谬的要求。”
translation.en: However, Labour MP Jon Trickett said: "It is a ridiculous demand."

translation.zh: Corbyn 的支持者称，Starmer 应该重点关注保守党对新冠疫情的应对，而不是重新陷入工党的内部分歧中。
translation.en: Supporters of Mr Corbyn said Mr Starmer needs to focus on tackling the Tories handling on coronavirus instead of delving back into Labour's internal divisions.

translation.zh: 一名前工党人士告诉《每日邮报》，哪怕 Starmer 开除 Corbyn 的党籍，他们还是会提起诉讼。
translation.en: An ex-Labour Party source told the Daily Mail they would take legal action even if Mr Starmer did expel Mr Corbyn.

translation.zh: “我的意思是，他真的，他让工党变得再次有竞争力了。
translation.en: "I mean he's really, he's made the Labour party competitive again.

translation.zh: 他在政策上还有很长的路要走，但他已经有了一个令人印象非常深刻的开端，他已经做到了这种地步，让很多曾经放弃了工党、不再是工党选民的人重新认同工党，并且将他视作一个严肃认真的人物。”
translation.en: "There is still a long way to go on policy but he's made a really impressive start and he's got to a situation where for a lot of people who had really given up on the Labour party, voters as it were, I think they are now looking at it again much more sympathetically and they regard him as a serious figure."

translation.zh: Blair 确实担心工党还被视作只会加税的政党。
translation.en: Mr Blair did have concerns Labour is still seen as the party that raises taxes.

translation.zh: 他说：“根据我的经验，如果你是工党成员，那你在税收问题上就得非常小心，因为公众并不是坐在那里操心你是不是要加税，他们更可能担心你会加税，所以，你得留意这种心态。”
translation.en: He said: "My experience with tax when you're in the Labour Party is be really careful because the public out there aren't sitting there worried as to whether you are going to raise taxes or not, they are probably worried that you are going to raise taxes so you've just got to be mindful of that concern."

translation.zh: 新冠病毒将永久改变世界经济（观点）
translation.en: Covid-19 will permanently change the world's economy (opinion)

translation.zh: 就如 911 事件之后各种安全措施随处可见一样，病毒筛查同样可能成为我们生活的一部分。
translation.en: Virus screening is likely to become part of our life, just like security measures became ubiquitous after 9/11.

translation.zh: 进行必要的基础设施投入以应对未来的病毒检测势在必行。
translation.en: It is important to invest in the infrastructure necessary to detect future viral outbreaks.

translation.zh: 如果新冠病毒免疫只有短期效果，这种投入可以为经济运行提供保障。
translation.en: This investment protects economies in case immunity to Covid-19 turns out to be temporary.

translation.zh: 疫情期间，许多经济体实施了类似于德国“短时工作”（Kurzarbeit）补贴的政策。
translation.en: Many economies adopted versions of Germany's Kurzarbeit (short work) subsidy during the pandemic.

translation.zh: 根据这项政策，工人的工作时间和工资都会相应减少，工资不足部分由政府补贴。
translation.en: This policy keeps workers employed at reduced hours and pay, with the government compensating some of the shortfall in wages.

translation.zh: 这一举措维持着企业与工人之间的纽带，从而为经济快速复苏打下坚实基础。
translation.en: By keeping matches between firms and workers intact, the economy is better prepared for a quick recovery.

translation.zh: 改善政策的实施也很重要，这些政策需要成为经济复苏工具永久的组成部分。
translation.en: It is important to improve the implementation of these policies and make them a permanent part of our economic recovery tool kit.

translation.zh: 远程办公可能会变得越来越普遍。
translation.en: Remote work is likely to become more common.

translation.zh: 有证据表明，居家办公也可以像在办公室工作一样高效。
translation.en: We had some evidence that working from home is at least as productive as working at the office.

translation.zh: 然而，许多公司仍不愿接受远程办公的工作方式。
translation.en: However, many companies were reluctant to embrace remote work.

translation.zh: 既然远程办公已经得到大范围尝试并且取得了良好的效果，那么这种方式可能会持续下去。
translation.en: Now that many have tried it with good results, remote work might be here to stay.

translation.zh: 随着电子商务进一步发展壮大，远程医疗、视频会议、在线教学和金融技术等得到了越来越多的采用，疫情危机也加快了数字化转型的速度。
translation.en: The pandemic crisis has accelerated the pace of digital transformation, with further expansion in e-commerce and increases in the pace of adoption of telemedicine, videoconferencing, online teaching and fintech.

translation.zh: 涉及跨国供应链的公司面对各种短缺和瓶颈焦头烂额。
translation.en: Companies with international supply chains are dealing with shortages and bottlenecks.

translation.zh: 我们可能会看到许多这样的公司将生产迁回本土。
translation.en: We are likely to see many of these companies reshore some of their production.

translation.zh: 遗憾的是，这种趋势并不会创造很多工作机会，因为大多数生产都可能会采用自动化的方式。
translation.en: Unfortunately, this trend will not create many jobs because most of the production is likely to be automated.

translation.zh: 在危机时期发挥出兜底人和投资者的作用后，政府功能也将变得更强大。
translation.en: Governments will be bigger after playing the role of insurer and investor of last resort during the crisis.

translation.zh: 公共债务激增，在全球范围内造成金融影响。
translation.en: Public debt will balloon, creating financial challenges around the world.

translation.zh: 新冠疫情带给我们最大的教训是，所有人要同心协力解决影响全人类的问题。
translation.en: The most important lesson from the Covid-19 pandemic is the importance of working together on problems that affect the entire human race.

translation.zh: 只有团结起来，我们才会战无不胜。
translation.en: We are much stronger united than divided.

translation.zh: 广告牌巨擘要求机场、议会提供折扣
translation.en: Billboard giants push for discounts from airports, councils

translation.zh: oOh!Media 公司于今年早些时候筹集资金，以期在疫情开始影响到广告主时做好财务准备。
translation.en: oOh! Media raised capital earlier this year to provided more financial certainty as the pandemic started to spook advertisers.

translation.zh: 消息人士称，这些公司在讨论如何通过降低运营地点的租金、取消或降低最低收入担保（通常适用于首次签署的合同）等一系列手段来弥补经济消退的影响。
translation.en: Sources said that the companies were discussing ways to offset the large declines through a rent reduction for the sites they operate or through the removal or reduction of a minimum revenue guarantee, which is typically introduced when a deal is first signed.

translation.zh: 一位消息人士指出，大型广告牌企业可能将多达 85% 的预计租金收入用于担保。
translation.en: One source indicated that the large billboard companies may have guaranteed as much as 85 per cent of their revenue projections in rent.

translation.zh: 根据某些合同条款，如果一个地区减少了一定百分比的人口数，他们可以降低最低担保金额，但目前尚不清楚广告牌企业与业主之间签署的现行合同中是否存在这样的条款。
translation.en: Some contracts have clauses that allow them to reduce the minimum guarantee if the amount of people in an area reduces by a certain percentage, but it is unclear whether this condition is in any of the current contracts between the billboard companies and their landlords.

translation.zh: 与此同时，广告牌企业也在通过大幅折扣吸引广告主购买空白广告位，让他们付出的成本发挥出尽可能高的价值。
translation.en: At the same time, the companies are offering large discounts to advertisers to fill available slots on billboards and give them the most value for money possible.

translation.zh: 悉尼中央商务区和外围郊区的广告牌通常包含六个广告位，他们在争取将所有广告位都投入使用。
translation.en: Billboards in Sydney CBD and outer suburbs that typically host six ads are struggling to fill all of the available slots.

translation.zh: 某些地方的广告牌——例如 oOh!media 位于悉尼机场的 40 x 10 米广告牌——进行了升级。
translation.en: But some sites - such as oOh!media's 40 x 10 metre billboard at Sydney Airport - have been upgraded.

translation.zh: oOh!Media 拒绝对此做出评论，但在五月份举行的麦格理澳大利亚会议上，该公司表示节省了超过 2,000 万澳元的固定租金开支。
translation.en: oOh! Media declined to comment, but at a Macquarie Australia conference in May, it flagged more than $20 million in fixed rent expense savings.

translation.zh: 德高集团拒绝对此发表评论。
translation.en: JC Decaux declined to comment.

translation.zh: 广告牌公司许多利润丰厚的广告合同都来自机场和公共交通。
translation.en: Airports and public transport are lucrative advertising contracts for billboard companies.

translation.zh: 根据 2019 年度《户外媒体协会报告》，来自运输业（含机场在内）的营收为 1.694 亿澳元，而来自街道设施广告以及公交车和有轨电车车体广告的营收为 2.665 亿澳元。
translation.en: According to the 2019 Outdoor Media Association Report, revenue from transport - including airports - was $169.4 million while revenue from street furniture and and the outside of buses and trams was $266.5 million.

translation.zh: 德高集团与悉尼机场、雅拉有轨电车、珀斯机场和悉尼公交均订立了合同。
translation.en: JC Decaux business has contracts with Sydney Airport, Yarra Trams, Perth Airport and Sydney Buses.

translation.zh: oOh!Media 在澳洲航空候机厅、悉尼机场外部、阿德莱德机场、达尔文机场以及悉尼和墨尔本的城铁车站内部均设有广告牌。
translation.en: oOh! Media has billboards in areas such as Qantas lounges, outside Sydney airport, Adelaide Airport, Darwin Airport and inside train stations in Sydney and Melbourne.

translation.zh: 疫情期间，墨尔本机场和悉尼城铁的招标已经开始，但还没有做出正式决定。
translation.en: Tenders for Melbourne Airport and Sydney Trains have been taking place during the pandemic and an official decision has not been made.

translation.zh: 作为在澳大利亚签订的第二大机场广告合同，在新冠疫情爆发之前，墨尔本机场的年度合同金额达到了数千万澳元。
translation.en: Melbourne is the second largest airport contract in Australia and pre-coronavirus was worth tens of millions each year.

translation.zh: oOh!Media 二月份发布的全年业绩显示，其“飞行”类别的营收为 6590 万澳元，主要来自悉尼机场。
translation.en: At full year results in February, oOh! Media said it generated $65.9 million from its 'fly' category, which is predominantly made up of revenue from Sydney Airport.

translation.zh: “通勤”类别的营收为 2.348 亿澳元，来自轨道交通合同以及被 oOh!Media 收购之前归属于 Adshel 的街道设施合同。
translation.en: Revenue from 'commute', which is made up of the rail contracts and street furniture previously owned by Adshel before it was bought by oOh!, was $234.8 million.

translation.zh: 根据德高澳大利亚公司提交给澳大利亚证券和投资委员会的 2018 年财务报告，该公司 2018 年来自运输行业的营收为 3770 万澳元。
translation.en: JC Decaux Australia made $37.7 million in revenue from transport in 2018, according to its 2018 financial results filed to the Australian Securities and Investment Commission.

translation.zh: 但是，今年的这两个数字可能会大幅缩水。
translation.en: But both figures are likely to be significantly smaller this year.

translation.zh: Standard Media Index 统计了五家主要的广告代理集团中四家的支出情况，这些数据表明，户外广告市场在六月份缩水了 68％。
translation.en: Standard Media Index figures, which report the spend of four of the five major ad agency groups, said that the outdoor advertising market had plummeted 68 per cent in June.

translation.zh: 相比之下，六月份发布的中期业绩显示，数字广告支出下跌了 37％，城市电台广告支出下跌了 48％。
translation.en: By comparison, interim June results show that digital spending is down 37 per cent, while metropolitan radio had fallen 48 per cent.

translation.zh: 六月份，城市电视台广告支出下跌了 34％，报纸广告支出下跌了 49％，杂志广告支出则下跌了 66％。
translation.en: Metropolitan television fell 34 per cent in June, newspaper spending dropped by 49 per cent and spending in magazines plummeted 66 per cent.

translation.zh: 新冠疫情：来自西班牙的游客需进行隔离
translation.en: Coronavirus: Travellers from Spain told to quarantine

translation.zh: 据最新的新冠期间旅游限令规定，来自西班牙的游客抵达英国境内需进行 14 天的隔离观察。
translation.en: Travellers arriving in the UK from Spain must now quarantine for 14 days, under new coronavirus travel rules.

translation.zh: 新的旅游限令于周六公布，此前，西班牙感染病例突增，截止周五已有超过 900 个新增病例。
translation.en: They were announced on Saturday following a spike in coronavirus cases in Spain, with more than 900 new cases of the virus reported on Friday.

translation.zh: 西班牙各主要城市均存在感染病例上涨趋势，相关官员警告称，将会有第二波病例增长的情况发生。
translation.en: Spanish officials have also warned a second wave could be imminent as major cities have seen cases surge.

translation.zh: 包括英国航空公司在内的相关企业均表达了对新政策的不满，认为这是对英国度假者的“又一次打击”。
translation.en: Airlines including British Airways have criticised the new measures as "yet another blow" to British holidaymakers.

translation.zh: 英国运输部建议目前在西班牙旅游的民众遵守当地规定，可正常回国，并前往外交部旅行建议网站了解更多信息。
translation.en: People currently on holiday in Spain have been advised by the Department of Transport to follow the local rules, return home as normal, and check the Foreign Office's travel advice website for further information.

translation.zh: 外交部的建议适用于所有旅游的民众，尤其针对前往西班牙大陆的游客，但隔离的对象只包括从西班牙大陆、加那利群岛以及马略卡岛和伊比沙岛等巴利阿里群岛返回的人。
translation.en: The Foreign Office is advising against all but essential travel to mainland Spain, however the quarantine measures apply to those returning from mainland Spain, the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, such as Majorca and Ibiza.

translation.zh: 外交部的建议对旅游保险也有一定影响。
translation.en: Foreign Office advice has ramifications for travel insurance.

translation.zh: 运输大臣 Grant Shapps 也受到了新限令的影响。他于周六开始在西班牙度假，
translation.en: Among those affected by the new rules is Transport Secretary Grant Shapps, who began his holiday in Spain on Saturday.

translation.zh: 预计他将按计划继续旅行，并在回国后根据相关指示进行隔离。
translation.en: He is expected to continue his trip as planned and isolate in line with guidance on his return.

translation.zh: 针对英国旅客的隔离措施最初于六月初公布。
translation.en: Quarantine measures for UK travellers were first introduced in early June.

translation.zh: 但迫于航空和旅游行业的压力，政府及下属行政部门又公布了不受隔离规定影响的国家和地区的清单。
translation.en: But after pressure from the aviation and travel industries, the government and devolved administrations published lists of countries exempt from the rules.

translation.zh: 尽管英国航空公司称其航班作业仍会照常进行，但该公司表示对政府旅行建议和规定的最新变化感到“失望”，
translation.en: British Airways said it was "disappointed" about the latest changes to the government's travel advice and rules, although the airline said its flights were continuing to operate.

translation.zh: 认为此举将“扰乱数千万英国人的旅行计划”。
translation.en: It said the move was "throwing thousands of Britons' travel plans into chaos."

translation.zh: 英国机场运营协会认为新措施将“进一步摧毁航空行业才重启不久的脆弱经济，而整个行业将继续面临史上最大的挑战”。
translation.en: The Airport Operators Association said the new measures would "further damage what is already a fragile restart of the aviation sector which continues to face the biggest challenge in its history."

translation.zh: 英国最大的旅游公司途易 (TUI) 取消了周六前往西班牙大陆和加那利群岛的航班。
translation.en: The UK's biggest tour operator, Tui, cancelled its flights due to depart to mainland Spain and the Canary Islands on Sunday.

translation.zh: 目前正在度假的游客仍然可以乘坐计划的航班回国。
translation.en: Customers currently on holiday will be able to return on their intended flight home.

translation.zh: 但是，廉价航空易捷航空公司 (EasyJet) 称其非常“失望”并会在之后几天将航班排满。
translation.en: However, budget airline EasyJet said it was "disappointed" and would operate a full schedule in the coming days.

translation.zh: 该公司在一份声明中表示，“不想继续旅行的乘客可以转机，且无需支付改签费，或者也可以选择与订票金额等价的代金券”。
translation.en: "Customers who no longer wish to travel can transfer their flights without a change fee or receive a voucher for the value of the booking," the company said in a statement.

translation.zh: 英国旅行社协会 (ABTA) 的发言人也对政府的隔离规定感到“失望”：
translation.en: A spokesman for the Association of British Travel Agents (Abta) said the government's quarantine rule change was "disappointing."

translation.zh: “我们建议政府放宽对往返低感染率地区的限制，或者针对像巴利阿里群岛或加那利群岛这种地理上明显不同于西班牙大陆的地区的限制，从而避免加剧英国出入境旅游行业的现状。”
translation.en: "We suggest the government considers lifting the quarantine rules for flights to and from certain regions with lower infection rates, or to places such as the Balearic Islands or the Canaries - which are geographically distinct from mainland Spain - to avoid further damage to the UK inbound and outbound tourism industries," he said.

translation.zh: 目前，西班牙已有超过 28,000 例死亡病例，
translation.en: Spain has so far seen more than 28,000 coronavirus deaths.

translation.zh: 周四的新增病例数量是解除封锁后单日新增最多的一次。
translation.en: On Thursday, it saw the biggest daily increase in infections since its lockdown ended.

translation.zh: 加泰罗尼亚是最后一处将对人们夜生活进行限制的地区。
translation.en: Catalonia has become the latest region to crack down on nightlife.

translation.zh: 巴塞罗那所属的东北富人区下令关闭所有夜间俱乐部两周，并在巴塞罗那更广泛的地区实行午夜宵禁。
translation.en: The wealthy north-east region, which is home to Barcelona, ordered all nightclubs to close for two weeks and put a midnight curfew on bars in the greater Barcelona area.
