translation.zh: 据 BBC 驻马德里记者 Guy Hedgecoe 报道，病毒在年轻群体中传播的情况尤其令人担忧，因为到了晚上，他们就会在各城市大规模聚集。
translation.en: The BBC's Guy Hedgecoe in Madrid says contagion among young people is a particular worry, as they have been gathering in large numbers in cities at night.

translation.zh: 法国已警告其公民不要前往加泰罗尼亚旅行，挪威也称将对来自西班牙的人进行隔离。
translation.en: France has warned its citizens not to travel to Catalonia while Norway has said it will start quarantining people arriving from Spain.

translation.zh: 目前，政府也在敦促雇主“体谅从西班牙回国且需要自我隔离的员工”。
translation.en: The government is urging employers to be "understanding of those returning from Spain who now will need to self-isolate."

translation.zh: 然而，工党影子内政大臣 Nick Thomas-Symonds 呼吁政府解释具体将如何帮助受影响的人，并补充说新规定将“很大程度上影响留在西班牙的家庭以及计划旅行的家庭”。
translation.en: But Labour's shadow home secretary Nick Thomas-Symonds called for the government to explain in detail how it would support those affected, adding that the news would be "deeply concerning for families who are in caught in Spain or are planning travel."

translation.zh: 苏格兰首席大臣 Nicola Sturgeon 在推文中表示，这是在回顾了周六早些时候的最新数据后做出的决定。
translation.en: Scottish First Minister Nicola Sturgeon tweeted that the decision was made after reviewing the latest data earlier on Saturday.

translation.zh: 她说：“要强调的一点就是，情况在短期内会发生变化，所以我建议不要进行不必要的境外旅行”。
translation.en: "This reinforces the point that these matters are subject to change at short notice and so my advice is to be cautious about non-essential foreign travel," she said.

translation.zh: 来自汉普郡的 John Blackmore 原本计划同妻子和两个孩子一起到西班牙见自己的家人。
translation.en: John Blackmore, from Hampshire, was due to fly out to his family in Spain with his wife and two young children.

translation.zh: 但新规定实施后，因为担心回国后妻子的雇主不愿意接受她进行为期两周的隔离，所以不得将行程取消。
translation.en: But the new rules mean he has had to cancel, for fears his wife's employer would not be able to accommodate her taking an extra two weeks off to quarantine on their return.

translation.zh: 他认为取消航班可能不会获得退款，因为他们现在都还没能成功退票。
translation.en: He said he thought it was unlikely they would get a refund for the flight, as it has not been cancelled.

translation.zh: “我现在真的很绝望”，他对 BBC 记者说，
translation.en: "I'm devastated," he told the BBC.

translation.zh: “我在西班牙的父母自从圣诞节后就没见过自己的孙子了。”
translation.en: "I have family in Spain who haven't seen their only grandkids since Christmas."

translation.zh: 南约克郡的 Lois Stothard 告诉 BBC 记者，她订了去塞维利亚的机票，准备在他男朋友 30 岁生日时给他一个惊喜，航班将在周日早上起飞，但现在她估计无法按计划出行了。
translation.en: Lois Stothard, from South Yorkshire, told the BBC she had booked a holiday to Seville as a surprise for her boyfriend's 30th birthday - due to fly out on Sunday morning - but now feels that she cannot travel.

translation.zh: “我是一名老师，关键行业的从业人员，而且我男朋友工作很忙，所以我们不可能回国后进行 14 天隔离”，她说，
translation.en: "I'm a keyworker - I'm a teacher - and my boyfriend has work commitments so we cannot quarantine for 14 days when we return," she said.

translation.zh: “我们拿不到退款，而且改签的话航空公司要求我们支付两倍的价钱。我真的很失望很苦恼，我们明明都收拾好行李准备出发了。“
translation.en: "We can't get any money back and to change the company want double what I've already paid in fees. I'm very disappointed and upset as we're packed and ready to go."

translation.zh: 金靴奖得主 Jamie Vardy 称莱斯特城已实现入围欧联的目标
translation.en: Leicester happy to hit target of European football says Golden Boot winner Jamie Vardy

translation.zh: Jamie Vardy 表示，虽然莱斯特城止步欧冠令其惋惜，但已实现赛季初进军欧洲联赛的目标。
translation.en: Jamie Vardy acknowledged his disappointment at missing out on Champions League football, but said Leicester City achieved their early-season objective of qualifying for Europe.

translation.zh: 莱斯特城（绰号“狐狸”）12 月时稳坐联赛榜第二位，在次循环联赛中落回第三位，因在英超最近五场比赛中仅拿下 4 分，最终跌至第五位。
translation.en: The Foxes were second in December and third when football restarted after lockdown, but they took just four points from their last five games to finish fifth in the Premier League.

translation.zh: 如果莱斯特城能在最后一场比赛战胜曼联，可确保其位列联赛榜前四，但莱斯特城 0:2 不敌曼联， Vardy 也坦言十分惋惜。
translation.en: A final-day win over Manchester United would have secured a top-four finish, but Brendan Rodgers" side suffered a 2-0 loss, which Vardy says was the most upsetting aspect.

translation.zh: 他在天空体育台的采访中表示：“我感到十分失望，特别是我们输掉比赛的方式。
translation.en: "It was disappointing, more the way we've ended up losing the game," he said on Sky Sports at full-time.

translation.zh: 但就像我们在更衣室里说的，我们的目标是入围欧联，而且我们也确实做到了。
translation.en: "But we've said in the dressing room, we targeted behind closed doors to qualify for Europe and we've done that.

translation.zh: 当然，如果能杀入欧冠自然是锦上添花，我们之后会汲取经验教训，争取在来年以更好的状态回归。
translation.en: "We had the chance to qualify for the Champions League and that was even better, but we'll reflect on it and come back stronger next year.

translation.zh: 虽然这场比赛的失利让我们不太好受，但是我们的主要目标是晋级欧联，而且已经成功入围。”
translation.en: "It's hard to take, but our main target was Europe and we've managed to do that."

translation.zh: 尽管球队的整体表现不佳，但 Vardy 在本次英超联赛中打进 23 球，以 33 岁之龄斩获本赛季金靴奖。
translation.en: While his team fell short, Vardy himself ended the season as the Premier League's top scorer at 33 years of age, scoring 23 times.

translation.zh: 领奖时，他向队友致敬并表示，尽管年龄越来越大，但在顶级联赛中仍有很长的路要走。
translation.en: He paid tribute to his team-mates in receiving the award and said there are still plenty of miles left in him at the top level, despite his advancing age.

translation.zh: 他说道：“我很高兴能和他们成为队友。如果没有他们，我无法实现目标，更不会站在这个领奖台上。
translation.en: "I'm delighted, it's all about the team. I wouldn't have been in the position I was for the goals without them and I've put quite a few away.

translation.zh: 我会短暂休息一段时间，然后开始为下一个赛季做准备。
translation.en: "I'll have a rest for a bit now and come back for next season ready to go.

translation.zh: 对我而言，年龄并没有对我造成太大影响，我的腿依然很健康，而且也没有受太多伤，我需要做的就是继续保持，然后以最好的状态迎接明年的比赛。”
translation.en: Fortunately I don't feel my age, my legs are still fine and touch wood I don't pick up many injuries, so it's about keeping on top of that and come back as strong as I can next year."

translation.zh: ‘发生了什么情况？！’ 终极格斗冠军赛 (UFC) 拳手 Correia 误以为回合结束，转身时遭到对手连击（视频）——RT 电视台体育新闻
translation.en: 'What happened there?!' UFC fighter Correia gets pummelled after turning back on rival mistakenly thinking round is over (VIDEO) - RT Sport News

translation.zh: 巴西雏量级拳手 Bethe Correia 在 UFC 身经百战，却在格斗岛与 Pannie Kianzad 对垒时发生业余失误——她误以为回合已经结束，转身把后背暴露给了对手，因此遭受连击。
translation.en: Brazilian bantamweight Bethe Correia is a UFC veteran but made an amateur error by turning her back on opponent Pannie Kianzad and mistakenly thinking the round was over in their bout on Fight Island, and got tagged as a result.

translation.zh: 这场一决胜负之战在阿布扎比开打，第一回合快要结束时，现年 37 岁的 Correia 似乎把 10 秒警告误当作是回合结束，她举高一只手转身背朝 Kianzad 走向自己的一角。
translation.en: Coming to the end of the first stanza of their showdown on the undercard in Abu Dhabi, the 37-year-old Correia appeared to mistake the 10-second warning for the actual end of the round, reaching out a glove before turning her back on Kianzad and making her way back to her corner.

translation.zh: 瑞典拳手毫不犹豫地出手，先用右手连击，然后挥出一系列长拳将 Correia 逼到笼边。
translation.en: The Swedish fighter capitalized without hesitation, tagging her opponent with a right hand before following up with a series of blows to back Correia against the cage.

translation.zh: 巴西选手陷入短暂危险后重新获得控制权，在回合真正结束之前将 Kianzad 击倒在地。
translation.en: Momentarily appearing in danger, the Brazilian then regained control to stifle the threat and back Kianzad up before the actual end of the round was called.

translation.zh: “发生了什么情况？天哪”， ESPN+ 解说员发出惊呼。
translation.en: "What happened there? Oh my word," the commentary team on ESPN+ were heard exclaiming.

translation.zh: 对于前雏量级挑战者 Correia 而言，这个令人沮丧的夜晚还没有结束，最终裁判一致判定她挑战失败，这也是过去四场比赛中的第三次失利，总成绩变成 11 胜 5 负 1 平。
translation.en: It was just one part of a frustrating night for former bantamweight title challenger Correia, who went down to a unanimous decision defeat which is her third loss in her past four octagon outings and leaves her overall record at 11-5, with one draw.

translation.zh: 生于伊朗的 Kianzad 今年 28 岁，这是她继 11 月在莫斯科 UFC 格斗之夜击败 Jessica-Rose Clark 之后取得的又一次胜利。
translation.en: For the Iranian-born Kianzad, 28, it was a second win on the spin following her victory over Jessica-Rose Clark at UFC Fight Night in Moscow back in November.

translation.zh: Kianzad 目前的整体战绩为 13 胜 5 负，UFC 战绩为 2 胜 1 负，这位外号“Banzai”的女拳手希望提升自己的雏量级（135 磅）排名。
translation.en: Kianzad is now 13-5 overall and 2-1 in the UFC, as the woman known as 'Banzai' aims to shift up the 135lbs rankings.

translation.zh: 当晚其他比赛中：澳大利亚的 Robert Whittaker 在中量级主要赛事中险胜英格兰选手 Darren Till；俄罗斯出生的拳手 Khamzat Chimaev 十天内在格斗岛赢得两场比赛，创下现代 UFC 比赛中两场胜利间隔时间最短的记录。
translation.en: Elsewhere on the night, Australia's Robert Whittaker edged out England's Darren Till in the middleweight main event, while Russian-born fighter Khamzat Chimaev made history by winning a second bout in 10 days on Fight Island, the shortest-ever period between victories in the modern-era UFC.

translation.zh: Rahul Gandhi 呼吁人民在拉贾斯坦邦事件上支持其政党
translation.en: Rahul Gandhi Goes To People On Rajasthan Issue

translation.zh: 今天，印度国民大会党的 Rahul Gandhi 在推特上发布了一段视频，希望鼓动人民在拉贾斯坦邦事件上反对印度人民党 (BJP)。
translation.en: Congress's Rahul Gandhi tweeted a video today attempting to mobilise the people against the BJP over the events in Rajasthan.

translation.zh: 他用印地语发的帖子带上了 #为民主发声 (#SpeakUpForDemocracy) 的标签，呼吁人民“团结起来，为民主发声”。
translation.en: Using hashtag #SpeakUpForDemocracy, his Hindia post urged the people to "Unite and raise our voice for democracy."

translation.zh: 国民大会党计划于周一在全国范围内就拉贾斯坦邦的局势进行抗议，Ashok Gehlot 政府在该地区摇摇欲坠。
translation.en: The Congress is planning a countrywide protest on Monday over the situation in Rajasthan, where the Ashok Gehlot government is struggling to survive.

translation.zh: 国民大会党称，他们将在总统府，也就是总统 Ram Nath Kovind 的官邸外举行一场抗议活动。
translation.en: While the party said a protest will be held outside the Rashtrapati Bhavan, the official residence of President Ram Nath Kovind.

translation.zh: 在视频里，国民大会党指责人民党在举国上下对抗疫情之际“撕毁宪法、践踏民主”。
translation.en: In the video, the Congress has accused the BJP of "Ripping up the constitution and demolishing democracy" while the whole country is fighting the coronavirus.

translation.zh: 国民大会党称，他们在中央邦也做出了同样的事情。
translation.en: It has done the same in Madhya Pradesh, the Congress said.

translation.zh: 国民大会党在视频里说：“我们要求立即召开议会会议，这是宪法赋予我们的权利。”
translation.en: "We demand to immediately convene an assembly session which is within our constitutional rights," the party said in the video.

translation.zh: 拉贾斯坦邦州长 Kalraj Mishra 驳回了一个提议召开议会会议的提案。
translation.en: Rajasthan Governor Kalraj Mishra has turned down one proposal to start an assembly session.

translation.zh: 第二个提案于今天提交，Kalraj Mishra 表示还在进行审核。
translation.en: A second one was submitted today which he said he is examining.

translation.zh: 自从 Gehlot 的副手 Sachin Pilot 带着支持他的一众立法议会会员叛变后，Gehlot 的政府便陷入巨大的危机中。
translation.en: Mr Gehlot's government has been in deep crisis after his deputy Sachin Pilot turned rebel with a chunk of MLAs supporting him.

translation.zh: 国民大会党一直无法取消叛变者在议会的资格，因此无法将其人数减少到议会的多数票以下。
translation.en: The party has been unable to disqualify the rebels to bring down the majority mark in the assembly.

translation.zh: Pilot 在党内和政府中的职位已经被剥夺，拉贾斯坦邦高等法院暂时没有取消他的资格，认为在他的权力范围上存在更大的合宪性争议，在得出结论前议长也不能采取任何行动。
translation.en: Mr Pilot -- who was stripped of his posts in the party and the government -- has been given temporary relief from disqualification by the Rajasthan High Court, which held that the Speaker cannot take any action until the larger constitutional question about his powers is decided.

translation.zh: 明天，高等法院将审理该争议问题，还将就法院能否干涉议长决定的问题作出裁决。
translation.en: That question will be taken up tomorrow by the Supreme Court, which will also decide whether a court can interfere with the Speaker's decisions.

translation.zh: 在 200 名成员的议会中，国民大会党的得票只比多数票多出一票。
translation.en: The Congress stands only one past the majority mark in the 200-member assembly.

translation.zh: Pilot 的团队声称获得了 30 名立法议会成员的支持，但截至目前，有确凿证据的只有 19 票。
translation.en: Team Pilot claims the support of 30 MLAs, but so far, the evidence points to only 19.

translation.zh: 人民党获得 72 人支持，加上盟友和独立议员，共有 97 票。
translation.en: The BJP has 72 and including allies and Independents, it stands at 97.

translation.zh: 如果法院裁决有利于 Pilot，国民大会党将失去其组建的第二个政府，2018 年议会选举后，国民大会党在中部各州共组建了三个政府。
translation.en: If the court decides in favour of Mr Pilot, the Congress can lose the second of the three governments it formed in the heartland states following the 2018 assembly elections.

translation.zh: 3 月，Jyotiraditya Scindia 带着支持他的 22 名议会成员加入人民党，导致国民大会党以 Kamal Nath 为首的中央邦政府倒台。
translation.en: In March, it lost the Kamal Nath-led government in Madhya Pradesh after Jyotiraditya Scindia joined the BJP with 22 of his MLAs.

translation.zh: 西雅图示威频发：成千上万抗议者走上街头，城市火光四起
translation.en: Seattle Protests: Fires and Pepper Spray as Thousands March Through City

translation.zh: 西雅图——俄勒冈州波特兰的抗议者与联邦当局之间的冲突升级，几周之后，西雅图约 2,000 人上街游行，与警方发生冲突。
translation.en: SEATTLE - After weeks of escalating confrontations between protesters and federal authorities in Portland, Ore., a crowd of about 2,000 people mobilized in Seattle on Saturday, marching through the streets and clashing with the police.

translation.zh: 警方表示有三名警员受伤，其中一名因爆炸物造成腿伤入院，截至傍晚，有 16 名抗议者被捕。
translation.en: Three police officers were injured, including one who was hospitalized with a leg injury caused by an explosive, and 16 protesters were arrested as of early evening, the police said.

translation.zh: 抗议者手举“联邦走狗滚回家”之类的标语，高呼“没有正义就没有和平”口号，他们在还在建设中的青年拘留所停下并向建筑物纵火。一部分人打砸了附近企业的窗户。
translation.en: Carrying signs such as "Feds Go Home" and shouting chants of "No justice, no peace," the protesters stopped at the site of a future youth detention center and lit buildings there on fire. Some smashed windows of nearby businesses.

translation.zh: 警方在国会山附近与示威人群对峙，使用了闪光弹和胡椒喷雾并拘捕了多名抗议者。
translation.en: The police confronted the crowd in the Capitol Hill neighborhood, deploying flash grenades and pepper spray before they began taking people into custody.

translation.zh: 华盛顿州柯克兰 52 岁的 Bipasha Mukherjee 表示，从五月份以来她一直在街头抗议，警方采取如此强硬的战术让她深感担忧。
translation.en: Bipasha Mukherjee, 52, of Kirkland, Wash., said she has been protesting on the streets since May and said it was worrisome to her to see such aggressive tactics by the police.

translation.zh: Mukherjee 女士 30 多年前从印度来到这里，她说，“这里不再是我移民时来到的那个国家，我感觉这个国家正在迅速变成一个法西斯主义国家、一个警察国家。”
translation.en: "This is not the country I immigrated to," said Ms. Mukherjee, who arrived from India more than 30 years ago. "It feels like we are rapidly becoming a fascist state and a police state."

translation.zh: 西雅图的 Michaud Savage 说抗议活动既针对地方当局，也针对镇压了一次波特兰大型抗议活动的联邦警察。Savage 说波特兰的执法人员使用了催泪瓦斯和人群控制弹药，批评这种方式危险且不合时宜。
translation.en: Michaud Savage of Seattle said the protests were aimed at both local authorities and the deployment of federal officers who have waged a crackdown against a long-running protest in Portland. Mr. Savage said the law enforcement tactics in Portland, which have included the use of tear gas and crowd-control munitions, were dangerous and inappropriate.

translation.zh: Savage 一边冲洗被喷射胡椒喷雾的双眼和包扎被闪光弹划出一道伤口的手臂，一边说，“事情飞快地在向着极端暴力的方向发展。”
translation.en: "It's a very hard slide in an extremely violent direction," Mr. Savage said as he washed his eyes of pepper spray and nursed a wound on his arm from a flash grenade.

translation.zh: 五月份，明尼阿波利斯的 George Floyd 在警方控制下身亡，事件引发大规模抗议活动，数十万人走上了几十个城市的大街小巷，但大多数城市的游行示威活动有所降温。
translation.en: The death of George Floyd in police custody in Minneapolis in May ignited mass protests that drew millions to the streets in dozens of cities, but those demonstrations have waned in most cities.

translation.zh: 然而，西雅图和波特兰的示威仍在持续。西雅图抗议者声称对国会山附近的几个街区拥有主权，并宣布建立自治区。一系列枪击事件在该地发生之后，警察清理了该地区，抗议活动平息。
translation.en: Seattle and Portland, however, have seen extended demonstrations. Seattle protesters at one point laid claim to several blocks of the Capitol Hill neighborhood and declared an autonomous zone. After a series of shootings there led the police to clear the area, protests had subsided.

translation.zh: 与此同时，波特兰的抗议活动还在继续，其中最激烈的抗议活动发生在该市联邦建筑周围。在 Trump 总统签发了保护雕像和联邦财产的行政命令后，国土安全部向该市派遣了战术小队，引发一系列造成抗议者受伤的冲突，监察长介入调查，地方官员呼吁联邦特工离开。
translation.en: Portland, meanwhile, has continued protesting, with some of the heaviest protests around federal buildings in the city. After President Trump issued an executive order to protect statues and federal property, the Department of Homeland Security deployed tactical teams to the city, beginning a series of clashes that have resulted in injured protesters, inspector general investigations and calls from local leaders for federal agents to leave.

translation.zh: 该市的抗议者人数增长到了数千人，示威活动仍在持续。本周，联邦官员往西雅图派遣了一个战术小队，抗议者称这也是他们周六进行抗议的其中一个原因。
translation.en: Protest crowds in that city have swelled into the thousands, and demonstrations there were continuing. This week, federal officials deployed a tactical team to Seattle, and protesters cited that development as one reason for Saturday's demonstrations.

translation.zh: 波特兰的抗议活动集中在市中心，而周六的示威游行则覆盖联邦法院所在的市中心以东的地区。
translation.en: While the Portland protests have centered in downtown, the demonstrations on Saturday roamed areas east of the downtown core, where the city's federal courthouse is.

translation.zh: 堪萨斯市长欢迎联邦协助破案 但对 Trump 动机表示担心
translation.en: Kansas City mayor welcomes federal help in solving murders, but worries about Trump's motives

translation.zh: 周日，堪萨斯城市长 Quinton Lucas 质疑了总统 Trump 向美国各城市派遣联邦执法人员的动机，表示虽然他欢迎联邦协助调查发生在该中西部城市的多起谋杀案，但他认为此举的主要目的还是为了增加 Trump 的连任机会。
translation.en: Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas questioned on Sunday President Trump's motives for sending federal agents into U.S. cities - saying that while he would welcome the help in solving a slew of murders in the Midwestern city, he thinks the move could be more about buoying Trump's reelection chances.

translation.zh: 民主党人 Lucas 在《福克斯周日新闻》节目上谈到最近因种族不平等和警察暴力而引发的抗议活动，表示：“本周，总统提及有关 George Floyd 之死的抗议活动，以及‘黑人的命也是命’的人权运动，我对此感到非常失望。”
translation.en: "I was pretty frustrated this week [that] the president mentioned the George Floyd protests, mentioned the Black Lives Matter movement," Lucas, a Democrat, said on "Fox News Sunday" of the recent protests over racial inequality and police brutality.

translation.zh: “堪萨斯城的情况不一样。和去年相比，我们的案子增多了，（但）我们真正需要的是联邦政府能够帮助我们解决一些悬案。”
translation.en: "That is not the case in Kansas City. We've had year-over-year increases [but] what we need help on is actually clearing some of the unsolved murders."

translation.zh: Lucas 补充道：“让我们尽量把重点放在解决谋杀案上……我觉得，如果你听了最近的发言……就知道我们很乐意在一定范围内与联邦执法人员合作。”
translation.en: Lucas added: "Let's try to have a pinpointed and targeted focus on solving murders...I think if you listen to recent statements... we are happy to work with federal agents in a limited scope."

translation.zh: Lucas 表示，他愿意让联邦执法人员与当地执法部门合作。但是，联邦执法人员在俄勒冈州波特兰市采取的措施引发争议，而 Trump 的言论导致很多本区选民对于联邦执法人员出现在大街小巷一事感到担忧。
translation.en: Despite his willingness to have federal agents work with local law enforcement, Lucas said that Trump's rhetoric - specifically in light of the controversy surrounding the tactics employed in Portland, Ore., by the federal agents - has caused many of his constituents to voice concern about the presence of agents on the city streets.

translation.zh: 他说道：“我们不希望联邦执法人员对本就群情激愤的政治事件火上浇油。”
translation.en: "What we don't need is more fuel on the fire from federal agents to make, I think, an exciting political issue," he said.

translation.zh: 周三，特朗普宣布向芝加哥市派遣 100 名联邦执法人员，帮助当地应对部分犯罪行为增多的问题，Trump 称自己为代表“法律与秩序”的总统，而派遣联邦执法人员的举动也标志着白宫加大对地方执法的干预力度。
translation.en: Trump on Wednesday announced that he was deploying 100 federal agents to Chicago to help combat rising rates of some crimes - a move that marks an expansion of the White House's intervention into local law enforcement as Trump continues to position himself as the "law and order" president.

translation.zh: Trump 周三宣布向芝加哥等城市派遣大批联邦执法人员的举动是“莱金德行动” (Operation Legend) 的一部分，该行动是以 4 岁男孩 LeGend Taliferro 的名字命名，上月底，他在位于堪萨斯城的家中睡觉时遭到枪击，不幸死亡。
translation.en: The "surge" of agents announced on Wednesday to Chicago and other American cities is part of Operation Legend - named after 4-year-old LeGend Taliferro, who was fatally shot while sleeping in a Kansas City apartment late last month.

translation.zh: 此前也发生过派遣联邦执法人员协助地方执法部门的情况，去年 12 月，美国司法部长 Bill Barr 也曾因暴力犯罪激增而向七个城市派遣大量联邦执法人员，然而，此举还是引发了各州选民和当地立法者对派遣人员类型及其采取措施的担忧。
translation.en: While sending federal agents to aid local law enforcement is not unprecedented - Attorney General Bill Barr announced a similar surge effort in December for seven cities that had seen spiking violence - the type of federal agent being sent, and some of their tactics, have raised concerns among state and local lawmakers.

translation.zh: 纽约、波特兰等立法者都公开反对 Trump 政府向他们的城市派遣联邦执法人员，特别是有报道称，身份不明的联邦执法人员在波特兰拘留了抗议者，用没有警方标志的车辆将他们带走。
translation.en: A number of lawmakers from New York to Portland have spoken out against the Trump administration sending the agents to their cities, especially following reports that unidentified federal agents detained protesters in Portland and took them away in unmarked vehicles.

translation.zh: 5 月 25 日，George Floyd 被明尼阿波利斯市警方拘留后死亡，从那以后，波特兰几乎每天都有反对警察暴力执法和系统性种族主义的示威活动。
translation.en: Portland has been hit with near-daily demonstrations against police brutality and systemic racism since the death of George Floyd while in Minneapolis police custody on May 25.

translation.zh: 当地政府也抱怨称，联邦执法人员的激增只会加剧紧张态势，刑事司法专家表示，此举令人无法理解，因为美国正处于不寻常的时期：疫情、失业率创历史新高、大规模对种族主义的反思，以及对警察针对有色人种态度的反思。
translation.en: Local authorities also have complained that the surges have only exacerbated tensions, and criminal justice experts say the efforts defy explanation because of the unprecedented moment America is living through - with a pandemic, historic unemployment and a mass reckoning over racism and how people of color are treated by police.

translation.zh: 苏格兰政府设立 1,000 万英镑资金资助赛事活动
translation.en: £10m fund set up to support Scottish events

translation.zh: 疫情封锁期间受影响的文化、社区、体育活动组织者将获得财政资助。
translation.en: Organisers of cultural, community and sporting events are to be offered financial support while they remain affected by lockdown restrictions.

translation.zh: 苏格兰政府的 1,000 万英镑资助计划同样旨在帮助各活动供应商。
translation.en: The Scottish government's £10m funding package also aims to help event suppliers.

translation.zh: 苏格兰政府表示，目前他们正着眼于寻找未来安全恢复各项活动的方法。
translation.en: The government said it was looking at how events could restart safely in the future.

translation.zh: 财政大臣 Fiona Hyslop 认为，新冠疫情对各项活动造成“灾难性的影响”。
translation.en: Economy Secretary Fiona Hyslop said the coronavirus pandemic had had a "devastating impact" on the sector.

translation.zh: 为防止新冠病毒传播而采取的限制措施，使得苏格兰的节日活动和高地运动会等体育赛事均受到影响。
translation.en: Scotland's festival scene and sporting events such as the Highland games have been among those affected by restrictions brought in to prevent the spread of Covid-19.

translation.zh: Hyslop 女士表示：“虽然我们迈出了积极的一步，比如汽车影院得以恢复，但多数行业一段时间内还无法运营。
translation.en: Ms Hyslop said: "Whilst we've had the positive step that drive-in events can resume, most of the sector will be unable to operate for some time to come.

translation.zh: 我们与行业内组织者展开了密切且富有建设性的合作，针对各自面临的挑战，他们提出了一些如何安全运营的创造性方案。
translation.en: "We've worked closely and constructively with the sector on the challenges they face and they have brought forward some creative ideas on how they can begin to operate safely.

translation.zh: 除了直接提供资助外，资金的一部分还将用于促进创新和维持赛事活动的长期恢复。”
translation.en: "In addition to providing immediate support, some of this funding will look to bolster innovation and aid the longer-term recovery of the events industry."

translation.zh: Event Industry Advisory Group 认为，该行业是最早受封锁限制的领域，也将是最晚得以全面解除限制的领域之一。
translation.en: The Event Industry Advisory Group said the sector had been one of the first to go into lockdown and would be among the last to fully emerge from it.

translation.zh: 该集团董事长 Peter Duthie 同时也兼任格拉格斯证券交易委员会执行长官的一职，他表示，赛事活动每年为苏格兰带来近 60 亿英镑的收益。
translation.en: Chairman Peter Duthie, who is also chief executive of the SEC in Glasgow, said events contributed about £6bn each year to Scotland's economy.

translation.zh: 他说：“政府额外为该行业拨款十分必要，并且得到赛事活动组织者及众多相关供应链企业的广泛支持，他们在长期的封锁限制中均遭受了严重的经济损失。”
translation.en: He said: "Additional funding from government for this important sector is very welcome and much needed, both by the event organisers and the wider supply chain businesses who are being hit exceptionally hard by the ongoing effect of an extended period of lockdown."

translation.zh: Shivraj Singh Chouhan 确诊感染新冠肺炎
translation.en: Shivraj Singh Chouhan On Testing Covid Positive

translation.zh: 中央邦首席部长 Shivraj Singh Chouhan 周六证实，他的新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性，他在周日上午发布的推文中称自己“没事”，并赞扬了奋战在抗疫第一线的工作人员。
translation.en: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan, who on Saturday confirmed he had tested positive for COVID-19, tweeted Sunday morning to say that he is "fine" and to offer his praise for front-line workers in the war on coronavirus.

translation.zh: 首席部长还重复了他在昨天发出的警告，呼吁大家遵守防疫指导方针，例如保持社交距离和戴口罩。
translation.en: The Chief Minister also repeated his warnings from yesterday, when he urged people to follow guidelines, such as social distancing and the use of face masks.

translation.zh: “朋友们，我没事。抗疫战士们冒着生命危险，无私奉献，他们都值得赞扬。我向全国所有抗疫战士们致敬，” Chouhan 在博帕尔的 Chirayu 医院发推文如是说，他于昨天被收治入院。
translation.en: "I am fine, my friends. The dedication of coronavirus warriors, who selflessly risk their lives, is praiseworthy. I salute all coronavirus warriors of the state," Mr Chouhan tweeted from Bhopal's Chirayu Hospital, where he was admitted yesterday.

translation.zh: “保持两米的距离，勤洗手，戴口罩——这就是我们抗击冠状病毒最有效的武器，”他说，“我希望所有人都能够利用这些武器保护自己和家人。”
translation.en: "Keep two metres distance, wash your hands frequently and wear face masks - these are the biggest weapons we have to avoid the coronavirus. I appeal to all people - use these weapons for yourself and your loved ones," he said.

translation.zh: Chouhan 最后补充说：“大家都小心一点，希望你们都平安健康。这也是我向神祈祷的内容。”
translation.en: "All of you be careful, stay safe and healthy. This is what I pray to God," Mr Chouhan added.

translation.zh: 周六，Chouhan 在推特上说，他的病毒检测结果呈阳性，尽管他已经尽了最大的努力避免这种情况的发生，他警告称，“一点点的疏忽大意都可能会感染上冠状病毒”。
translation.en: On Saturday Mr Chouhan had tweeted that he had tested positive for the virus despite his best efforts to avoid infection and warned that "just a little carelessness invites the coronavirus."

translation.zh: 今天早上，Chouhan 在推特上说，虽然感染病毒的威胁还在，但大家“没有必要害怕”，并呼吁有症状的人去检测一下。
translation.en: Tweeting this morning Mr Chouhan said that despite the threat of infection there was "no need to fear" and urged those showing symptoms to get themselves tested.

translation.zh: 他说：“如果你感染了病毒，也不用害怕。不要隐瞒你的症状，立刻告诉医生，然后开始接受治疗。及时治疗就能恢复健康。”
translation.en: "If you are infected, there is no need to fear. Do not hide symptoms but tell doctors immediately, so treatment can be started. Timely treatment will make you healthy," he said.

translation.zh: 中央邦已有近 27,000 例确诊病例，其中 7,600 例为活跃病例，并有 799 例与新冠病毒相关的死亡病例。
translation.en: Madhya Pradesh has nearly 27,000 COVID-19 cases, of which more than 7,600 are active and 799 are deaths linked to the virus.

translation.zh: 过去几周，印度确诊病例激增，自 7 月 23 日以来每日新增确诊病例高达 45,000 例。
translation.en: India has recorded a surge in COVID-19 cases in the past weeks, with over 45,000 new cases detected every day since July 23.

translation.zh: 新冠肺炎确诊病例总数迅速接近 140 万例，其中超 46.7 万例为活跃病例，超 32,000 例死亡病例与该病毒有关。
translation.en: The total number of confirmed coronavirus cases is rapidly approaching 14 lakh; of these more than 4.67 lakh are active cases and over 32,000 are deaths linked to the virus.

translation.zh: 确诊病例激增之际，印度国内非封锁区域不同程度地放松了封锁措施，导致印度的疫情严重程度排在了全球第三。
translation.en: The spike in cases, coinciding with the staggered relaxation of lockdown guidelines in non-containment zones of the country, has propelled India to third on the list of most affected nations.

translation.zh: 排在印度前面的是美国（417.8 万确诊病例）和巴西（239.4 万确诊病例）。
translation.en: Only the United States (41.78 lakh cases) and Brazil (23.94 lakh cases) are worse off.

translation.zh: Kanye West 表示可以凭自选票击败 Joe Biden——RT 电视台美国新闻
translation.en: Kanye West says he can beat Joe Biden "off of write ins" - RT USA News

translation.zh: 继在 Twitter 上抖搂家庭的各种不堪之后，说唱歌手 Kanye West 再次为他飘忽不定的总统竞选造势，称自己仅凭自选票就能击败 Joe Biden。
translation.en: Fresh from airing his family's dirty laundry on Twitter, rap enigma Kanye West has once again breathed life into his will-he-won't-he presidential bid, claiming that he could beat Joe Biden on write-in votes alone.

translation.zh: Kanye West 于几天前发布了一张新专辑，并透露出自己两年来一直打算与妻子 Kim Kardashian 离婚，周六他将注意力再度转到 2020 年总统竞选活动上，高调宣称“我可以凭自选票击败 Biden”。
translation.en: Days after announcing a new album and revealing that he's been trying to divorce wife Kim Kardashian for two years, Kanye West again turned his attention to his 2020 presidential campaign on Saturday, in an all-caps announcement declaring "I CAN BEAT BIDEN OFF OF WRITE INS."

translation.zh: 如果 West 仍然将竞选总统一事当真的话，自选票可能是他获胜的唯一途径，否则他只是在作秀而已。
translation.en: If West is still serious about running for the presidency, write-in votes may be his only path to victory, or indeed any kind of showing.

translation.zh: 7 月 4 日，这位说唱歌手宣布竞选总统，时间晚于在至少六个州报名参选的最后期限。
translation.en: The rapper announced his candidacy on July 4, past the deadline to file as a candidate in at least six states.

translation.zh: 尽管如此，West 还是向联邦选举委员会（FEC）提交了相应的文件，并成功让自己的名字印在俄克拉荷马州的选票上。
translation.en: Nevertheless, West pressed ahead and filed the proper papers with the Federal Election Commission (FEC), and managed to get his name on ballots in Oklahoma.

translation.zh: 此后，他举行了一场竞选集会，穿着防弹背心向集会群众致辞，没有使用麦克风或讲台。
translation.en: Since then he's held one campaign rally, during which he addressed a crowd clad in a bulletproof vest, delivering his speech without a microphone or podium.

translation.zh: West 发声反对堕胎，哭着传递出亲基督教的信息，他说这会让媒体“告诉你我疯了”。
translation.en: West came out against abortion, weeping as he delivered a pro-Christian message he said would make the media "tell you that I'm crazy."

translation.zh: 这并非妄言，新闻网站和八卦杂志将 West 的集会说成是宣传噱头、精神疾病的证明，或二者兼而有之。
translation.en: That much was true, and West's rally was described across news sites and gossip mags as a publicity stunt, evidence of mental illness, or both.

translation.zh: 然而，新一轮民调显示，West 在全国范围内的支持率为 2%，与自由党候选人 Jo Jorgensen 并驾齐驱，领先于绿党候选人 Howie Hawkins。
translation.en: However, a recent poll put West at two percent nationwide, neck and neck with the Libertarian Party's Jo Jorgensen and a point ahead of the Green Party's Howie Hawkins.

translation.zh: 虽然他几乎没有可能超过获得了 48% 支持率的 Joe Biden，但理论上他能够从 Biden 那里吸取足够的票数，让 Donald Trump 成功连任——双方的专家都怀疑这可能就是他的打算。
translation.en: While it is extremely unlikely that he could surpass Joe Biden's reputed 48 percent, he could in theory siphon enough votes from Biden to see President Donald Trump clinch a second term - something pundits on both sides suspect may be his plan.

translation.zh: 在地球停留 60 万年的火星岩石将被送回家园
translation.en: Rock from Mars heads home after 600,000 years on Earth

translation.zh: 本周，一小块岩石将被抛入太空，这是有史以来最奇怪的星际旅行之一。
translation.en: A small piece of rock will be hurled into space this week on one of the strangest interplanetary voyages ever attempted.

translation.zh: 一块 10 便士硬币大小的火星玄武岩将于本周搭载美国机器人探测器发射升空，向这颗红色星球推进，并在历时 7 个月的太空之旅后返回火星。
translation.en: A tiny piece of Martian basalt the size of a 10p coin will be launched on board a US robot probe on Thursday and propelled towards the red planet on a seven-month journey to its home world.

translation.zh: 虽然这次非凡的冒险看起来就像将煤炭送到纽卡斯尔（十六世纪以后为英国主要的煤港）一样毫无意义，但是这将成为即将到来的美国宇航局 (NASA) 火星 2020 探险的一个关键部分。
translation.en: This extraordinary odyssey, the interplanetary equivalent of sending coals to Newcastle, will form a key part of Nasa's forthcoming Mars 2020 expedition.

translation.zh: 太空工程师表示，这块由伦敦自然历史博物馆捐赠的岩石，将在“毅力号”探测器着陆后，用于校准机器人的探测器，并开始寻找火星上生命存在过的迹象。
translation.en: Space engineers say the rock - which has been donated by the Natural History Museum in London - will be used to calibrate detectors on board the robot rover Perseverance after it lands and begins its search for signs of past life on the planet.

translation.zh: 我们拥有的一些火星陨石非常脆弱，但我们专门选择了这块，因为它就像旧靴子一样坚硬
translation.en: Some of the Martian meteorites we have are very fragile, but we chose this one specifically because it's as tough as old boots

translation.zh: “当你打开仪器并在研究前对其进行校准时，你将使用与即将研究的未知事物类似的材料对其进行校准。
translation.en: "When you turn on instruments and begin to tune them up before using them for research, you calibrate them on materials that are going to be like the unknown substances you are about to study.

translation.zh: 那么，对于研究火星上的岩石而言，还有什么比一块来自火星的岩石更适合作为研究对象?”自然历史博物馆陨石馆馆长 Caroline Smith 教授说道。
translation.en: So what better for studying rocks on Mars than a lump that originated there?" said Professor Caroline Smith, the Natural History Museum's curator of meteorites.

translation.zh: Smith 同时也是“火星 2020”科学小组的成员，他补充说，科学家们相信他们带回的岩石来自火星。
translation.en: Scientists were confident that the rock they were returning to Mars originated on the planet, added Smith, who is also a member of the Mars 2020 science team.

translation.zh: “陨石内的微小气泡与火星大气层的成分完全相同，所以我们确信这颗岩石来自那里。”
translation.en: "Tiny bubbles of gas trapped inside that meteorite have exactly the same composition as the atmosphere of Mars, so we know our rock came from there."

translation.zh: 据信，这块火星陨石是在大约 60 万到 70 万年前，一颗小行星或彗星撞击火星时产生的，并伴有碎片散落在太空中。
translation.en: It is thought that the Martian meteorite was created when an asteroid or comet plunged into the planet about 600,000 to 700,000 years ago, spraying debris into space.

translation.zh: 其中一块碎石扫过太阳系，最终落在地球上。
translation.en: One of those pieces of rubble swept across the solar system and eventually crashed on to Earth.

translation.zh: 这颗现在被称为 SAU 008 的陨石于 1999 年在阿曼被发现，从那时起一直由自然历史博物馆保管。
translation.en: That meteorite - now known as SAU 008 - was discovered in Oman in 1999 and has been in the care of the Natural History Museum since then.

translation.zh: 在“毅力号”探测器上安装的仪器中，有一台名为 Sherloc 的高精度激光发射器，它将用来破译火星岩石的化学成分，并确定它们是否含有可以表明火星上曾经存在或仍然存在生命的有机物质。
translation.en: Among the instruments fitted to the Perseverance rover is a high-precision laser called Sherloc, which will be used to decipher the chemical composition of rocks and determine if they might contain organic materials that indicate life once existed - or still exists - on Mars.

translation.zh: 添加一块 SAU 008 是为了确保最大精度完成此操作。
translation.en: The inclusion of a piece of SAU 008 is intended to ensure this is done with maximum accuracy.

translation.zh: Smith 补充道：“我们特别挑选了这块岩石，因为它在化学成分上是契合的，而且它是一块非常坚硬的岩石。”
translation.en: "The piece of rock we are sending was specifically chosen because it is the right material in terms of chemistry, but also it is a very tough rock," added Smith.

translation.zh: “我们发现的一些火星陨石十分易碎。但这块陨石就像旧靴子一样坚硬。”
translation.en: "Some of the Martian meteorites we have are very fragile. This meteorite is as tough as old boots."

translation.zh: “毅力号”找到有研究价值的岩石后，会将它们储藏在火星表面。
translation.en: Once Perseverance has selected the most promising rocks it can find, it will dump them in caches on the Martian surface.

translation.zh: 然后，这些岩石将被后续发送至火星的机器人回收，并从太空发射到地球上进行研究分析。
translation.en: These will then be retrieved by subsequent robot missions and blasted into space towards Earth for analysis.

translation.zh: 韦里比附近的 Mambourin 发现一名男子中枪
translation.en: Man found with gunshot wounds in Mambourin near Werribee

translation.zh: 昨晚，墨尔本西部一名男子中枪后被紧急送往医院救治。
translation.en: A man has been rushed to hospital after being shot in Melbourne's west overnight.

translation.zh: 警方接到报警后赶到韦里比附近的 Mambourin，大约晚上 8 点，警方在 Yard 街发现一名 20 岁左右的男子，下半身疑有多处枪伤。
translation.en: Police were called to Mambourin, near Werribee, about 8pm where they found a man aged in his 20s with suspected gunshot wounds to the lower body in Yard St.

translation.zh: 男子被送往医院救治，并无生命危险。
translation.en: The man was taken to hospital with non-life threatening injuries.

translation.zh: 警方表示正在对这起案件展开调查。
translation.en: Police said the investigation was ongoing.

translation.zh: Oliver Spencer 的周日：“周日我不打扮，就穿家居服”
translation.en: Sunday with Oliver Spencer: "I won't get dressed up, Sundays are for loungewear'

translation.zh: 请问您的周日是如何开始的？
translation.en: How does Sunday start?

translation.zh: 我跌跌撞撞地走下楼梯，在给妻子泡茶的路上被狗绊倒。
translation.en: With me stumbling down the stairs and falling over the dog on my way to make my wife a cup of tea.

translation.zh: 幸运的话，我们也许有时间离开伦敦，去我们在怀特岛的海边别墅度个假。
translation.en: If I'm lucky, we'll have escaped London to our coastal house on the Isle of Wight.

translation.zh: 坐在一起，望着水面发呆。
translation.en: The two of us will sit together and look across the water in silence.

translation.zh: 这听起来很惬意......
translation.en: It sounds serene...

translation.zh: 直到早晨 8 点，家的几个男孩儿会跑来敲门，让我们做早餐。
translation.en: It is, until 8am when two or three of our boys bang on the door demanding breakfast.

translation.zh: 通常，他们的早餐是培根和鸡蛋，而我们的是菠菜和蘑菇，天气好的话，就会把孩子们赶到外面去玩。
translation.en: It's bacon and eggs for them, spinach and mushrooms for us; then if the weather's good, we kick the boys out.

translation.zh: 我们会去游泳、划船，或者在酷似《权力的游戏》场景的 Quarr 修道院旁散步。
translation.en: We'll swim, paddleboard or take a walk around the beautiful Quarr Abbey, which looks like something straight out of Game of Thrones.

translation.zh: 那么疫情封城期间呢？
translation.en: And during lockdown?

translation.zh: 最开始两周，我完全不能接受，无法相信我的店已经歇业了。
translation.en: For the first two weeks I was in total denial, I couldn't believe my business was shut down.

translation.zh: 后来，我就照顾新种植的植物转移自己的注意力。
translation.en: I distracted myself by obsessing about the life or death of my newly planted garden.

translation.zh: 另外，我还在厨房里做了些菜品“实验”，比如味道浓郁的鳗鱼香菇汤和双倍奶油的蛋卷，后来这些都成为了我的拿手菜。
translation.en: Otherwise, I've been experimenting in the kitchen: intensely flavoured eel and shiitake broth and a double cream brioche have been my standouts.

translation.zh: 会如何放松自己呢？
translation.en: How do you unwind?

translation.zh: 我不会穿得很正式，周日是穿家居服的日子，半裁剪运动裤和白色 T 恤。
translation.en: I won't get dressed up, Sundays are for loungewear, half-cropped tracksuit bottoms and a white T-shirt.

translation.zh: 吃完一顿烤鸡午餐后，我会在花园的躺椅上拿着报纸打盹。
translation.en: After a lunch of roast chicken, I'll snooze with the papers on a deckchair in the garden.

translation.zh: 周日晚上我尽量不喝酒，这样有助于在周一保持清醒。
translation.en: I try not to drink: it helps clear my head before Monday comes calling.

translation.zh: 有没有印象深刻的周日？
translation.en: A Sunday that sticks out?

translation.zh: 在某一个周日，我们在纽约参加了嫂嫂 40 岁的生日宴，并度过了一个漫长的夜晚，差不多午夜时，我怀孕的妻子感觉她快分娩了，于是我们决定离开宴会。
translation.en: After a long Saturday night at my sister-in-law's 40th birthday party in New York, around midnight my heavily pregnant wife decided we'd better get going.

translation.zh: 她本来打算好好玩一下，告诉大家这毕竟已经是她的第三胎了，应该不会有什么大问题。
translation.en: She was determined to enjoy herself, telling people it was her third after all.

translation.zh: 但是，我们刚离开宴会，她就直接分娩了。
translation.en: We left the party and she went straight into labour.

translation.zh: 周日的晚上怎么度过？
translation.en: And Sunday night?

translation.zh: 晚上 7 点，我们把行李装上车，然后登上前往朴茨茅斯的渡轮。
translation.en: By 7pm we've packed the car and have boarded the ferry to Portsmouth.

translation.zh: 从轮渡下来以后，我们开车上了 A3 高速公路，回到伦敦准备迎接工作日的到来，到家后，孩子们就去睡觉了，我遛完狗回来又吃了一碗麦片。
translation.en: A drive up the A3 and we're back in London for the week: kids in bed, I walk the dog and have a bowl of cereal.

translation.zh: 我很乐意从怀特岛回到伦敦，因为我知道，如果不这样做，我也不可能在怀特岛有个家。
translation.en: I'm good with leaving the Isle of Wight to head back to the city, I know if I don't, I can't have a home there at all.

translation.zh: 肯尼亚加里萨警察因枪击事件被捕
translation.en: Kenyan police officers arrested after fatal shooting in Garissa

translation.zh: 肯尼亚两名警察因涉嫌在一起枪击事件中造成两人死亡被拘捕。
translation.en: Two police officers in Kenya have been arrested in connection with a shooting in which two people were killed.

translation.zh: 枪击事件于周六发生在东部加里萨县的 Soko Ng'ombe 市场，当时，市场内正针对一名男子涉嫌谋杀的案件进行抗议。
translation.en: The shooting happened at Soko Ng'ombe market in eastern Garissa county on Saturday, during a protest against the arrest of a man suspected of murder.

translation.zh: 两名受害者为 Aden Abdi Madobe 和 Muhiyadin Adow Shibin。
translation.en: The two victims have been named as Aden Abdi Madobe and Muhiyadin Adow Shibin.

translation.zh: 肯尼亚警察局监察机关已就枪击事件展开调查。
translation.en: Kenya's police watchdog has launched an investigation into the shooting.

translation.zh: 调查程序包括对涉事枪械的取证分析。
translation.en: It will include "forensic analysis" of the officers' guns.

translation.zh: 加里萨国会议员 Aden Duale 称该事件“令人发指”，并在脸书网发布的帖子中谴责“警方暴力执法”。
translation.en: Garissa MP Aden Duale called the deaths "heinous" and condemned "police brutality" in a statement posted to Facebook.

translation.zh: 多名活动人士也表达了对警方在疫情期间执法行为的忧虑。
translation.en: Campaigners have raised concerns about policing during the pandemic.

translation.zh: 根据国际特赦组织的数据，自三月以来，肯尼亚警方已造成 21 人死亡，原因均为未遵守宵禁令和佩戴口罩等防疫要求。
translation.en: According to Amnesty International, Kenyan officers have killed 21 people since March for failing to comply with coronavirus prevention measures such as curfews and mask-wearing.

translation.zh: 本月初，警方在首都内罗比投放催泪瓦斯并逮捕多名参与年度 Saba Saba 游行——起源于 30 年前反对前总统 Daniel arap Moi 独裁的抗议事件——的示威者。
translation.en: Earlier this month police in the capital Nairobi fired tear gas and arrested several protesters taking part in the annual Saba Saba march - a protest event which started 30 years ago against the autocratic regime of then-President Daniel arap Moi.

translation.zh: 前方记者称，由于警方在疫情封锁期间的镇压行为引起群愤，导致今年的抗议人群更为激进。
translation.en: Correspondents say this year's event was given extra impetus by anger over police crackdowns during the Covid-19 lockdown.

translation.zh: 美国驻中国成都总领事馆外安保升级
translation.en: Tight Security Presence outside US Consulate in Chengdu, China

translation.zh: 周日，美国驻中国成都总领事馆外安保升级，美方人员准备撤离。
translation.en: There was a tight security presence outside the U.S. consulate in the city of Chengdu, China Sunday, as the American staff prepared to leave the premises.

translation.zh: 三辆搬家卡车驶入馆内，制服警察和便衣警察排列街道两旁，路边设立了金属栅栏。
translation.en: Three moving trucks were seen entering the building compound, while uniformed and plainclothes police lined both sides of the street, which were lined with metal barriers.

translation.zh: 中国《环球时报》编辑发表推文称，美国驻成都总领事馆被要求在 72 小时内关闭，即 7 月 27 日星期一上午 10 点（0200 GMT）。
translation.en: The editor of China's Global Times tabloid tweeted that the U.S. consulate in Chengdu was given 72 hours to close, or until 10 a.m. (0200GMT) Monday, July 27.

translation.zh: 中方指责美国驻成都总领事馆的一些人员“从事与其身份不相符的活动”。
translation.en: China charged that some personnel at the Chengdu consulate were "conducting activities not in line with their identities."

translation.zh: 中国外交部发言人汪文彬没有透露任何细节，只表示这种活动干涉中国内政，损害中国安全利益。
translation.en: Without giving any details, Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesman, Wang Wenbin said such activity had interfered in China's affairs and harmed its security interests.

translation.zh: 中方于周五要求关闭美方驻成都总领事馆，这是对美方要求关闭中方驻德克萨斯州休斯敦总领事馆实施的反制。
translation.en: China's order to close the consulate in Chengdu was issued Friday in retaliation for a U.S. order to close the Chinese consulate in Houston, Texas.

translation.zh: 华盛顿要求中方关闭驻休斯敦总领事馆“以保护美国的知识产权和美国人的私人信息”。
translation.en: Washington ordered China to close the Houston office "to protect American intellectual property and Americans' private information."

translation.zh: 中国驻休斯敦总领事馆于周五关闭之后，一群貌似美国官员的人从后门闯入该场所。
translation.en: As Chinese consulate closure in Houston took effect on Friday, a group of men who appeared to be U.S. officials were seen breaking-in to the facility through a back door.

translation.zh: 汪文斌在周六表示，这一行为严重违反了国际法和双边协定，中方会做出回应，但没有说明具体措施。
translation.en: Wang said on Saturday that violated international and bilateral agreements and China would respond, without specifying of how.

translation.zh: 针锋相对地关闭领事馆进一步加剧了两国之间在贸易和工业间谍及至人权问题上的紧张关系。
translation.en: The tit-for-tat closures further escalated the tensions between the two countries over issues from trade and industrial espionage to human rights.

translation.zh: 恶作剧者提供毁车武器，动物园内狒狒挥舞起各种工具
translation.en: Safari park baboons seen armed with knives, screwdrivers and CHAINSAW as 'pranksters give them weapons to wreck cars'

translation.zh: 默西塞德郡诺斯利野生动物园的灵长类动物臭名昭著——它们会扑向停在围栏内的汽车，掰下雨刮器或后视镜。
translation.en: The primates at Knowsley safari park, Merseyside, are long known to pounce on anyone pausing in the enclosure and ripping off a windscreen wiper or mirror.

translation.zh: 有人看到默西塞德郡诺斯利野生动物园内的狒狒挥舞小刀、起子甚至是链锯。
translation.en: Baboons have been armed with knives, screwdrivers and even chainsaws at Knowsley safari park, Merseyside.

translation.zh: 工作人员担心有恶作剧者给这些讨厌的灵长类动物提供武器，它们会扑向停下来的汽车，掰下雨刮器或后视镜。
translation.en: Workers fear pranksters are arming the pesky primates, who are known to pounce on anyone who pauses and rip off windscreen wipers and mirrors.

translation.zh: 现在，工作人员担心游客以“开玩笑”为由给它们提供致命武器，导致其攻击性加强，有人甚至看到这些狒狒乱翻工具箱。
translation.en: Workers now fear they are being armed with the lethal weapons "for a laugh" by visitors to bolster their attacks and the apes have even been seen rummaging around toolboxes themselves.

translation.zh: 一位园区工作人员告诉《星期日泰晤士报》：“我们不确定是想要看到它们袭击汽车的游客给它们提供了武器，还是它们自己从皮卡和货车上偷的。”
translation.en: One park worker told The Sunday Times: "We're not sure if they are being given weapons by some of the guests who want to see them attack cars, or if they're fishing them out of pick-up trucks and vans."

translation.zh: “它们确实会去翻别人的工具箱并带着到处走。有人看到过狒狒拖着一把链锯。”
translation.en: "They will literally go into people's toolboxes and carry them around. One of the baboons was seen lugging around a chainsaw."

translation.zh: 另一位工作人员说：“我们看到过拿着小刀和起子的狒狒。我在想是不是游客递给它们的。”
translation.en: Another worker said: "The baboons have been found with knives and screwdrivers. I do wonder if it's some of the guests handing them out."

translation.zh: 狒狒袭击时有可见，就连英格兰西北部的修理工都知道这个动物园。
translation.en: And the baboon attacks are so inevitable that mechanics across the northwest of England have come to know the enclosure well.

translation.zh: 大曼彻斯特塞尔的一位修理工表示，人们知道动物园里会发生什么状况，他的两位客户今年就惨遭狒狒毒手。
translation.en: One mechanic in Sale, Greater Manchester said people know what to expect at the park and that he has had two customers fall victim to the baboons this year.

translation.zh: 他们还说，前一分钟孩子们还想看猴子坐到汽车上，后一分钟车牌就不翼而飞，但这样的问题给修理厂带来了“好生意”。
translation.en: They added that one minute kids want monkeys on the car and the next it has no registration plate - but the issue provides "good money" for the garage.

translation.zh: 诺斯利动物园坚称这里就像麦当劳得来速一样安全，只要游客在全程 5 英里的野生动物园参观途中待在车内，动物园于 6 月 15 日重新开放，采取了应对新冠疫情的安全措施。
translation.en: Knowsley reopened on June 15 with Covid-19 security measures after insisting it was as safe as a McDonald's drive-through as visitors do not leave their car on the five mile safari drive.

translation.zh: 这个动物园占地约 222.7 公顷，饲养了狮子、老虎、犀牛、角马和骆驼等动物，他们对狒狒持有武器这类报道嗤之以鼻。
translation.en: The 550-acre park, home to lions, tigers, rhinos, wildebeest and camels, dismissed reports of armed apes as an urban myth.

translation.zh: 一位发言人说：“我们相信，很多这样的故事都在口耳相传之间被夸大，并且有添油加醋的迹象，导致有时候在园区发现物品显得令人难以置信。”
translation.en: A spokesperson said: "We believe many of these stories have grown in exaggeration as they've been retold, with embellishment to make the objects that are sometimes found in the enclosure seem more exciting and unbelievable."

translation.zh: 2012 年，汽车制造商现代公司将其新一代 i30 汽车放在这所动物园内，与 40 只猴子共处 10 个小时，以此证明该车型的强度足以保障有孩子的家庭的人身安全。
translation.en: In 2012 car manufacturer Hyundai let 40 monkeys from the park loose on its New Generation i30 model for 10 hours to prove it had the strength for families with small children.

translation.zh: 曼联、切尔西进入欧冠，伯恩茅斯、沃特福德跌出英超
translation.en: United, Chelsea into CL; Bournemouth, Watford down from EPL

translation.zh: 周日，曼联和切尔西在英超联赛的最后一天击败莱斯特城挺进欧洲冠军联赛，而伯恩茅斯和沃特福德则被降级，结束了为期五年的顶峰之争。
translation.en: Manchester United and Chelsea qualified for the Champions League at the expense of Leicester on a frantic final day of the Premier League season on Sunday, while Bournemouth and Watford were relegated to end five-year stays in the top flight.

translation.zh: Bruno Fernandes 和 Jesse Lingard 进球后，曼联以 2:0 的成绩击败莱斯特城，Ole Gunnar Solskjaer 的球队则获得第三名。
translation.en: United won 2-0 at Leicester through goals by Bruno Fernandes and Jesse Lingard to give Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's team a third-place finish.

translation.zh: 切尔西在 Mason Mount 的进球和助攻下，2:0 击败狼队，排名第四，并超过莱斯特城（赛季期间基本名列前四）获得最后一个进入欧冠联赛的席位。
translation.en: Chelsea beat Wolverhampton 2-0 after a goal and an assist by Mason Mount and finished in the fourth and final Champions League qualifying place above Leicester, which has been in the top four for most of the season.

translation.zh: 莱斯特城将参加欧洲联赛，此外，参赛的还有热刺，该球队在水晶宫比赛中与狼队 1:1 打平，最终由于净胜球优势超过狼队。
translation.en: Leicester, instead, will play in the Europa League along with Tottenham, which drew 1-1 at Crystal Palace to secure sixth place - above Wolverhampton on goal difference.

translation.zh: 为避免获得剩余的两个保级名额的对战则进行到了最后一刻，阿斯顿维拉在第 84 分钟进球，一分钟后被进一球，与西汉姆联 1:1 平留下。
translation.en: The battle to avoid the two remaining relegation places went to the wire as Aston Villa scored in the 84th minute, conceded a minute later, then held on for 1-1 draw at West Ham to survive.

translation.zh: 队长 Jack Grealish 赢得阿斯顿维拉一球，这可能是他代表自己的童年俱乐部踢的最后一场比赛。
translation.en: Captain Jack Grealish scored Villa's goal in what could be his last game for his boyhood club.

translation.zh: 伯恩茅斯以 3:1 的成绩击败埃弗顿，但最终落后阿斯顿维拉一分。
translation.en: Bournemouth did what it had to do and beat Everton, 3-1, but ended up one point behind Villa.

translation.zh: 沃特福德在 3:2 输给阿森纳之后，作为倒数第二的队伍降级。
translation.en: Watford was also relegated as the next-to-last team after losing 3-2 at Arsenal.

translation.zh: 曼联在联赛期间进球数超过 100，以 5:0 的成绩战胜已经降级的诺维奇，赢得进入欧冠的资格，这场比赛也是为曼联效力 10 年的 David Silva 在英超的最后一场比赛。
translation.en: Manchester City passed 100 goals for the campaign with a 5-0 win over last-place and already-demoted Norwich, a game that marked the last in the Premier League for David Silva after 10 years with City.

translation.zh: Kevin De Bruyne 创下纪录，在本赛季助攻 20 次，进球两次。
translation.en: Kevin De Bruyne got a record-tying 20th assist of the season and also scored twice.

translation.zh: 利物浦 3:1 战胜纽卡斯尔联，结束了本赛季的夺冠之旅，俱乐部最终得分 99 分。
translation.en: Liverpool ended its title-winning season with a 3-1 win at Newcastle and finished on a club-record 99 points.

translation.zh: 此外，南安普顿 3:1 战胜谢菲尔德联，Danny Ings 在本赛季进球 22 次。
translation.en: Also, Southampton beat Sheffield United 3-1, with Danny Ings scoring his 22nd goal of the season.

translation.zh: 而莱斯特城球员 Jamie Vardy 进球数最多，赢得了金靴奖。
translation.en: That left him one behind Leicester's Jamie Vardy, who won the Golden Boot as the league's highest scorer.

translation.zh: Gwyneth Paltrow 希望孩子树立良好“价值观”
translation.en: Gwyneth Paltrow wants kids to have good 'worth ethic'

translation.zh: Gwyneth Paltrow 表示，她试图通过“不只是授之以鱼”来教育自己的孩子，希望他们树立起良好的价值观。
translation.en: Gwyneth Paltrow has said she wants to raise her children to have a good worth ethic as she tries 'not to just hand them things'.

translation.zh: Paltrow 与前夫 Chris Martin 育有两个孩子，分别是 16 岁的 Apple 和 14 岁的 Moses，她希望孩子们树立良好的价值观，而不是依靠父母的名气。
translation.en: Paltrow has two children, Apple (16) and Moses (14), with ex-husband Chris Martin and she wants them to have good values and not get by on their parents fame.

translation.zh: “我也是为什么我认为……培养孩子的职业道德，让孩子的价值观与你自身的价值观或是与他们对自己的身份认同一致之类事情十分重要的原因，” 她在播客中告诉 Rob Lowe。
translation.en: "That's why I think it's so important... To raise a kid that has a work ethic and whose values are aligned with yours or with their own sense of who they are, etc," she told Rob Lowe on his podcast.

translation.zh: “实际情况是我可以给你指路，但如果你只是像别人那样尝试，不会得出什么结果。”
translation.en: "The truth of the matter is the doors can be opened for you, but if you think about all the people who try and it doesn't happen."

translation.zh: 她补充说：“作为父母，我能够为孩子们做的就是教他们是非对错，教他们工作是什么。我的确尝试过避免只是授之以鱼。”
translation.en: She added, "As a parent you think, all I can do for these kids is teach them right from wrong and teach them what work is. I've really have tried not to just hand them things."

translation.zh: Paltrow 也采取了措施，让孩子们的生活尽可能不被公众关注，确保他们的社交媒体账号保持私密性。
translation.en: Paltrow has also taken steps to allow her children to live as privately as possible, and ensures they keep their social media accounts private.

translation.zh: 她说：“我不会通过任何社交媒体或其他方式让他们公开露面，我会尽量让他们避开公众的视线。”
translation.en: "I won't let them be public on any social media or anything like that, I try to keep them out of the public eye as much as possible," she said.

translation.zh: “你也知道，现在情况不同了，孩子们会问我能不能开个 YouTube 频道，我会告诉他们，‘不行。绝对不可以。’”
translation.en: "You know, now it's different, 'cause kids are like, 'Can I have a YouTube channel?' and I'm like, 'No, you can't. Absolutely not."

translation.zh: 突尼斯内政部长接任新总理，将于一个月内组建新政府
translation.en: Tunisia interior minister named new PM, to form government in a month

translation.zh: 在该北非国家政党关系紧张的情况下，突尼斯总统办公室宣布，任命内政部长 Hichem Mechichi 组建下一届政府。
translation.en: Tunisia's Interior Minister Hichem Mechichi has been appointed to form the next government, the president's office said, amid political tensions among major parties in the North African country.

translation.zh: 这名 46 岁的律师将接替于本月初辞职的 Elyes Fakhfakh。
translation.en: The 46-year-old lawyer succeeds Elyes Fakhfakh, who resigned as prime minister earlier this month.

translation.zh: 然而，Mechichi 并不在各执政党向 Kais Saied 总统提名的候选人之列。
translation.en: But Mechichi was not one of the names proposed by the governing political parties to President Kais Saied.

translation.zh: 周六宣布新任领导人后，在一份声明中，Mechichi 表示他将“致力于组建一个符合突尼斯人民期望的政府”。
translation.en: In a statement following Saturday's announcement, Mechichi said he would "work to form a government that meets the expectations of all Tunisians."

translation.zh: 自 2011 年革命运动引发阿拉伯之春地区起义后，突尼斯被誉为罕见的民主转型成功的典范。
translation.en: Tunisia has been praised as a rare success story for democratic transition after the Arab Spring regional uprisings sparked by its 2011 revolution.

translation.zh: 然而，该国领导人却难以达到人民的期望，新冠疫情导致突尼斯关闭边境，使得本就脆弱的国内经济遭受重击。
translation.en: But its leaders have struggled to meet the expectations of the Tunisian people and the already fragile economy has been battered by the closure of the country's borders because of the COVID-19 pandemic.

translation.zh: 疫情导致约 50 人死亡，感染病例超过 1,400。
translation.en: The disease has killed nearly 50 people and infected more than 1,400 in Tunisia.

translation.zh: 除了在目前的政府中担任内政部长外，Mechichi 还担任 Saied 总统的顾问，负责法律事宜。
translation.en: As well as being the interior minister in the outgoing government, Mechichi has been a counsellor to President Saied, handling legal matters.

translation.zh: 他曾担任交通部参谋，也在社会事务部任职过。
translation.en: He has previously been chief of staff at the Ministry of Transport and also served in the Ministry of Social Affairs.

translation.zh: 现在，他有一个月时间组建新政府，之后，议会会对新政府举行信任投票，只有获得绝大多数信任票才能通过。
translation.en: He now has a month to form a government, which will then face a parliamentary vote of confidence and will need an absolute majority to succeed.

translation.zh: 否则，议会解散，并在三个月内进行新的选举。
translation.en: Failing that, parliament will be dissolved and new elections will be held within three months.

translation.zh: 在上一次十月举行的选举中，复兴党名列前茅，然而因未能获得绝大多数信任票，最终加入了联合政府。
translation.en: In the last elections held in October, the Ennahdha party came on top but fell far short of a majority and eventually agreed to join a coalition government.

translation.zh: Fakhfakh 上任不足五个月便在 7 月 15 日辞职，使得突尼斯面临政治僵局的危险，尤其是在该国仍在设法应对疫情导致的经济困境的情况下。
translation.en: Fakhfakh's resignation on July 15, after less than five months in office, threatened fresh political deadlock in the nation as it struggles with the economic fallout of the pandemic.

translation.zh: 辞职事件加剧了 Fakhfakh 与复兴党之间因利益冲突对 Fakhfakh 进行指控引发的政治争端。
translation.en: The resignation deepened the political dispute with Ennahdha over allegations against Fakhfakh of conflicts of interest.

translation.zh: 自十月立法选举以来，这位即将离任的 47 岁的领导人与复兴党之间的关系就颇为紧张。
translation.en: Relations between the 47-year-old outgoing leader and Ennahdha have been strained since the October legislative elections.

translation.zh: 在该党对 Fakhfakh 投不信任票当天，Fakhfakh 下台。
translation.en: Fakhfakh stepped down the same day the party filed a no-confidence motion against him.

translation.zh: 复兴党最初提名了一名独立人士担任总理，但由于未能赢得议会支持，总统最终提名前财政部长 Fakhfakh 接任该职位。
translation.en: Ennahdha had initially nominated an independent for prime minister, but he failed to win the support of parliament, leading the president to name former Finance Minister Fakhfakh for the post.

translation.zh: 考虑到还有新的选举，复兴党最终同意加入联合政府。
translation.en: Faced with the prospect of fresh elections, Ennahdha eventually agreed to join the coalition government.

translation.zh: Ted Cruz 称 Pelosi 意在“用钱解决问题并让美国停摆”
translation.en: Ted Cruz says Pelosi's objectives are "shoveling cash at the problem and shutting America down"

translation.zh: 华盛顿——德克萨斯州共和党参议员 Ted Cruz 指责众议院议长 Nancy Pelosi 和众议院民主党派推行的新冠疫情救助方案，称该方案旨在“用钱解决问题并让美国停摆”，有关后续措施的磋商仍在继续。
translation.en: Washington - Republican Senator Ted Cruz of Texas accused House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and House Democrats of pushing a coronavirus relief package that focuses on "shoveling cash at the problem and shutting America down" as negotiations on the next measure continue.

translation.zh: Cruz 周日在接受《面向全国》(Face the Nation) 节目采访时表示，美国同时面临着两大危机：席卷全球的疫情夺去了全世界超过 60 万条生命，美国陷入了一场“绝对的经济灾难”。
translation.en: In an interview with "Face the Nation" on Sunday, Cruz said the country is confronting two crises simultaneously: a global pandemic that has claimed the lives of more than 600,000 people worldwide and an "absolute economic catastrophe" in the U.S.

translation.zh: Cruz 批评先于他接受《面向全国》采访的 Pelosi “没有关注到其中任何一个问题。”
translation.en: But Cruz said Pelosi, who appeared on "Face the Nation" ahead of the senator, " is "focused on neither of those."

translation.zh: Cruz 表示：“她的目标就是用钱解决问题并让美国停摆。”
translation.en: "Her objectives are shoveling cash at the problem and shutting America down," the Texas Republican said.

translation.zh: “你们尤其要看看她正在尝试推动的 3 万亿美元法案，这纯粹是在砸钱而不是真正在解决问题。我们的目标应该是让美国人重返工作岗位，让他们能够养家糊口。”
translation.en: "And in particular, you look at the $3 trillion bill she's trying to push, it's just shoveling money to her friends and not actually solving the problem. Our objective should be Americans want to get back to work. They want to be able to provide for their family."

translation.zh: 参议院共和党派和白宫上周就应对新冠疫情的第四阶段方案条款进行磋商，预计金额将达到 1 万亿美元。
translation.en: Senate Republicans and the White House spent last week negotiating the terms of the fourth phase of the coronavirus response, which they expect to cost $1 trillion.

translation.zh: 上周末，白宫办公厅主任 Mark Meadow 和财政部长 Steven Mnuchin 回到国会山与参议院工作人员进行进一步探讨，Mnuchin 在周日接受福克斯新闻频道采访时表示，参议院多数党领袖 Mitch McConnell 将于周一揭晓个中细节。
translation.en: Over the weekend, White House chief of staff Mark Meadow and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin headed back to Capitol Hill for more talks with Senate staff, and Mnuchin told Fox News in an interview Sunday the details are set to be unveiled by Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell on Monday.

translation.zh: 议员们面临的最紧迫问题以及共和党与民主党之间争论的焦点在于，增加的失业救济金已经到期，将于本周末取消。
translation.en: The most pressing issue for lawmakers - and a point of contention between Republicans and Democrats - is the expiration of enhanced unemployment benefits, which began to go away this weekend.

translation.zh: 民主党希望“第四阶段”新冠疫情救助方案继续保留增加的 600 美元救济金，而共和党则呼吁削减这一金额，辩称一部分美国人通过失业获得的收入比挣到的工资还要多。
translation.en: While Democrats want the "phase four" coronavirus package to keep the $600 boost to the benefits, Republicans are calling for it to be pared back and argue some Americans make more from unemployment than they did in wages.

translation.zh: Cruz 表示，目前有一半以上的美国民众获得的增加后的失业救济金比他们工作时的收入要高，他表示自己在与徳克萨斯州的小企业主交谈时获知，一些小企业主在招工时也因此遇到麻烦。
translation.en: Cruz said more than half of Americans receiving the enhanced unemployment benefits are paid more now than when they were working and said he's talked to small business owners in Texas who are having trouble rehiring employees.

translation.zh: 他说：“他们当然不会回来工作，因为联邦政府付给他们的钱有时候达到了他们工资收入的两倍之多。”
translation.en: "Of course, they won't come back because the federal government is paying them, in some instances, twice as much money to stay home," he said.

translation.zh: Cruz 认为国会应当着重通过一条复苏法案，放宽对小企业的税收和规定，从而让美国民众重返工作岗位。
translation.en: Cruz said Congress should be focusing on passing a recovery bill that would make it easier for Americans to return to work by easing taxes and regulations on small businesses:

translation.zh: 他表示：“复苏法案不是将几万亿美元砸下来，而是暂停征收工资税，这相当于给每一个工作的美国人涨薪。这种方式才真正能让大家重返工作岗位。”
translation.en: "instead of just shoveling trillions out the door, a recovery bill would suspend the payroll tax, which would give it a pay raise to everyone in America who's working. That actually gets people back to work," he said.

translation.zh: Trump 总统上周要求下一个救助方案包含削减工资税，但 Mnuchin 表示，这项提案不会纳入立法流程，因为共和党不接受这一提案。
translation.en: President Trump demanded last week the next aid package include a payroll tax cut, but Mnuchin said it will not be part of the legislation, as the proposal was ill-received among Republicans.

translation.zh: Trump 总统确认下一个法案不包括削减工资税，但企图将责任归咎于民主党。
translation.en: Mr. Trump acknowledged the payroll tax cut would be absent from the next bill but sought to pin the blame on Democrats.

translation.zh: Cruz 上周对新方案的成本提出了异议，他在周日表示，自己不同意参议院共和党提出的这项措施。
translation.en: Cruz, who last week objected to the cost of the next package, said Sunday he is not on board with the measure from his fellow Senate Republicans.

translation.zh: 但是，他也对民主党控制的众议院于五月份通过的 3 万亿美元法案提出了批评，指责对方故意制定出一项在十一月大选之前有损总统利益的措施。
translation.en: But he also criticized the $3 trillion bill passed by the Democrat-controlled House in May and accused his political opponents of deliberately crafting a measure that damages the president ahead of the November election.

translation.zh: 他说：“民主党的唯一目标就是击败 Donald Trump，他们天真地认为击败 Donald Trump 的最好办法就是让美国的方方面面停摆，关闭美国的每一所学校。”
translation.en: "The only objective Democrats have is to defeat Donald Trump, and they've cynically decided the best way to defeat Donald Trump is shut down every business in America, shut down every school in America," he said.

translation.zh: “要知道，虽然 Nancy Pelosi 谈到了男性和女性劳动者，但她的提议就是让大家不要工作。”
translation.en: "You know, Nancy Pelosi talks about working men and women. What she's proposing is keeping working men and women from working."

translation.zh: 因曝光婚姻隐私，Kanye West 向妻子 Kim Kardashian 公开道歉
translation.en: Kanye West issues public apology to wife Kim Kardashian after marriage revelations

translation.zh: Kanye West 向妻子 Kim Kardashian 道歉，不该把“私事”公之于众。
translation.en: Kanye West has apologised to wife Kim Kardashian for going public with a "private matter."

translation.zh: 在南卡罗莱纳举办的一场活动中，这位说唱歌手透露，夫妇二人曾经考虑过流产他们的第一个孩子。
translation.en: The rapper revealed during an event in South Carolina that the couple had considered aborting their first child.

translation.zh: 在过去的一周当中，West 频频发表对妻子及其家人的各种不满，目前他已经在推特上公开道歉。
translation.en: Following a tumultuous week in which he made a series of claims against his wife and her family, West has now tweeted an apology.

translation.zh: 据报道，就在 Justin Bieber 前往 West 位于怀俄明州的牧场探望他之后，West 去医院呆了几个小时。
translation.en: West also reportedly paid a visit to hospital hours after being visited by Justin Bieber at his ranch in Wyoming .

translation.zh: 他说：“我要向我的妻子 Kim 道歉，不该将私人的事情公之于众。我没有像她照顾我那样照顾好她。”
translation.en: He said: "I would like to apologise to my wife Kim for going public with something that was a private matter. I did not cover her like she has covered me."

translation.zh: “我想对 Kim 说，我知道自己伤害了你。请原谅我。谢谢你一直陪伴在我身边。”
translation.en: "To Kim I want to say I know I hurt you. Please forgive me. Thank you for always being there for me."

translation.zh: West 曾在推文中称妻子试图将他送进医院关起来，他也针对岳母 Kris Jenner 进行了一系列指责。
translation.en: West's erratic tweets including claims his wife had tried to get him locked up by doctors and he made a series of accusations against his mother-in-law, Kris Jenner.

translation.zh: 他还说自己曾试图与 Kardashian West 离婚（两人于 2014 年结婚）。
translation.en: He also said he had tried to divorce Kardashian West, who he married in 2014.

translation.zh: West 四个孩子的母亲——Kardashian West 在担心丈夫精神状态的同时发表了一份冗长的声明，称她和家人“没有能力”进行干预，并提醒歌迷他患有双向情感障碍。
translation.en: Amid fears for her husband's state of mind, Kardashian West, the mother of West's four children, issued a lengthy statement saying she and her family were "powerless" to intervene and reminded fans he has bipolar disorder.

translation.zh: 她说：“他才华横溢但心思复杂，除了要承担身为艺术家和黑人的压力之外，他还经历过失去母亲的痛苦，也不得不承受因为双向情感障碍而加剧的压力和自我封闭。”
translation.en: She said: "He is a brilliant but complicated person who on top of the pressures of being an artist and a black man, who experienced the painful loss of his mother, and has to deal with the pressure and isolation that is heightened by his bi-polar disorder."

translation.zh: 她还补充说自己此前没有提到过他的病情，因为她“非常在意保护我们的孩子以及涉及 Kanye 健康状况的隐私”。
translation.en: She added that she has not discussed his condition before because she is "very protective of our children and Kanye's right to privacy when it comes to his health."

translation.zh: 她补充说：“但是今天，由于大众对心理健康存在误解，我觉得我应该对此作出说明。”
translation.en: She added: "But today, I feel like I should comment on it because of the stigma and misconceptions about mental health."

translation.zh: 在 7 月 19 日的一次活动中，West 提到曾考虑堕胎。
translation.en: West made his abortion claims during an event on July 19.

translation.zh: 一名涉嫌在大诺伊达杀害其酗酒兄弟的男子被捕警方
translation.en: Man Arrested For Allegedly Killing Alcoholic Brother In Greater Noida: Police

translation.zh: 警方称，他们在周日逮捕了一名 37 岁的男子，他涉嫌杀害了自己的兄弟并抛尸于北方邦大诺伊达一处偏僻的区域，尸体于一周前被发现。
translation.en: A 37-year-old man was arrested on Sunday for allegedly killing his brother, whose body was found dumped in an isolated area a week ago, in Uttar Pradesh's Greater Noida, the police said.

translation.zh: 有官员称，被告告诉警方，他的兄弟不仅酗酒，还对家庭里的女性成员动手动脚，这令他感到恼火，进而导致他犯罪。
translation.en: The accused told the police he was peeved by his brother's alcoholism and misbehaviour with women members of their joint family, which led him to the crime, according to officials.

translation.zh: 约一周前，有人在一处偏僻区域的树丛中发现了 Bhisham Singh 的尸体，死者是大诺伊达 Bisrakh 的一名村民。
translation.en: The body of Bhisham Singh, a resident of Bisrakh village in Greater Noida, was found near bushes in an isolated area around a week ago.

translation.zh: 警方发言人称，尸体上有刺伤的痕迹，Bisrakh 警局收到了第一信息报告 (FIR) 并启动调查程序。
translation.en: The body bore stab marks and an FIR was lodged at the Bisrakh police station and investigation taken up, a police spokesperson said.

translation.zh: 警方发言人称，“在调查过程中，我们发现证据指向了死者的兄弟 Deepak，于是我们对其进行了盘问。
translation.en: "During the probe, evidence led the police to the man, who died, his brother Deepak and he was questioned.

translation.zh: Deepak 在接受盘问时承认，是他将自己的兄弟捅死。
translation.en: When quizzed, Deepak confessed to stabbing his brother to death.

translation.zh: 他告诉警方，Bhisham 经常喝酒，在家里制造骚乱，还对家庭里的女性成员动手动脚，因此他决定杀死自己的兄弟。”
translation.en: He told the police that Bhisham would frequently consume alcohol, create ruckus at home and misbehave with women family members because of which he decided to kill his brother," the spokesperson said.

translation.zh: 警方称，该男子已被逮捕并面临谋杀及其他指控。
translation.en: The accused has been arrested and charged for murder and other related charges, the police said.

translation.zh: Tony Blair 因反对脱欧遭强烈抵制，发誓将继续干预英国政治
translation.en: Tony Blair vows never to stop meddling in British politics despite severe Brexit backlash

translation.zh: Tony Blair 与工党来往密切，参与了反对脱欧的活动，并遭到强烈抵制，但是他承诺，他决不会停止干预英国政治。
translation.en: Tony Blair has pledged not to stop intervening in UK politics, following severe backlash to his involvement in the Labour Party and anti-Brexit campaigning.

translation.zh: 已经在野十多年的 Blair 在天空新闻台的节目中告诉 Sophy Ridge，他“决不会”停止谈论英国政治。
translation.en: Mr Blair, who has been out of office for more than ten years, told Sophy Ridge on Sky News that he will "never" stop speaking out in British politics.

translation.zh: 不过，身为一名具有争议的政治人物，他承认，“很多观众可能认为，我应该停止谈论政治的事情。”
translation.en: However, the controversial political figure acknowledged "a lot of people watching this might think I should stop talking about things."

translation.zh: Sophy Ridge 告诉 Mr Blair：“我总觉得，你没办法远离政治。
translation.en: Sophy Ridge told Mr Blair: "I always get the sense you can't wrench yourself away from politics.

translation.zh: 你总是发表有关冠状病毒的报告或讨论脱欧事件。
translation.en: "You are always publishing reports on coronavirus or coming up with arguments on Brexit.

translation.zh: 我只是在想，大家是否好奇，为什么在卸任首相一职已经十年后，你还在尝试参与政治活动？
translation.en: "I just wonder if people think, why after ten years of being PM, are you still trying to be involved in politics?

translation.zh: 现在不正是抽点时间去高尔夫球场转一转的时候吗。”
translation.en: "Isn't it time to take some time out, go around the golf course."

translation.zh: 前首相 Blair 反驳了这种说法，发誓称他有生之年都会关注英国政坛。
translation.en: The former prime minister rejected this and vowed to stay around in UK politics as long as he can.

translation.zh: 他说：“那不是我想做的事。很多观众可能觉得我应该那样做，不要再谈论这些事，但我很在乎这个国家。”
translation.en: He said: "It's not something I want to do. A lot of people watching might think that's exactly what he should do and stop talking about things, but I care about the country."

translation.zh: “我们正处在世界发声巨变的时期，我建立的研究所在世界各地运转。
translation.en: "We are at a huge moment of change in the world and the institute I built works around the world.

translation.zh: 我知道，我做的一些事情是以前的首相没有做过的，但我认为，未来还会有很多人尝试去做同样的事。”
translation.en: "I know I've done something that previous prime ministers have not done but in the future I predict many more will try to do."

translation.zh: Blair 在访谈中还说，英国和欧盟仍有望在年底前就脱欧一事达成协议。
translation.en: Earlier in the interview, Mr Blair said that the UK and EU could still land a deal on Brexit before the end of the year.

translation.zh: 他说：“他们有望达成协议。即便如此，也不会是什么好的协议。”
translation.en: He said: "They could land a deal. But even the deal we land is going to be bad."

translation.zh: “从本质上来说，达成的协议对欧洲来说有好处，因为这会让货物贸易变得更加容易，但是，在服务方面，这项协议会对我们造成约束。”
translation.en: "It's essentially going to be good for Europe because it will allow easier trade in goods but very inhibiting for us on the issue of services."

translation.zh: 作为前工党党魁， Blair 还告诉天空新闻台，在可预见的未来，英国还无法彻底解决新冠疫情的问题，而只能与它共存。
translation.en: The former Labour leader also told Sky News the UK is going to be living with COVID-19, not eliminating it, for the foreseeable future.

translation.zh: 总理 Narendra Modi 悼念卡吉尔英雄，称巴基斯坦试图在印度“背后捅刀子”
translation.en: During Tribute To Kargil Heroes, PM Narendra Modi Says Pakistan Tried To "Backstab" India

translation.zh: 今天是卡吉尔战争 21 周年纪念日，印度总理 Narendra Modi 在悼念武装部队烈士时表示，尽管印度努力想维持友好关系，但巴基斯坦仍然试图在印度“背后捅刀子”。
translation.en: Pakistan tried to "backstab" India despite her attempts to keep friendly relations, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said today in his tribute to the armed forces on the 21st anniversary of Kargil war.

translation.zh: 总理 Modi 在每月一次的广播讲话节目 “Mann ki Baat” 中表示，“巴基斯坦造成了这场灾难，他们制定了阴险的计划来抢夺印度的土地，转移其国内冲突”。
translation.en: In his monthly radio address Mann ki Baat, PM Modi said "Pakistan undertook this misadventure with sinister plans to capture India's land and to divert its ongoing internal conflicts."

translation.zh: 他说：“巴基斯坦厚颜无耻，试图占领印度国土，转移民众对内部动荡的关注。”
translation.en: "Pakistan had the audacity of trying to occupy Indian soil and deviate attention from its own internal unrest," he said.

translation.zh: “当时，印度正在努力修复与巴基斯坦的关系。
translation.en: "At the time, India was trying for improve relations with Pakistan.

translation.zh: 但是，正所谓邪恶的本质就是毫无理由地与所有人作斗争。
translation.en: But as it is said, evil's nature is to fight everyone without reason.

translation.zh: 有这种本质的人只会作恶，哪怕对方想为他们做点好事。”
translation.en: People of this nature can only think of doing evil even to those who try to do them good.

translation.zh: 他说：“这就是为什么巴基斯坦不顾印度为维护关系所做的努力并在背后捅刀子的原因。”
translation.en: That's why Pakistan backstabbed India despite India's attempts at cordial relations," he said.

translation.zh: 他补充道：“想象一下，敌人盘踞在高高的山头，我们的军队却在下面与他们作战。但是，我们高涨的士气和真正的实力帮助我们打赢了山上的敌军。”
translation.en: "You can imagine, the enemy was perched high on the mountains while our forces were fighting them from below. But the high morale and true of our forces won against mountains," he added.

translation.zh: “我们英勇的武装部队使得印度在卡吉尔一战展示出巨大的力量，”总理 Modi 说道，同时回忆起他到访战区的所见所闻。
translation.en: "Thanks to the courage of our armed forces, India showed great strength in Kargil," PM Modi said, recalling his own visit to the area.

translation.zh: 印度每年都会举行活动庆祝卡吉尔胜利，纪念印度陆军夺回拉达克地区卡吉尔所有印度哨所的日子，这些哨所于 21 年前被巴基斯坦军队占领。
translation.en: Kargil Diwas is celebrated every year, marking the day the Indian Army recaptured all the Indian posts in Ladakh's Kargil that had been occupied by Pakistan's army 21 years ago.

translation.zh: 1999 年 7 月 26 日，印度陆军宣布 “Vijay 行动”圆满收官。
translation.en: On July 26, 1999, the Army had announced the successful culmination of "Operation Vijay."

translation.zh: 这场发生在拉达克地区冰雪高地的战争持续了近三个月，导致逾 500 名印度士兵死亡。
translation.en: The nearly three-month battle in the icy heights of Ladakh had claimed the lives of more than 500 Indian soldiers.

translation.zh: 今天早些时候，多位高官和军队领导也前往国家战争纪念馆的“无名战士纪念碑” (Amar Jawan Jyoti) 向烈士致敬，包括国防部长 Rajnath Singh、国防副部长 Shripad Naik、国防参谋长 Bipin Rawat、陆军参谋长 M M Naravane、空军司令 R K S Bhadauria 和海军上将 Karambir Singh。
translation.en: Earlier today, defence minister Rajnath Singh, his junior minister Shripad Naik, Chief of Defence Staff General Bipin Rawat, Army Chief General M M Naravane, Air Chief Marshal R K S Bhadauria and Navy Chief Admiral Karambir Singh also paid tributes at the Amar Jawan Jyoti at the National War Memorial.

translation.zh: 卡吉尔战争之后的几十年间，印度和巴基斯坦的关系因一系列恐怖袭击一直处于紧张状态。
translation.en: In the decades since Kargil, India-Pakistan relations have been strained following a series of terror strikes.

translation.zh: 印度坚称，谈判和恐怖袭击不能同时进行，巴基斯坦需要捣毁在其领土范围内活动的所有恐怖分子营地。
translation.en: India has insisted that talks and terror cannot go hand-in-hand and Pakistan needs to dismantle all the terror camps operating from its soil.

translation.zh: 网贷机构发出警告：中小企业贷款方案可能无法达成目的
translation.en: Online lenders warn SME loan scheme may miss the mark

translation.zh: 小型企业通常得不到大型银行的青睐，因此越来越频繁地通过网贷机构来满足资金需求。
translation.en: The small business sector, often under-served by the big banks, has increasingly turned to online lenders to meet its funding needs.

translation.zh: 然而，Callaghan 先生称，与大型银行相比，网贷机构并不具备优势，因为它们无法获得同样的低价资金，他还警告说，中小企业担保方案并不受欢迎。
translation.en: However, Mr Callaghan said online lenders were disadvantaged compared to the big banks because they did not have access to the same lower priced funding and warned as a result the SME guarantee scheme was not gaining traction.

translation.zh: 他说：“我认为这个方案很可能无法达成目的，人们给我们打电话，期望从我们这里获得非常便宜的资金，而不是由政府提供一半的贷款金额。”
translation.en: "I think it has probably missed the mark where all the people who call us, call in the expectation they can get very cheap funding rather than the government backing 50 per cent of the loan," he said.

translation.zh: “所以给我们打电话后，他们感到非常失望，因为有人表示希望拿到折扣价，而我们的融资成本却没有发生任何变化。”
translation.en: "So they call and they get very disappointed because the expectation has been put out there that there is discount pricing and we look at our cost of funding which hasn't changed at all."

translation.zh: Callaghan 先生补充道，如果金融科技企业有能力获得成本更低的融资，然后将资金转让给小型企业，那么这样一个方案就会“易如反掌”。“
translation.en: Mr Callaghan added if fintechs were able to access cheaper funding and pass that on to small businesses the scheme would be a "no brainer."

translation.zh: “这有点进退两难——大型银行能够以较低的成本获得资金，但他们更希望规避风险，因此他们实际上不会以相同的方式出借资金，他们不能访问数据，除非你有财产抵押，否则他们会没有安全感，” 他说，“除非我们能够获得更便宜的资金，否则我认为市场对这一方案的受欢迎程度抱有幻想。”
translation.en: "It's been a bit of a Catch 22 the major banks have got access to the lower cost funding but they are more risk averse so they don't actually go out to lend in the same way, they can't get access to the data and they can't get comfortable unless you have property," he said "Until we can access that cheaper funding I think there is a fiction out in the market on how popular the scheme is going to be."

translation.zh: 位于墨尔本的 Moula 也参与了该方案的制定，首席执行官 Aris Allegos 表示，政府方案中暗示的 50% 担保的收益应当让渡给小型企业，但不同的贷款机构会采取不同的处理方式。
translation.en: Melbourne-based Moula is also participating in the scheme and chief executive Aris Allegos said the benefit of the 50 per cent guarantee, implicit in the government scheme, should be passed on to small businesses but different lenders were handling this in different ways.

translation.zh: 他说：“我能够理解，其他人可能没有经历过这样的成本结构。”
translation.en: "I can understand there might be others who are not passing through that cost structure," he said.

translation.zh: “这可能关系到他们的资金结构，也可能关系到他们向哪些类别对象发放贷款以及如何评估这些类别的风险。”
translation.en: "That might be a function of how their funding is structured and it might be a function also of which categories they are lending into and how they assess risk within those categories."

translation.zh: Allegos 先生不愿意透露 Moula 根据该方案具体发放了多少贷款，但表示修改后的方案“集中反映了需要做出的改变”，从而为借贷双方带来更大的灵活性。
translation.en: Mr Allegos would not provide details of the number of loans Moula had issued under the scheme but said the revamped scheme was "a core recognition of what needed to change" to offer more flexibility to lenders and borrowers.

translation.zh: 但是，他表示自己非常担心正在运行的“双速经济”及其对小型企业的影响。
translation.en: However, he said his major concern was the "two speed economy" that was operating and the impact this would have on small businesses.

translation.zh: 他说：“就小型企业而言，Moula 和贷款机构面临的最大问题是大家所说的悬崖以及如何管理悬崖。”
translation.en: "The biggest issue Moula has to face and lenders with respect to small businesses is that proverbial cliff and how to manage into that cliff," he said.

translation.zh: “总体来说，尽管需求有一定增长，但还没有回到新冠疫情之前的水平。”
translation.en: "Generally speaking with respect to demand we have not returned to pre-COVID levels although appetite is growing."

translation.zh: 在澳大利亚证券交易所挂牌的网贷机构 Prospa 也不愿透露其根据方案发放的贷款额度，称这些属于商业敏感信息，但首席执行官 Greg Moshal 表示，政府扩展该方案的举措颇受欢迎。
translation.en: ASX-listed online lender Prospa also would not detail the amount of loans it had issued under the scheme as it said the information was commercially sensitive but chief executive Greg Moshal said the goverment's extension of the scheme was welcome.

translation.zh: 他说：“我们支持对该方案做出的各种增强，这些增强措施使得小型企业能够获得满足其需求的各种融资产品，包括灵活的短期现金流产品。”
translation.en: "We support any enhancements to the scheme that will enable small businesses to access a wide range of funding products that meet their requirements, including flexible cash flow products over shorter terms," he said.

translation.zh: 弗吉尼亚海滩市拆除南部同盟纪念碑
translation.en: Virginia Beach takes down Confederate monument

translation.zh: 弗吉尼亚海滩（弗吉尼亚）——周日，弗吉尼亚海滩市从公共区拆除了一座已有 115 年历史的南部同盟纪念碑。两天前，市议会一致决定对其进行拆除。
translation.en: VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. -- The city of Virginia Beach removed a 115-year-old Confederate monument from public grounds on Saturday, less than two days after the City Council voted unanimously to do so.

translation.zh: 据媒体报道，工人于周六早上拆除了这座 27 英尺（8.2 米）高的纪念碑。
translation.en: Workers took down the 27-foot (8.2-meter) tall monument on Saturday morning, media outlets reported.

translation.zh: 该纪念碑在 1905 年立于原来的安妮公主县法院外，奴隶拍卖会也曾在此进行。
translation.en: It was installed in 1905 and stood outside the old Princess Anne County courthouse, in the same place that slave auctions were once held.

translation.zh: 周四晚，市议会一致决定开展相关拆除工作。
translation.en: The council voted unanimously Thursday night to begin the removal process.

translation.zh: 市议会听取了几十位发言人的看法，认为该纪念碑对许多人而言意味着分裂，且不断让人想起悲痛的往事。
translation.en: The council had listened to dozens of speakers and decided the monument is viewed by many as divisive and a painful reminder of the past.

translation.zh: 鉴于最近针对其他几座纪念碑发生的抗议和破坏事件，目前这座纪念碑已经被完全遮盖起来，并在周围安置了上锁的大门。
translation.en: The statue recently had been completely covered, with a locked gate around it following recent protests and vandalism at other Confederate monuments.
