translation.zh: 该纪念碑将暂时留存。
translation.en: The monument will be stored for now.

translation.zh: 该市现在需要等待愿意处理这座纪念碑的历史组织或其他相关实体的响应。
translation.en: The city now must wait for any offers from historical groups or other entities that might want to take the monument.

translation.zh: 抗议活动持续，警方尝试使用新型低致命性工具
translation.en: Police try new, less-lethal tools as protests continue

translation.zh: 在波特兰以及全国各地，执法人员与示威者之间的暴力冲突不断，围绕如何减少警方使用致命武器的争论甚嚣尘上。
translation.en: As violent clashes continue between law enforcement and protesters in Portland and around the country, debate is swirling around how police can cut back on lethal force.

translation.zh: 一些公司正在加大力度提供警用遥控手铐等新型高科技工具，用来代替胡椒喷雾、橡皮子弹和闪光弹等危险性更高的武器。
translation.en: Some companies are stepping up to offer new high-tech tools like remote handcuffs for police to use instead of the more dangerous options like pepper spray, rubber bullets and flash grenades.

translation.zh: 人权组织大赦国际对 5 月 26 日至 6 月 5 日期间抗议活动的 500 个视频进行了分析，在 40 个州和哥伦比亚特区发现了 125 起过度使用武力的情况。
translation.en: Human rights group Amnesty International analyzed 500 videos from protests from May 26 through June 5 and found 125 incidents of excessive force across 40 states and the District of Columbia.

translation.zh: 大赦国际武器调查员 Brian Castner 表示：“我们看到了滥用催泪瓦斯、胡椒喷雾、胡椒球、40 毫米撞击弹的情况，基本上都是以不适当的方式组合使用各种低致命性武器。”
translation.en: "We saw a misuse of tear gas, pepper spray, pepper balls, 40 millimeter impact rounds, basically every combination of less-lethal weapon being used in inappropriate ways," said Amnesty International weapons investigator Brian Castner.

translation.zh: 一部分人仍然坚持这样一个观点——有选择对于避免使用枪支而言十分重要。
translation.en: Still, some insist that having options is important for avoiding the need for a firearm.

translation.zh: 前纽约警察局副督察 Corey Pegues 表示：“我们应当为警员提供各种随身装备，而不是使用枪支这样的致命武器，因为警察在美国是唯一一种由公民赋予权力夺取人性命的职业。”
translation.en: "All of these devices should be at hand for the cops to use other than deadly physical force being used by a firearm because it's the only profession in America where the citizens give you the right to take your life," said Corey Pegues, former New York Police Department Deputy Inspector.

translation.zh: 有一款最新工具叫做套索 (Bola Wrap)，这是一种手持式装备，可以发射长 8 英尺的凯夫拉绳索缠绕住犯罪嫌疑人。
translation.en: One of the newest tools is called the Bola Wrap, a handheld device that shoots out an 8-foot Kevlar cord that wraps around a suspect.

translation.zh: 其他新型装备还包括远距离声波设备（也称做声波加农炮）、使用激光加热人体皮肤的定向能量发射武器、由泡沫和白垩粉之类的材料制成的新型炮弹、臭弹以及电击枪。
translation.en: There are Long Range Acoustic Devices, also known as sound canons, directed energy weapons that use lasers to heat a person's skin, new projectiles made from things like foam and chalk, stink bombs, and of course the Taser.

translation.zh: 在 George Floyd 被警察杀害后的几天内，抗议活动演变为暴力事件，电击枪制造企业 Axon 的股价上涨超过 18％，创下历史新高。
translation.en: Shares of Axon, the company that makes the Taser, spiked more than 18%, reaching all-time highs when protests turned violent days after the police killing of George Floyd.

translation.zh: 预计到 2023 年，低致命性武器的市场总额将达到 118.5 亿美元。
translation.en: The market for less-lethal weapons is expected to reach $11.85 billion by 2023.

translation.zh: 观看视频，了解警方使用的新型高科技低致命性工具，了解如何监管这些工具的使用以及它们会给未来的治安维护和社区带来哪些风险。
translation.en: Watch the video to get a look at the new high-tech tools police are using for less-lethal force, how they're regulated, and what's at stake for the future of policing and the communities they serve.

translation.zh: 联合国称阿富汗驻扎有数千名巴基斯坦叛乱武装分子
translation.en: UN says thousands of anti-Pakistan militants in Afghanistan

translation.zh: 伊斯兰堡——联合国报告称，有超过 6,000 名巴基斯坦叛乱分子藏匿在阿富汗，其中大多数为非法的巴基斯坦塔利班组织，负责袭击巴基斯坦军用和民用目标。
translation.en: ISLAMABAD -- A U.N. report says more than 6,000 Pakistani insurgents are hiding in Afghanistan, most belonging to the outlawed Pakistani Taliban group responsible for attacking Pakistani military and civilian targets.

translation.zh: 根据本周发布的报告，这个被称为 Tehreek-e-Taliban (TTP) 的组织与伊斯兰国 (IS) 组织的阿富汗分支有相关联系。
translation.en: The report released this week said the group, known as the Tehreek-e-Taliban (TTP), has linked up with the Afghan-based affiliate of the Islamic State group.

translation.zh: 一些 TTP 的成员甚至加入了基地位于阿富汗东部的隶属于 IS 的组织。
translation.en: Some of TTP's members have even joined the IS affiliate, which has its headquarters in eastern Afghanistan.

translation.zh: 周日，阿富汗政府并未回复美联社对相关问题进行评论的请求。
translation.en: The Afghan government did not respond Sunday to requests by The Associated Press for comment.

translation.zh: 据报道称，阿富汗境内的 IS （即霍拉桑省 IS）受到阿富汗安全部队以及美国和北约部队的重创，有时还会遭受阿富汗塔利班的的袭击。
translation.en: The report said IS in Afghanistan, known as IS in Khorasan province, has been hit hard by Afghan security forces as well as U.S. and NATO forces, and even on occasion by the Afghan Taliban.

translation.zh: 该报告由分析支持和制裁监测小组撰写，该小组负责追踪世界各地的恐怖组织。
translation.en: The report was prepared by the U.N. analytical and sanctions monitoring team, which tracks terrorist groups around the world.

translation.zh: 报告估计，阿富汗的 IS 组织成员有 2,200 人，尽管其领导层被削弱，但该组织仍将一名叙利亚公民——Abu Said Mohammad al-Khorasani——视为头领之一。
translation.en: The report estimated the membership of IS in Afghanistan at 2,200, and while its leadership has been depleted, IS still counts among its leaders a Syrian national Abu Said Mohammad al-Khorasani.

translation.zh: 报告还提到，监测小组有消息称两名 IS 高级指挥官 Abu Qutaibah 和 Abu Hajar al-Iraqi 从中东抵达阿富汗。
translation.en: The report also said the monitoring team had received information that two senior Islamic State commanders, Abu Qutaibah and Abu Hajar al-Iraqi, had recently arrived in Afghanistan from the Middle East.

translation.zh: 报告写道，“IS 占领的领土虽然在减少，但他们仍然有能力在该国包括喀布尔在内的各个地区造成一定规模的袭击。
translation.en: "Although in territorial retreat, (the Islamic State) remains capable of carrying out high-profile attacks in various parts of the country, including Kabul.

translation.zh: 该组织还想要拉拢反对同美国签署协议的塔利班战士”。此处的协议指美国在二月份与塔利班签署的和平协议。
translation.en: It also aims to attract Taliban fighters who oppose the agreement with the United States," the report said, referring to a U.S. peace deal signed with the Taliban in February.

translation.zh: 这项协议的目的是为了让美国得以结束其在阿富汗 19 年之久的战争，并希望塔利班保证其领土不会被恐怖组织使用。
translation.en: That deal was struck to allow the U.S. to end its 19-year involvement in Afghanistan, and calls on the Taliban to guarantee its territory will not be used by terrorist groups.

translation.zh: 预计该协议还将确保塔利班全力投入到打击 IS 的战斗中。
translation.en: The deal is also expected to guarantee the Taliban's all-out participation in the fight against IS.

translation.zh: 协议第二部分——可能也是最重要的部分——则呼吁塔利班和喀布尔的政治领袖进行会谈。
translation.en: The second and perhaps most critical part of the agreement calls for talks between the Taliban and Kabul's political leadership.

translation.zh: 周六晚些时候，美国国务院发表声明，称其和平特使 Zalmay Khalilzad 仍忙碌奔波于该地区，试图推动因双方在囚犯释放计划上的争执而一再推迟的谈判事宜。
translation.en: Late Saturday, the U.S. State Department issued a statement saying its peace envoy Zalmay Khalilzad was again shuttling through the region seeking to jump start those negotiations, which have been repeatedly postponed as both sides squabble over a prisoner release program.

translation.zh: 这项美国支持的协议呼吁阿富汗政府释放 5,000 名塔利班囚犯，相应地，塔利班则需释放 1,000 名政府和军方人员，作为双方谈判前抛出的橄榄枝。
translation.en: The U.S.-backed deal calls for the Afghan government to release 5,000 Taliban prisoners and the Taliban to free 1,000 government and military personnel as a so-called good will gesture ahead of talks.

translation.zh: 目前，阿富汗政府拒绝释放其中约 600 名塔利班囚犯，并称之为高调犯罪者，但提议仅释放剩余的囚犯。
translation.en: Until now the government is refusing to release nearly 600 Taliban prisoners it calls high-profile criminals and has offered to free alternatives.

translation.zh: 塔利班方面则拒绝了政府的提议。
translation.en: The Taliban have refused.

translation.zh: “这是历史上双方最接近开展内部谈判的一次机会，亦是结束 40 年之久阿富汗战争的下一步关键举措”，美国国务院表示，
translation.en: "The parties are closer than ever to the start of intra-Afghan negotiations, the key next step to ending Afghanistan's 40-year long war," said the U.S. State Department statement.

translation.zh: “虽然在交换囚犯方面取得了重要进展，但仍然需要进一步的努力才能解决问题。”
translation.en: "Although significant progress has been made on prisoner exchanges, the issue requires additional effort to fully resolve."

translation.zh: 本周早些时候，塔利班的政治发言人表示，塔利班计划在月底古尔邦节（伊斯兰节日）结束后与喀布尔的政治领袖举行会谈，但前提是先要完成囚犯释放工作。
translation.en: The Taliban's political spokesman earlier this week said it was ready to hold talks with Kabul's political leaders after the Islamic holiday of Eid al-Adha at the end of the month, providing the prisoner release is completed.

translation.zh: 最令巴基斯坦担忧的问题就是阿富汗境内的武装分子，尤其是与 TTP、Jamaat-ul-Ahrar、Lashkar-e-Islam 或俾路支解放军有关联的武装分子，俾路支解放军在该月对信德省南部及俾路支省西南部发动了规模袭击。
translation.en: A big worry for Pakistan is the presence in Afghanistan of militants, particularly linked to the TTP or Jamaat-ul-Ahrar or Lashkar-e-Islam, as well as those with the Baluchistan Liberation Army, which has taken responsibility for high-profile attacks this month in the southern Sindh province as well as in southwestern Baluchistan Province.

translation.zh: 多名巴基斯坦军人在俾路支省西南部与武装分子的交战中牺牲。
translation.en: Several Pakistan military personnel have been killed this month in southwestern Baluchistan province in battle with insurgents.

translation.zh: TTP 组织在 2014 年对巴基斯坦发动了极为恐怖的一次袭击，导致巴基斯坦陆军学院 140 人死亡，
translation.en: The TTP took responsibility for one of the most horrific attacks in Pakistan in 2014, when a Pakistani army school was attacked and 140 were killed.

translation.zh: 其中多数为学生，有的年仅 5 岁。
translation.en: Most were students, and some were as young as 5.

translation.zh: 报告称，“驻扎在阿富汗的巴基斯坦境外恐怖势力威胁着两个国家的安全，粗略估计其人数为 6,000 至 6,500 人，其中大多数为 TTP 组织成员”。
translation.en: "The total number of Pakistani foreign terrorist fighters in Afghanistan, posing a threat to both countries, is estimated at between 6,000 and 6,500, most of them with TTP," the report said.

translation.zh: 英国最大银行汇丰银行否认在美国调查中对中国企业华为“设陷阱”——RT 电视台商业新闻
translation.en: Top British bank HSBC denies "setting up trap" for China's Huawei in US investigations - RT Business News

translation.zh: 总部位于伦敦的跨国银行汇丰银行（HSBC）通过社交媒体表示，该行没有像中国媒体报道的那样针对华为“捏造证据”，导致华为首席财务官在加拿大被捕。
translation.en: London-headquartered multinational bank HSBC took to social media to say it was not, as Chinese media claimed, "fabricating evidence" against Huawei, which led to the arrest of the company's chief financial officer in Canada.

translation.zh: 一篇现已不可见的微信文章中写道，银行表示他们的行为并没有引发美国对这家全球最大的电信网络设备供应商展开调查，因为对华为涉嫌违反美国对伊朗制裁的审查早在银行介入之前的 2016 年下半年就已经开始。
translation.en: In a now-unavailable post on WeChat, the lender said that its actions did not trigger US investigations into the world's largest supplier of telecommunications network equipment, as the scrutiny of Huawei for allegedly violating US sanctions on Iran began well before the bank's involvement in late 2016.

translation.zh: 银行于周六表示，“汇丰银行对华为没有任何敌意，不存在‘构陷’华为”的情况，并补充说绝不会扭曲有关客户的任何事实。
translation.en: "HSBC does not have any hostility towards Huawei and did not "frame" Huawei," the bank said on Saturday, adding that it would never distort any facts about its clients.

translation.zh: “为了对美国司法部（US DOJ）要求提供的信息做出回应，汇丰集团只是陈述了客观事实。
translation.en: "In response to US DOJ's [US Justice Department] requests for information, HSBC Group simply presented the objective facts.

translation.zh: 汇丰银行既没有‘捏造’证据，也没有‘掩盖’事实。”
translation.en: HSBC did not "fabricate" evidence or "hide" facts."

translation.zh: 平台屏蔽了这篇文章，提示其“违反规定”，目前已经看不到文章内容。
translation.en: The post has been blocked on the platform with a note that it "violates regulations" and is not available now.

translation.zh: 在多家中国媒体（包括有政府背景的报社）指责汇丰银行与华盛顿“密谋串通”为华为设下陷阱后，汇丰银行迅速作出这一说明。
translation.en: The statement comes shortly after multiple Chinese media outlets, including state-linked newspapers, accused HSBC of "conspiring" with Washington to set a trap for Huawei.

translation.zh: 2018 年 12 月，加拿大警方应美国相关部门要求拘捕华为首席财务官孟晚舟，此后一年半的时间里，这家公司一直是外交新闻的焦点。
translation.en: The company has been at the epicenter of a diplomatic scandal for more than a year and a half since Huawei CFO Meng Wanzhou was arrested in December 2018 in Canada on a warrant from the US.

translation.zh: 孟晚舟涉嫌利用空壳公司违反对伊朗的制裁，并且向银行隐瞒华为与伊朗公司 Skycom 之间的关系，因而面临欺诈指控。
translation.en: Meng faces fraud charges for allegedly using a shell company to violate sanctions against Iran and allegedly lying to banks about the link between Huawei and Iranian company Skycom.

translation.zh: 《环球时报》援引的新证据显示，汇丰银行此前非常清楚这家中国公司与 Skycom 之间的关系。
translation.en: According new evidence cited by the Global Times, HSBC was well aware of the Chinese company's relationship with Skycom.

translation.zh: 据报道，该行选择与美国政府“勾结”，为的是逃避在 2012 年受到的更严厉的处罚，当年汇丰银行被迫承认洗钱和违反制裁，其中就包括对伊朗的禁令。
translation.en: The bank reportedly opted to "collude" with the US government to escape more severe punishment in 2012, when the bank had to admit to money laundering and sanctions violations, including restrictions on Iran.

translation.zh: 当时该行被勒令缴纳约 19 亿美元罚金，并需要采取措施防范类似不当行为。
translation.en: It was ordered at the time to pay around $1.9 billion in penalties and to prevent any similar misconduct.

translation.zh: 在一篇针对此事件的文章中该报写道：“有证据表明，汇丰银行清楚地知道这一层关系，但刻意将客户的机密商业文件出售给美方，为的就是让美国政府忽略这家英国银行自身的不当行为，逃避根据 2012《暂缓起诉协议》应受的处罚。”
translation.en: "The evidence indicated that HSBC understood this relationship but intentionally sold out its customer's confidential business documents to the US side so that the US government could overlook the British bank's own misconduct and not punish it under the 2012 Deferred Prosecution Agreement," the newspaper said in one of its articles on the matter.

translation.zh: 这份由中国政府控制的报纸在公开警告中补充表示，如果证实银行存在“勾结”行为，可能会在中国（汇丰的主要市场之一）对其施以“严厉处罚”。
translation.en: In a veiled warning, the Beijing-controlled newspaper added that the lender, if proven to be guilty of this "collusion," could face "harsh punishment" in China, one of the major markets for HSBC.

translation.zh: 最近几周，这家知名银行已多次受到责难。
translation.en: It is not the first time the renowned bank has come under fire in recent weeks.

translation.zh: 上个月，汇丰银行因支持在香港实施新国家安全法而受到抨击，香港是汇丰的业务发源地，贡献了一半以上的利润。
translation.en: Last month, HSBC was lambasted for supporting the new national security law for Hong Kong, the city where its business started and which accounts for over half of its profits.

translation.zh: 汇丰银行陷入了两面不讨好的窘境：在西方，美国国务卿 Mike Pompeo 称其“卑躬屈膝”；在东方，中国媒体则表示其支持“姗姗来迟”。
translation.en: The bank faced criticism from both sides - from the West, with US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo calling the endorsement a "corporate kowtow," and the East, with the Chinese side reportedly saying that its support was "belated."

translation.zh: 安哥拉：Pedalé 医院移交卫生部监管
translation.en: Angola: Pedalé Hospital Assigned to Health Ministry

translation.zh: 罗安达——共和国总统 João Lourenço 于本周五决定，将位于罗安达正在建设中的 Pedro Maria Tonha Pedalé 医院的监管权移交卫生部。
translation.en: Luanda - The President of the Republic, João Lourenço, determined this Friday the transfer of the supervision of the Pedro Maria Tonha Pedalé Hospital, under construction in Luanda, to the sphere of the Ministry of Health.

translation.zh: 共和国总统新闻办公室在一份声明文件中表示，此举旨在落实政府的建设原则，扩大医院网络，确保公众得到更好的医疗和药品服务。
translation.en: In a note, the Press Office of the President of the Republic informs that the measure aims to materialize the Government principle of construction and expansion of the network of public hospitals to ensure better medical care and medication to the population.

translation.zh: 文件还提到，“在当前特殊情况下，该措施使得安哥拉人民能够拥有一家差异化的具有参考价值的医院，它配备有现代技术和用于诊断及治疗复杂疾病的精密仪器。”
translation.en: "In this specific case, the idea is to make available to Angolans a reference hospital, differentiated and equipped with modern technology and high precision in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of high complexity," the document reads.

translation.zh: 文中强调，安哥拉总统的决定也考虑到了该国人口的增长，这推动了人们对最为多样化的高质量保健服务的“庞大需求”。
translation.en: It stresses that the decision of the Angolan Head of State also takes into account the demographic growth of the country, which has motivated a "huge demand" for quality health services in the most diverse specialties.

translation.zh: 文件还指出，这一需求十分合理，因为医院囊括了与眼科和母婴医学相关的复杂疾病治疗、教学研究和干预，而这些领域的策略和管理理应属于卫生部的责任范畴。
translation.en: This demand, the note continues, justifies with the inclusion in the hospital specialized for the treatment of complex diseases, teaching and research, interventions related to ophthalmology and maternal-infant medicine, areas whose strategy and management deserve to be under the responsibility of the Ministry of Health.

translation.zh: 阿尔及利亚：Tebboune 总统哀悼 Mahmoud Ghamama——阿尔及利亚痛失一位爱国者，一名坚定的战士。
translation.en: Algeria: Mahmoud Guemama's Death - Algeria Loses a Patriot, Committed Militant, Says President Tebboune.

translation.zh: 阿尔及尔——共和国总统 Abdelmadjid Tebboune 向于周五逝世的全国人民议会议员 Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama 表示哀悼，并表示阿尔及利亚“痛失一位爱国者，一名投身于人民和祖国大业的战士”。
translation.en: Algiers - President of the Republic, Abdelmadjid Tebboune, sent a message of condolences to members of the People's National Assembly (APN), Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, who died Friday, in which he said that Algeria "has lost a patriot and a militant committed to the causes of his people and his nation."

translation.zh: Tebboune 总统在吊唁信中写道：“今天，Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama 离开了，阿尔及利亚痛失一位爱国者，一名投身于人民和祖国大业的战士，他从拿起武器的那一刻起就未曾动摇过，他的决心坚定不移，他与英勇的圣战者兄弟们并肩奋战，直到他在这个令我们悲痛万分的日子里咽下最后一口气，而我们只能尊听主的旨意。”
translation.en: Algeria loses today, by the death of Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, a patriot and a militant committed to the causes of his people and his nation, a man who has never wavered and whose determination remained intact from the moment he took up arms, alongside his valiant Mujahedeen brothers, until his last breath on this sad day when we can only resign ourselves to God's will," President Tebboune wrote in his message of condolence.

translation.zh: “已故的 Mahmoud Guemama——愿他安息——生于特别的一代，他们是充满信念、为国捐躯的爱国战士。”
translation.en: "The late Mahmoud Guemama, peace be upon him, belonged to a unique generation of faithful patriotic militants who sacrificed themselves for their homeland," added President of the Republic.

translation.zh: “1960 年，他们在生命最辉煌的时期加入了 Wilaya VI 的 Tahart 训练营，加入了革命的队列，从卑劣的殖民主义魔爪中解放了阿尔及利亚，献出了自己的生命。”
translation.en: "The deceased devoted his life to the liberation of Algeria from the torments of abject colonialism, by joining the ranks of the Revolution in the prime of life in 1960 in the Tahart training camp of the historic wilaya VI."

translation.zh: “这位已故的领导人具有战斗精神，投身于建设一个团结繁荣的阿尔及利亚，他的名字也因此家喻户晓。”
translation.en: "The late President is known to all for his proven militancy and his commitment to anchoring the image of a prosperous and united Algeria," said President Tebboune.

translation.zh: 总统补充道：“在遥远的南方地区，Mahmoud Guemama 是备受敬仰的调解者，一旦不和的火花被擦亮，他便置身其中，帮助同胞们达成和解。”
translation.en: "In the far south, the late Mahmoud Guemama enjoys great renown as a mediator, intervening to reconcile brothers in the same country whenever the fire of discord is kindled," added the President in his message.

translation.zh: “这些品质和价值观让 Mahmoud Guemama 赢得了塔曼拉塞特人民的尊重和信任，推举他在全国人民议会中担任多个任期的人民代表，它是该地区人民关心的问题和人民意愿的大使和捍卫者，也是所有阿尔及利亚人民的代言人。”
translation.en: "All these qualities and values earned the late Mahmoud Guemama the respect and trust of the people of Tamanrasset who chose him to represent them in the People's National Assembly (APN) for several terms, during which he was the ambassador and defender of the concerns of the region and the aspirations of its people, and even the representative and spokesman of all Algerians," wrote the President of the Republic.

translation.zh: “没有任何吊唁足以歌颂 Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama，愿他安息。
translation.en: "All expressions of condolence will not be enough to pay tribute to the mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, peace be upon him.

translation.zh: 今天，他在阿尔及利亚最需要他的时刻离开了我们”，总统说。
translation.en: He is leaving us today at a time when Algeria needs him," said the President.

translation.zh: 最后，Tebboune 总统说：“我向全能的真主祷告，让逝者沐浴在您圣洁慈悲的光芒中，在无垠的天堂，与 shuhadaa 和贤者们一同迎接他的到来。
translation.en: "I pray to Almighty God to surround the deceased with His Holy Mercy, to welcome him in His vast paradise alongside the shuhadaa and virtuous.

translation.zh: 我祈求真主给予他的家人和爱人耐心与慰藉......唯有您有无上的力量。”
translation.en: I also pray to God to lend his family and loved ones patience and comfort...there is no strength or power except in God," the President of the Republic concluded.

translation.zh: 新冠疫情旅行指南：对保加利亚旅客实施入境限制的国家
translation.en: Coronavirus Travel Update: Which Countries Have Travel Restriction for Bulgarians Upon Entry

translation.zh: 实行旅行限制的国家越来越多。从本周开始，捷克共和国希望对保加利亚季节工进行新冠病毒检测。丹麦规定，只有在该国登记了住所、拥有雇佣合同或商务旅行证明文件的保加利亚公民才能入境。
translation.en: The number of countries imposing travel restrictions is growing. As of this week, the Czech Republic wants coronavirus tests for Bulgarian seasonal workers. Denmark allows Bulgarians on its territory only if they have an address registration there, an employment contract or a document certifying a business trip.

translation.zh: 从今天开始，在过去 14 天内到访过保加利亚和罗马尼亚的人必须在意大利接受强制隔离。芬兰只接受有“正当理由”的入境旅客。
translation.en: As of today, people who have visited Bulgaria and Romania in the last 14 days are subject to mandatory quarantine in Italy. In Finland, entry is only for a "valid reason."

translation.zh: 奥地利规定，即使 PCR 测试结果为阴性，也需要接受强制性居家隔离。德国对入境人员也实施了相同的政策。在未来 14 天，如果没有充分的理由，不得进入罗马尼亚南部。希腊在其陆地边境采取了更严格的措施。
translation.en: Mandatory home quarantine in Austria, despite a negative PCR test. This is already required for those entering Germany. For the next 14 days, access to southern Romania was denied without good reason. And Greece has tightened measures even more along its land borders.

translation.zh: 外交部宣布，自周二起，从保加利亚飞抵希腊的人员必须向希腊边境机构出示新冠病毒 PCR 测试阴性证明，测试需要在进入希腊南部邻国之前的 72 小时内完成。
translation.en: From Tuesday, those traveling by plane from Bulgaria to Greece will have to present to the Greek border authorities a negative result from a PCR test for coronavirus, performed up to 72 hours before their entry into our southern neighbor, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced.

translation.zh: 他们还宣布，旅客必须持有相应的测试证明才允许入境。证明必须以英文出具，包含旅客护照或身份证上的对应的三个名字和编号。如果证明不符合以上要求，南部邻国当局则不会接受。
translation.en: They added that only passengers who have a certificate for such a test will be allowed in the country. It must be issued in English and contain the three names and numbers of the passenger's passport or identity card. The authorities in our southern neighbor will not accept certificates that do not meet these requirements

translation.zh: “旅客需通过提取口/鼻分泌物的方式在实验室完成 RT-PCR 测试。接受的测试结果包括在国家参考实验室、国家卫生实验室或得到相关国家认证机构认证的私人实验室（不一定是专门针对新冠病毒实验室）进行新冠病毒测试后得到的结果。
translation.en: "Travelers should be tested in the laboratory by RT-PCR by taking secretions from the mouth or nose. Tests for coronavirus will be recognized if they are performed in national reference laboratories, national health laboratories or private laboratories that are accredited by the relevant national accreditation bodies (not necessarily specifically for COVID-19).

translation.zh: 希腊公民、定居希腊的公民以及有重大专业原因的旅客不适用该措施。
translation.en: The measure does not apply to Greek citizens, citizens residing in Greece and travelers for significant professional reasons.

translation.zh: 希腊外交部还宣布，7 月 28 日（星期二）和 7 月 29 日（星期三）抵达希腊的旅客，如果在出发之前没有来得及进行测试，将在抵达后由希腊当局进行检测。
translation.en: The Greek Ministry of Foreign Affairs also announced that on Tuesday, July 28, and Wednesday, July 29, passengers who did not have time to be tested before their trip will be tested by the competent Greek authorities upon arrival in Greece.

translation.zh: 下列要求依然有效：搭乘飞机前往希腊的旅客必须提前至少 24 小时填写电子版《旅客定位表》（PLF）生成二维码，并在抵达希腊境内后向希腊当局提交该表格。更多信息参见 travel.gov.gr
translation.en: The requirement for citizens traveling by plane to Greece to fill in at least 24 hours in advance an electronic Passenger Location Form (PLF) generating a QR code, which they present to the Greek authorities upon entering the country, remains in force. More information is published on travel.gov.gr

translation.zh: 目前，针对往返保加利亚与希腊之间陆地边境的要求没有变化。外交部解释称，“穿越陆地边境进入希腊的旅客，无论国籍，均需在抵达前至少 24 小时填写电子版《旅客定位表》（PLF）生成二维码。”
translation.en: At the moment there is no change in the requirements for crossing the land borders between Bulgaria and Greece. "Travelers to Greece across the land border, regardless of their citizenship, must also fill in an electronic passenger localization form (PLF) generating a QR code at least 24 hours before arrival," the Foreign Ministry explained.

translation.zh: 关闭 Ilinden、Kapitan Petko Voyvoda 和 Makaza 检查站导致 Petrich 附近边境的交通流量增加。过境不存在问题，没有卡车排队现象。这些人都等着从希腊出海。旅客需等待大约一个半小时才能过境。
translation.en: The closure of the Ilinden, Kapitan Petko Voyvoda and Makaza checkpoints has increased traffic across the border near Petrich. There are no problems with the transition. There are no queues of trucks. All those waiting go to sea in Greece. Travelers wait about an hour and a half to cross the Tower.

translation.zh: 保加利亚与希腊边境有三座检查站开放。目前只有 “Ilinden - Exohi” 和 Ivaylovgrad 的这一段关闭。
translation.en: Three of the points on the Bulgarian-Greek border are working. Only "Ilinden - Exohi" and this part of Ivaylovgrad are closed.

translation.zh: Dominic Cummings 到访 SAS 基地，被扣为“人质”
translation.en: Dominic Cummings is held hostage by the SAS... on base tour

translation.zh: 首相首席顾问上周在参观基地时体验了一把被扣为“人质”的滋味
translation.en: PM's chief adviser underwent the experience last week during a tour of the base

translation.zh: 对于某些被骚扰过的公务员来说，用枪指着 Dominic Cummings 的头将其扣为人质这种想法可能别有一番风味。
translation.en: The idea of Dominic Cummings being held hostage with rifles pointed at his head might be one for some harassed civil servants to secretly savour.

translation.zh: 态度强硬的首相首席顾问上周到访 SAS 总部斯特林防线的时候，就亲身体验了一下个中滋味。
translation.en: But the Prime Minister's uncompromising chief adviser underwent just this experience last week during a tour of the SAS headquarters, Stirling Lines.

translation.zh: 《星期日邮报》透露出，他周三的部分行程包括参观“室内反恐训练屋”，精锐士兵在这样的地方磨练对付恐怖分子的技巧。
translation.en: The Mail on Sunday can reveal that part of his visit on Wednesday involved a trip to the "Killing House" where elite soldiers hone their skills on tackling terrorists.

translation.zh: 他还在引导下参观了赫里福德基地，检查了该军团的军事装备，听取了有关近期行动的简报，包括为清除伊拉克的伊斯兰国恐怖分子所做的努力。
translation.en: The guided tour of the Hereford base also included an inspection of the regiment's military hardware and a briefing on recent operations, including efforts to eliminate Islamic State terrorists in Iraq.

translation.zh: 斯特林防线的重要访客都受到了特别的欢迎——体验一下“室内反恐训练屋”，SAS 在这座两层楼的建筑中练习近身格斗。
translation.en: High-profile visitors to Stirling Lines are offered an unusual welcome - a turn in the "Killing House," a two-storey building where the SAS practise close-quarter fighting.

translation.zh: 戴安娜王妃也曾到访过这里，在 1983 年的一次训练中，她的秀发不慎被投出的手榴弹的火花点着。
translation.en: Previous guests include Princess Diana, whose hair caught fire thanks to a spark from a grenade thrown during an exercise in 1983.

translation.zh: 据了解，Cummings 先生乘坐直升飞机抵达，基地以军团创始人 David Stirling 上校的名字命名。
translation.en: It is understood that Mr Cummings arrived at the base - named in honour of the regiment's founder, Colonel David Stirling - by helicopter.

translation.zh: 他还参观了邻近的 Pontrilas 军训区，该区驻扎了其他几个绝密单位。
translation.en: He also visited the neighbouring Pontrilas Army Training Area where other top-secret units are based.

translation.zh: 此次参观是他巡访高度保密的英国安全设施当中的一站，巡访引起了政界人士和军方领导的​​关注。
translation.en: The visit was part of his tour of Britain's highly classified UK security installations that has raised eyebrows among politicians and military chiefs.

translation.zh: 有关其计划的消息于本月早些时候传出时，保守党后座议员、下议院国防特别委员会主席 Tobias Ellwood 表示，国会议员应当获得与部长和公务员一样的机会，向他询问国防和安全事务。
translation.en: When news of his plans emerged earlier this month, Tobias Ellwood, a Tory backbencher and chair of the Commons Select Defence Committe, said MPs should be given the same opportunity to question him about defence and security matters as they are afforded for Ministers and civil servants.

translation.zh: 特别委员会要求政界人士任命的特别顾问提供证词的情况很少见。
translation.en: Special advisers, who are appointed by politicians, are rarely required to give evidence to select committees.

translation.zh: 据了解，SAS 高级官员利用周三的活动来凸显维持皇家海军陆战队和空降兵团人数的重要性。
translation.en: It is understood that senior SAS officers used Wednesday's event to stress the importance of maintaining the number of personnel in the Royal Marines and the Parachute Regiment.

translation.zh: 据此前报道，为节省开支，这些为特种部队输送了大量人员的单位有可能会缩编或合并。
translation.en: It has been reported that these units, which provide the majority of Special Forces troops, could shrink or be merged to save money.

translation.zh: 一位国防消息人士称：“SAS 由 250 名士兵组成，一半以上此前是空降兵，特别舟艇中队（SBS）的规模更小，如果没有皇家海军陆战队的支持，可能难以延续。”
translation.en: "More than half the soldiers in the 250-man SAS were previously Paras while the even smaller Special Boat Service (SBS) couldn't continue without the support of the Royal Marines," said a defence source.

translation.zh: “Cummings 被告知必须完整保留这些单位。”
translation.en: "So Cummings was told that these units must be preserved in their entirety."

translation.zh: Cummings 先生曾经抱怨军事采购“继续在让几十亿英镑打水漂”，他最近出席了在 MI5 和 MI6 总部召开的会议，也有计划参观位于多塞特郡普尔市的 SBS 总部以及位于威尔特郡波顿唐的国家绝密实验室。
translation.en: Mr Cummings, who has complained that military procurement "has continued to squander billions of pounds," recently attended meetings at the headquarters of MI5 and MI6 and is also planning to visit the SBS's headquarters in Poole, Dorset, along with the Government's top secret laboratories at Porton Down in Wiltshire.

translation.zh: 国防部昨晚没有对置评请求做出回应。
translation.en: Last night, the Ministry of Defence did not respond to a request for comment.

translation.zh: 《周日早晨》日场：致敬 Rodgers 和 Hart
translation.en: "Sunday Morning" Matinee: Celebrating Rodgers & Hart

translation.zh: 2020 年是百老汇最具传奇色彩的音乐剧二人组之一 Richard Rodgers 和 Lorenz Hart 搭档首秀一百周年。
translation.en: 2020 marks the centenary of the Broadway debut of the first professional collaboration by one of musical theater's most legendary duos, Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart.

translation.zh: 为了向这二位歌曲创作人致敬，百老汇明星 Jelani Alladin（《冰雪奇缘》、《大力神》）和 Christiani Pitts（《金刚》、《四海情深》）以及舞蹈演员 Richard Riaz Yoder（《我爱红娘》、《Shuffle Along》）在 Rodgers 和 Hart 原作品基础上共同演绎了一场现代风格的——《流浪女郎》，这也是为《周日早晨》的观众特别录制的节目。
translation.en: To honor their songwriting legacy, Broadway stars Jelani Alladin ("Frozen," "Hercules") and Christiani Pitts ("King Kong," "A Bronx Tale"), along with dancer Richard Riaz Yoder ("Hello, Dolly!," "Shuffle Along"), present a modern take on the Rodgers & Hart standard "The Lady Is a Tramp," recorded especially for the "Sunday Morning" audience.

translation.zh: 鼓手 Bryan Carter 负责演出的音乐指导和编排，同台表演的还有贝斯手 Russell Hall。
translation.en: Music direction and arrangements by drummer Bryan Carter, who performs alongside bassist Russell Hall.

translation.zh: 美国加州拉森县山火得到控制
translation.en: Firefighters gain ground on Lassen County blazes

translation.zh: 位于美国加州萨克拉门托县东北部的拉森县日前爆发了两场山火，过火面积已超 12,141 公顷，目前消防员仍在奋力扑救。
translation.en: Firefighters are gaining ground against two wildfires that have burned more than 30,000 acres in Lassen County, northeast of Sacramento.

translation.zh: 加州消防部门表示，截至周六早上，阿丁地区南部爆发的 “Gold” 山火仅有 40% 得到控制，仍有大量房屋和牧场面临大火威胁，可能对当地农业、畜牧业及木业造成极大影响。
translation.en: The Gold fire, which started south of Adin, is 40% contained as it continues to threaten homes and ranches as well as agriculture, livestock and timber operations, Cal Fire officials said in an update Saturday morning.

translation.zh: 火势已持续四天，烧毁约 8,498 公顷土地和七所房屋，并造成两名消防员受伤送医。
translation.en: After burning for four days, the fire has chewed through 21,000 acres, destroyed seven homes and sent two firefighters to the hospital.

translation.zh: 消防员连夜利用有限条件打通防火线并进行加固。
translation.en: Overnight, firefighters took advantage of milder conditions to build and reinforce control lines.

translation.zh: 但据天气预报显示，当日为大风、低湿度天气。
translation.en: But gusty winds and low humidity are expected through Saturday.

translation.zh: 苏珊维尔西部爆发的 “Hog” 山火已烧毁两栋建筑和约 4,047 公顷土地。
translation.en: West of Susanville, a smaller fire known as the Hog fire has destroyed two structures and consumed about 10,000 acres.

translation.zh: 加州森林及防火局表示，经消防员彻夜打通和加固防火线，火势已得到控制。
translation.en: The fire settled down overnight as firefighters worked to mop up and strengthen control lines, according to the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection.

translation.zh: 截至周六早上，山火已持续六天，45% 的火势得以控制。
translation.en: By Saturday morning, it was 45% contained and had been burning for six days.

translation.zh: 由于苏珊维尔地区日间气温超 32.2 摄氏度，部分地块存在阴燃风险。
translation.en: In the daytime heat, with temperatures above 90 degrees in the Susanville area, smoldering patches were at risk of flaring up.

translation.zh: 虽然部分居民可陆续返家，但两个火场仍有部分区域受强制疏散令管控。
translation.en: While some residents are being allowed to return to their homes, some areas in both fire zones remain under mandatory evacuation orders.

translation.zh: 在 “Gold” 山火救援行动中受伤的两名消防员已平安出院。
translation.en: The two firefighters injured in the Gold fire have been released from the hospital.

translation.zh: 苏格兰-英格兰联合链桥历经 200 年岁月
translation.en: Scotland-England Union Chain Bridge is 200 years old

translation.zh: 连接苏格兰和英格兰的一座大桥如今已有 200 年历史，并且，将有 1,000 万英镑的资金投入到其整修工作中。
translation.en: A bridge linking Scotland and England has turned 200 years old ahead of a £10m renovation.

translation.zh: 这座联合链桥横跨特威德河，连接苏格兰边境的菲什威克和诺森伯兰郡的霍恩克利夫。
translation.en: The Union Chain Bridge crosses the River Tweed from Fishwick in the Scottish Borders to Horncliffe in Northumberland.

translation.zh: 这座桥于 1820 年投入使用，跨距长达 449 英尺（137 米），是当时世界上最长的锻铁吊桥，
translation.en: When it opened in 1820, it was the longest wrought iron suspension bridge in the world with a span of 449ft (137m).

translation.zh: 同时也是英国第一座该类型的行车桥。
translation.en: It was also the first vehicular bridge of its type in the UK.

translation.zh: 这座桥由英国皇家海军军官 Samuel Brown 上校设计。
translation.en: The bridge was designed by English Royal Navy officer Capt Samuel Brown.

translation.zh: 由于曾因船体挣脱绳索损失过多艘军舰，因此，他制造出锻铁链并申请了专利。
translation.en: He patented and produced wrought iron chains after being affected by the loss of Royal Naval ships which had broken free from ropes.

translation.zh: 联合链桥之友组织 (Friends of the Union Chain Bridge) 和苏格兰土木工程师协会 (ICE) 正在庆祝它的两百周年纪念日。
translation.en: Friends of the Union Chain Bridge and the Institution of Civil Engineers (Ice) Scotland have been marking the crossing's bicentennial.

translation.zh: 联合链桥之友组织的 Robert Hunter 表示：“这座桥是名副其实的世界上历史最悠久的大桥之一，同时也是一项了不起的工程。
translation.en: Robert Hunter, of the friends group, said: "This is truly one of the most historic bridges in the world and a fascinating piece of engineering.

translation.zh: 我们原本计划了多项庆祝活动来纪念这一时刻，但目前不得不推迟。
translation.en: "We had planned a number of celebrations to mark the occasion, but unfortunately they have had to be postponed.

translation.zh: 但不管怎么说，即将展开的 1,000 万英镑的整修工程或许才是最好的‘生日礼物’，而且这让之后的几代人都能经历它的辉煌。”
translation.en: "However, the fact that work is shortly going to begin on the £10m renovation is the best birthday present possible and will ensure generations to come will be able to enjoy the bridge in all its splendour."

translation.zh: 土木工程师协会主席 Hannah Smith 认为这座桥是苏格兰工程遗产中常常被忽略的部分。
translation.en: Ice Scotland director Hannah Smith described the bridge as an "often-overlooked" part of Scotland's engineering heritage.

translation.zh: 她说：“我们都知道它享誉世界，而且最棒的是，相关的整修工作很快就会展开”。
translation.en: She said: "We know it is renowned the world over and it is fantastic that work will shortly commence on its renovation."

translation.zh: 朝鲜开成发现新冠疑似病例并实施紧急状态
translation.en: North Korea declares state of emergency as Covid-19 case reported

translation.zh: 据朝中社周日报道，朝鲜领导人 Kim Jong-un 出席并主持政治局紧急扩大会议，宣布在开成实施紧急状态，此前一名疑似感染新冠肺炎的人员从韩国偷越国境进入朝鲜。
translation.en: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un convened an emergency politburo meeting after a person suspected of having Covid-19 returned from South Korea after illegally crossing the border this month, state media said on Sunday.

translation.zh: 若被确诊，这将是自新冠疫情暴发后朝鲜官方确认的首例病例，此前，据朝鲜官方说法，未在该国境内发现感染病例。
translation.en: If confirmed, it would be the first case officially acknowledged by North Korean authorities, who have so far said the country has no confirmed cases of coronavirus.

translation.zh: 据国家通讯社朝中社报道，Kim 获悉情况后下令封锁了开城市，宣布在该地区实施紧急状态，并称之为“可以猜测该传染性极高的病毒已进入朝鲜境内的危急情况”。
translation.en: Kim declared a state of emergency and imposed a lockdown on the border city of Kaesong, calling it a "critical situation in which the vicious virus could be said to have entered the country," state news agency KCNA reported.

translation.zh: 报道指出，一名三年前逃往韩国的“脱北者”非法越过朝韩边境返回朝鲜，经检查发现该非法越境者疑似感染新冠病毒。
translation.en: According to KCNA, a person who defected to South Korea three years ago returned across the fortified border that divides the two Koreas with symptoms that suggested Covid-19.

translation.zh: 朝中社报道称：“开成市发生紧急情况，一名三年前逃往韩国的“脱北者”于 7月 19 日非法越过朝韩边境返回该市，此人疑似已感染新冠病毒。”
translation.en: "An emergency event happened in Kaesong city where a runaway who went to the south three years ago, a person who is suspected to have been infected with the vicious virus returned on 19 July after illegally crossing the demarcation line," KCNA said.

translation.zh: 朝中社的报道并未提到是否对此人进行了检测，只是说“经多次检查此人的上呼吸道分泌物和血液，结果判断其为新冠肺炎疑似病例”，相关报道还呼吁防疫机关对该越境者采取隔离措施，并追踪与其接触过的所有人员。
translation.en: KCNA did not specifically mention whether the individual had been tested, but said an "uncertain result was made from several medical check-ups of the secretion of that person's upper respiratory organ and blood," prompting officials to quarantine the person and investigate anyone he may have been in contact with.

translation.zh: 自疫情以来，朝鲜已收到俄罗斯等国家提供的数以千计的新冠病毒检测试剂，并实施了严格的边境关闭措施。
translation.en: North Korea has received thousands of coronavirus testing kits from Russia and other countries, and imposed strict border closures.

translation.zh: 目前数千人已被隔离，但最近限制有所放宽。
translation.en: Thousands of people in the secretive nation were quarantined, but restrictions had recently eased.

translation.zh: 最近几周，朝鲜还组织了一场运动，批判那些逃往韩国的“脱北者”为“人渣”，并要求韩国停止向朝鲜发放宣传材料和粮食援助以鼓动民众脱北。
translation.en: In recent weeks, North Korea has also stepped up a campaign criticising defectors to South Korea as "human scum" and calling for South Korea to crack down on groups that send propaganda messages and food aid into the North.

translation.zh: Kim 下令对越境事件案发地区的部队进行深入调查，“严惩相关涉事人员，并采取相应措施”。
translation.en: Kim ordered an investigation into the military units along the border where the person was suspected of crossing to "administer a severe punishment and take necessary measures."

translation.zh: 想比中国，澳大利亚民主制度面临的威胁更加迫在眉睫
translation.en: Threats to Australian democracy are closer to home than China

translation.zh: 联邦议会近期通过或审议中的一系列措施引起了人们对本土集权主义的担忧。
translation.en: But a series of recently passed or pending measures in the Commonwealth Parliament give rise to concerns about our own, home-grown authoritarianism.

translation.zh: 这些措施包括推广面部识别技术、强制要求技术公司解密客户的计算机系统中保存的信息、强制要求技术公司在不通知信息所有者的情况下提供访问客户云端信息的权限，以及扩大澳大利亚安全情报局 (ASIO) 的强制询问权。
translation.en: They include a roll out of facial recognition technology, forcing technology companies to decrypt information held on their customers" computer systems, forcing technology companies to provide access to their customers" cloud-based information without notification to the owner of the information and extending ASIO's compulsory questioning powers.

translation.zh: 这些措施导致人们对公民与政府之间的边界问题产生强烈质疑，《ASIO 法案》则尤其令人感到不安。
translation.en: These measures raise serious questions about the border between citizens and government, but the ASIO Bill is particularly worrying.

translation.zh: 与其他五眼联盟国家（美国、加拿大、英国和新西兰）不同的是，在 911 事件之后，澳安全情报局有权对牵涉恐怖主义行为的人员进行为期最高 7 天的强制性询问。
translation.en: Unlike any of the other Five Eyes countries - United States, Canada, the United Kingdom and New Zealand - in the wake of September 11, ASIO was given power to compulsorily question people for up to seven days in relation to terrorism offences.

translation.zh: 虽然人们可以接受采取非常手段来应对与恐怖主义相关的极端暴力行为，但极端暴力行为至少为这些非常手段划出了一条明确的界线。
translation.en: While it might be accepted that the extreme violence associated with terrorism offences justifies extraordinary powers - extreme violence at least offers a bright line border around these extraordinary powers.

translation.zh: 这显然指的不是用法案中如下“笼统和模糊”的定义来启动强制询问权：处理有损澳大利亚“与其他国家之间的政治、军事或经济关系”的信息；与国外势力联手进行的秘密或欺骗行为以及“有损澳大利亚利益”的行为。
translation.en: That certainly cannot be said about the "sweeping and vague" definitions used in this bill to trigger the compulsory questioning power: dealing with information which prejudices Australia's "political, military or economic relations with another country"; or activities in collaboration with a foreign power which are clandestine or deceptive and are "detrimental to Australia's interests."

translation.zh: 很难想象还有哪些国家安全“立法”比这一条法案更为“笼统和模糊”。
translation.en: It is hard to imagine more "sweeping and vague "national security" legislation" than this.

translation.zh: 不仅仅是嫌疑人，澳安全情报局将有权针对这些情况强制询问任何人。
translation.en: ASIO would be allowed to compulsorily question anyone about these things - not just suspected offenders.

translation.zh: 询问对象包括记者、商人、高校学者和工作人员、律师、公民、居民以及游客。
translation.en: This includes journalists, business people, university academics and staff, lawyers, citizens, residents and visitors.

translation.zh: 澳安全情报局只需要证明询问“极其有助于”有关海外干预的“情报收集”——这一点似乎是该法案的主要目的——
translation.en: ASIO would simply have to show the questioning would "substantially contribute to the collection of intelligence" about foreign interference, which seems to be the main target of the bill.

translation.zh: 即可对某人进行最高 40 个小时的询问（不包含休息时间）。
translation.en: The person could then be questioned for up to 40 hours (not including breaks).

translation.zh: 拒不接受询问的人将会被拘捕。
translation.en: If the person refused to attend, they would be arrested.

translation.zh: 拒绝回答或是提供错误或误导性信息，将面临最高五年的监禁。
translation.en: Refusal to answer or giving false or misleading answers would carry a maximum five year sentence.

translation.zh: 这条法案推翻了我国法律体系中的受到美国宪法保护的基本规则。
translation.en: Rules that are fundamental in our legal systems - indeed protected by the constitution in the United States - are overturned by this bill.

translation.zh: 人们（包括已经面临指控的人）将被迫提供证据，而这些证据可以用来对他们进行起诉。
translation.en: People - including people already facing charges - will be compelled to provide evidence that may then be used to prosecute them.

translation.zh: 他们可以有一名律师在场，但律师只限于对模棱两可或不清楚的问题进行澄清。
translation.en: They could have a lawyer present, but the lawyer would be confined to clarifying questions that were ambiguous or unclear.

translation.zh: 新法案将签发询问令的决定权由法官移交给司法部长。
translation.en: The new bill transfers the decision to issue a questioning warrant from a judge to the Attorney-General.

translation.zh: 正如情报和安全监察长指出，这一法案“与五眼联盟其他国家对外部授权提高要求的趋势背道而驰”。
translation.en: As pointed out by the Inspector-General of Intelligence and Security, this "departs from the trend for increased requirements for external authorisation in other Five Eyes jurisdictions."

translation.zh: 它也违背了三权分立原则，该原则要求法院审查政府行政部门的行为。
translation.en: It also breaches the separation of powers principle that courts scrutinise the actions of executive government.

translation.zh: 新法案还提出，将询问权扩大到覆盖 14 周岁以上的青少年，前提是这些人已经从事或可能从事不利于保护澳大利亚和人民免受出于政治动机的相关暴力活动。
translation.en: The new bill also proposes to expand the questioning power to children who are at least 14 years old, but only to those engaged or likely to engage in activities prejudicial to the protection of Australia and people from politically motivated violence.

translation.zh: 即使我们的情报机构在全世界首屈一指，赋予他们权力来强制性询问关于“有损澳大利亚与其他国家之间的经济关系”的信息或“有损澳大利亚利益”的行为都让人无法接受。
translation.en: Even if our intelligence agencies were the best in the world, conferring a power to compulsorily question anyone about information which "prejudices Australia's economic relations with another country," or activities which are "detrimental to Australia's interests" is beyond the pale.

translation.zh: 我们孤立无援。
translation.en: We stand alone.

translation.zh: 即使是在发生恐怖主义行为的情况下，其他五眼联盟国家也没有如此过界。
translation.en: No other Five Eyes country goes so far, not even for terrorism offences.

translation.zh: 真正自由的民主国家不会采用专制措施。
translation.en: Genuinely liberal democracies guard against authoritarian measures.

translation.zh: 我国安全机构的种种行为——例如窃听东帝汶议会、审讯证人 K 和 Bernard Collaery、秘密审讯和羁押前情报人员，近期对两名记者实施搜查，并且其中一名记者还因报道了澳大利亚士兵在阿富汗涉嫌谋杀而面临指控——都在提醒我们不能放松警惕。
translation.en: The conduct of our security agencies in relation to the bugging of the East Timor parliament, the trials of Witness K and Bernard Collaery, the secret trial and imprisonment of a former intelligence officer, the recent search warrants executed on two journalists, and the prospect of charges against one of them in relation to stories on suspected murders by Australian soldiers in Afghanistan show why we should not be lowering our guard.

translation.zh: 浸泡在池塘中的车里发现一位母亲和两名婴儿的尸体
translation.en: Bodies of mother, 2 infants found in car submerged in pond

translation.zh: 奥古斯塔（乔治亚州）——治安官在乔治亚州的一个池塘里打捞起一辆淹没在水中的汽车，并在车内发现一名女子和两名十个月大双胞胎的尸体。
translation.en: AUGUSTA, Ga. -- Authorities pulled a submerged vehicle from a Georgia pond and found the bodies of a woman and her twin 10-month-old children inside.

translation.zh: 根据《奥古斯塔纪事报》报道，里士满县治安官办公室称，相关同事于周五下午在奥古斯塔的市长池塘 (Mayor's Pond) 里发现了这辆汽车。
translation.en: The Richmond County Sheriff's Office said crews found the vehicle in Mayor's Pond in Augusta on Friday afternoon, The Augusta Chronicle reported.

translation.zh: 里士满县法医 Mark Bowen 表示，现场三名受害者均已死亡。
translation.en: Richmond County Coroner Mark Bowen said all three victims were pronounced dead at the scene.

translation.zh: 相关当局称，死者为 25 岁的 Shaquia Philpot 以及她的两个孩子 Caysen Williams 和 Cassius Williams。
translation.en: Authorities identified the bodies as 25-year-old Shaquia Philpot and her infant children Caysen and Cassius Williams.

translation.zh: 治安官并未透露三名死者死亡的具体原因。
translation.en: Officials did not release details about how the family ended up in the pond.

translation.zh: 法医 Bowen 说，当时一位正在钓鱼的目击者发现了这辆车。
translation.en: A witness, who was fishing in the area, found the car, Bowen said.

translation.zh: 三具遗体将送往乔治亚州调查局进行尸检。
translation.en: The bodies were going to be sent to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation for an autopsy.

translation.zh: 案件仍在调查中。
translation.en: The case remains under investigation.

translation.zh: 《波斯人》剧评：埃斯库罗斯笔下的失利
translation.en: "The Persians" Review: Aeschylus's Ancient Portrait of Defeat

translation.zh: 《波斯人》中没有太多动作戏，甚至不到一场。 人物只是绕来绕去，（相当激烈地）谈论在远方发生的（无疑是悲剧性）事件。
translation.en: There is not much action, barely even a plot, in "The Persians." People just mill about, talking (admittedly rather intensely) about events (admittedly of the tragic kind) that happened far away.

translation.zh: 然而，希腊国家大剧院却奉献了一出振聋发聩的表演。演出到达高潮时，你会感觉像是胸口挨了一拳一样无法呼吸，这种感觉就算是在线观看也没有多大分别。
translation.en: Yet this National Theater of Greece production unleashes gale-force sound and fury. At its peak, the show hits like a blow to the solar plexus, taking your breath away - the impact is only slightly dulled by watching online.

translation.zh: 埃斯库罗斯的《波斯人》是希腊现存最古老的戏剧，最早于公元前 472 年登上舞台。Dimitris Lignadis 的演出于周六从古老的 Epidaurus 圆形剧场进行现场直播，应剧院要求，不提供在线视音频。演出场地曾经是该城 asclepeion（康复中心）的一部分，因为希腊人认为在身体与心灵之间找到平衡对健康至关重要。我们都来认真思考一下这一哲理。
translation.en: First produced in 472 B.C., Aeschylus's "The Persians" is considered the oldest surviving Greek play. This Dimitris Lignadis staging was broadcast live on Saturday from the ancient amphitheater of Epidaurus; in the spirit of the theater, no recording exists online. The venue was originally conceived as part of the city's asclepeion (a healing center) because the Greeks considered the balance between body and soul essential to good health. Let's all wistfully ponder that philosophy.

translation.zh: 该剧讲述了 Salamis 大战之后的故事，这场海战发生在 2,500 年前，希腊人一举击溃了人多势众的波斯军队。当镜头拉近的时候，观众会产生明显的眩晕感，仿佛置身于现场的观众席，观看（有字幕）希腊剧场的演员演出这一流传了上千年的故事。
translation.en: The show deals with the aftermath of Salamis, a naval battle in which the outnumbered Greeks routed the mighty Persian army 2,500 years ago. At a time when our horizons are closing in, it is downright vertigo-inducing to virtually join a live audience in watching (subtitled) live actors all the way in Greece as they perform a millenniums-old play.

translation.zh: 埃斯库罗斯自己参与了 Salamis 之战，但与他的剧本有所出入：这位获胜方的老兵将自己的故事融入战败者之中，对敌人的痛苦投以相当同情的目光。
translation.en: Aeschylus himself had fought at Salamis, but his play has a twist: This veteran of the winning side set his story among the defeated, casting a fairly sympathetic eye on his recent enemies" distress.

translation.zh: 最先出场的是身穿褐色长裙和白色纽扣衬衫的波斯男子歌队。他们在都城焦急地等待国王 Xerxes 与希腊人一决胜负的结果。
translation.en: A chorus of Persian men, wearing long, tan-colored skirts and white button-down shirts, opens the proceedings. They are in their capital city anxiously waiting for news of their king, Xerxes, who is off duking it out with Athens.

translation.zh: Xerxes 的寡母 Atossa 太后（Lydia Koniordou 饰演）身着空荡荡的黑袍上场，仿佛是穿着衣服做成的外骨骼，脆弱不堪又令人望而生畏。作为希腊最伟大的舞台剧女演员之一，Koniordou 对这一角色了如指掌，她曾执导希腊国家大剧院早前制作的《波斯人》一剧并担纲主演，该剧于 2006 年在纽约城市中心上演，她推动了故事的发展，但看起来似乎根本没做什么。大多数时候她只是站在圆形舞台中央，在知悉本国军队遭受了没顶之灾后，她不费吹灰之力就表现出了积郁的愤懑和悲痛。
translation.en: Enter Xerxes's widowed mother, Queen Atossa (Lydia Koniordou), in a rather large black gown that appears to wear her, rather than the reverse; she is a human in an exoskeleton of fabric, both vulnerable and formidable. Koniordou, who is among Greece's greatest stage actresses, knows the role inside out - she directed and starred in an earlier National Theater of Greece production of "The Persians" that played New York City Center in 2006 - and she anchors the proceedings without seemingly doing much at all. For the most part, she stands in the middle of the circular stage, effortlessly projecting smoldering fury and agonizing sorrow as the scope of the disaster that befell the home troops is revealed.

translation.zh: 从前线返回的信使（Argyris Pandazaras 饰演）通过令人肝肠寸断的细节让观众切实感受到忧惧。他在一个令人难以置信的场景中讲述了这场战斗，歌队成员围着他起舞，在 Giorgos Poulios 震耳欲聋的配乐声中，他陷入癫狂。
translation.en: The apprehension everybody was feeling is confirmed, in harrowing details, by a messenger (Argyris Pandazaras) returning from the front. In an absolutely incredible scene, he recounts the battle, whipping himself into a frenzy as the chorus members dance around him and Giorgos Poulios's drone-like score swells to what must have been a deafening level.

translation.zh: 后来，从冥府召唤出来的 Atossa 死去的丈夫（Nikos Karathanos 饰演）和幸免于难的 Xerxes（Argyris Xafis 饰演）加入了他们。他长袍上的带子血迹斑驳（Eva Nathena 设计的精美服装总是能为剧情的推动助力）。在集体哀悼的一幕中，这几个角色聚在一起，哀叹逝去的生命和战争的创伤。
translation.en: Later they are joined by Atossa's dead husband (Nikos Karathanos), summoned from the underworld, and Xerxes (Argyris Xafis), who has somehow escaped alive from the wreckage. Pieces of string on his tunic mark blood (Eva Nathena's exquisite costumes always contribute to the storytelling). The characters lament the lost lives and devastation together, in an act of communal mourning.

translation.zh: 美国的古典剧院多半会采取一种更通俗易懂的表现手法。他们通常会采用相对自然的念白，让歌词不那么陌生，也更容易理解。但是，Lignadis 和他的剧团使用了慷慨激昂的唱腔，这对于现代观众而言可能有点生硬，却凸显了歌词的节奏力度。从技术层面上来说他们不是在歌唱，譬如四位主演本质上都是在咏叹，发挥出魔咒般的力量，让人有超凡脱俗之感。
translation.en: Quite a bit of the classical theater we see in the United States attempts to make it more accessible in one way or another. Often this is done with relatively naturalistic line readings, in an effort to make the text less foreign, easier to digest. But Lignadis and his troupe fully embrace declamation, which may sound a little forced to modern ears but highlights the text's rhythmic power. While technically they do not sing, for example, the four lead actors essentially deliver arias, achieving an incantatory power that feels otherworldly.

translation.zh: 可是我们永远不会忘记，这出戏的根本是极其人性化的情感。
translation.en: We never forget, though, that the play is rooted in emotions that are all too human.

translation.zh: 埃及启动参议院选举海外选民登记
translation.en: Egypt begins registering data of voters abroad for senate elections

translation.zh: 据国家选举机构（NEA）官网称，该机构于本周六启动了海外选民登记，以便他们能为 8 月 9 日至 10 日举行的参议院选举投票。
translation.en: The National Election Authority (NEA) on Saturday began registering the data of voters aboard to begin casting their votes in the senate elections to be held on August 9 and 10, according to the NEA's official website.

translation.zh: 选民必须在 7 月 25 日至 7 月 31 日之间登录 NEA 网站，登记自己的数据及其海外住所所属的使领馆。
translation.en: Voters must register their data and the diplomatic mission affiliated to their residence abroad on the NEA's website from July 25 until July 31.

translation.zh: 为预防新冠病毒传播，NEA 还发布了一段视频，向选民说明如何通过电子邮件远程投票。
translation.en: The NEA also published a video explaining the steps voters can take to cast their vote remotely via email, as part of precautions against the coronavirus pandemic.

translation.zh: NEA 表示，参议院候选人选举宣传的法定时间为 7 月 26 日至 8 月 8 日。
translation.en: The legal period of senate candidate electoral propaganda runs from July 26 until August 8, the NEA said.

translation.zh: 埃及移民和侨民事务部长 Nabila Makram 呼吁海外埃及选民参加选举，履行宪法赋予他们的权利。
translation.en: Minister of Emigration and Egyptian Expatriates Affairs Nabila Makram called on Egyptian voters abroad to participate in the election as their constitutional right.

translation.zh: 埃及议会下院于 6 月 17 日通过了一项设立参议院的法律，参议院将行使议会上院功能。
translation.en: Egypt's House of Representatives on June 17 approved a law establishing a senate, which will function as an upper house of parliament.

translation.zh: 该法律以三分之二多数票通过，有四名议员投了反对票。
translation.en: The law passed with a two-thirds majority, with the objection of four MPs.

translation.zh: 参议院将由 300 名议员组成，其中 100 人通过不公开名单选举产生，100 人通过个人选举产生，还有 100 人由总统任命。
translation.en: The Senate will consist of 300 members, 100 of whom are elected by a closed list system, 100 elected by an individual system, and 100 members appointed by the President of the Republic.

translation.zh: 参议院议员任期为首次会议之日起五年。下一届议会成员将在本届任期届满前六十天内选出。
translation.en: The term of membership in the Senate will be five years, starting from the date of its first meeting. The new assembly is to be elected during the sixty days preceding the end of its term.

translation.zh: 200 余名消防员加入朱鲁帕谷 “Karen” 山火救援
translation.en: 200-Plus Firefighters Respond To Karen Fire Burning In Jurupa Valley - CBS Los Angeles

translation.zh: 朱鲁帕谷 (CBS Los Angeles)——周六下午，朱鲁帕谷爆发了一场山火，超 200 名消防员加入到救援行动中。
translation.en: JURUPA VALLEY (CBSLA) - A wildland fire broke out on Saturday afternoon in Jurupa Valley, leading to a response of more than 200 firefighters.

translation.zh: 下午 3 点，火势仅涉及 Sierra 大道和 Karen 巷。
translation.en: The Karen Fire was reported just after 3 p.m. on Sierra Avenue and Karen Lane.

translation.zh: 截至晚 8 点，过火面积已从约 2-4 公顷扩大至约 100 公顷。
translation.en: The fire grew from approximately 5-10 acres to roughly 250 acres as of 8 p.m.

translation.zh: 截止最后一次确认，50% 的火势已得到控制，来自加州消防局、河滨县消防局、科罗纳市消防局和圣贝纳迪诺县消防局的 225 名消防员正在现场奋力扑救。
translation.en: Containment at last check was at 50% and 225 firefighters from Cal Fire, Riverside County Fire Department, City of Corona Fire Department, and San Bernardino County Fire were on scene battling the fire.

translation.zh: 目前火势已得以控制，但仍需彻夜监控。
translation.en: Forward progress on the fire has been stopped but resources are expected to remain overnight to monitor conditions.

translation.zh: 尚无人员伤亡和建筑受损的报道，当局也尚未下达强制疏散令。
translation.en: No injuries or structural damages have been reported, and no evacuations have been ordered.

translation.zh: 阿姆斯特朗和圣贝纳迪诺线之间的 Sierra 大道已暂时关闭。
translation.en: Sierra Avenue between Armstrong and the San Bernardino County Line has been closed.

translation.zh: 以色列新冠病毒感染人数超 6 万
translation.en: Israel coronavirus cases top 60,000 as infections jump

translation.zh: 耶路撒冷（路透社）——尽管政府努力控制感染率回弹，以色列新冠病毒检测为阳性的病例仍然超过了 6 万。
translation.en: JERUSALEM (Reuters) - The number of people to test positive for coronavirus in Israel topped 60,000 on Saturday as the government struggles to contain a resurgence in infection rates.

translation.zh: 据该国卫生部报告，最新的每日统计发现了 1,770 例新增感染，病例总数达到 60,496 例。
translation.en: The latest daily tally showed 1,770 new infections, bringing the total number of cases to 60,496, the country's health ministry reported.

translation.zh: 以色列人口总数为 900 万，因为新冠病毒死亡的人数共计 455 人。
translation.en: With a population of nine million, Israel has reported a total of 455 fatalities from the pandemic.

translation.zh: 作为最先实施全国性封锁的国家之一，以色列早期成功遏制了疫情的蔓延。
translation.en: Israel was one of the first countries to impose a nationwide lockdown and initially was successful in clamping down on the outbreak.

translation.zh: 日报告病例数从几百下降到了几十。
translation.en: Daily cases that numbered in the hundreds dropped to low double digits.

translation.zh: 出于恢复经济的考虑，政府放松了管制，感染率回弹，已有部分官员表示此举为时过早。
translation.en: Concerned about the economic toll, the government eased those restrictions - too quickly, some officials have since acknowledged - and infection rates resurged.

translation.zh: 经济部门再次零星关闭，导致公众不满情绪加深，引发日常示威活动。
translation.en: Renewed sporadic closures of various sectors of the economy have deepened public vexation, sparking daily demonstrations.

translation.zh: 当心那些看似美好的园艺花招
translation.en: Be wary of gardening gimmicks that look too good

translation.zh: 对植物学家而言，这可能是件难以启齿的事，但我确实十分沉迷于园艺花招。
translation.en: It might be an embarrassing thing for a plant scientist to admit, but I am a total sucker for a garden gimmick.

translation.zh: 往好的方面想，我认为自己是一个思想开放，或者说有点非理性乐观的人，而且植物界许多事物通常无法靠直觉判断。
translation.en: I like to think it's because I am open-minded or maybe just irrationally optimistic, particularly as many things in the plant world are often extremely counterintuitive.

translation.zh: 但我并不耻于承认，我已在这种园艺花招上踩坑无数。
translation.en: But I am not ashamed to say I have fallen for dozens of them over a lifetime in horticulture.

translation.zh: 虽然我坚信自己尝试新事物的价值，但如若并不热衷于开启“地狱模式”，可以避开下面我遇到过的一些最常见的“坑人”园艺花招。
translation.en: While I firmly believe in the value of trying things out for yourself, if you don't fancy learning the hard way, here are some of the most common garden gimmicks I have come across.

translation.zh: 首先，可能是最大的雷区——把番茄嫁接到土豆上。
translation.en: First up, and probably the worst offender, grafted tomato-potato plants.

translation.zh: 将番茄嫁接到土豆被誉为革命性的突破，事实上，这是一种上世纪 20 年代就有人尝试过的“老一套的玩意儿”。
translation.en: Hailed as a revolutionary breakthrough, grafting tomato plants on to potato roots is, in fact, an old-school botanical curiosity, dating back to at least the 1920s.

translation.zh: 番茄和土豆同属一科，内部“管道”大致相似，确实可以通过嫁接创造加强版奇迹。
translation.en: As they are both from the same family and have broadly similar internal "plumbing," you can indeed create such surgically enhanced marvels.

translation.zh: 但问题是，如果创造资源密集型结构，例如水果和根茎作物，则需要消耗大量能量来代谢，嫁接的植物需要同时满足两种作物的能量需求，就只能将有限的能量分流。
translation.en: But here's the problem: creating resource-intensive structures like fruits and roots takes up a lot of metabolic energy, and if plants are attempting to do both their limited energies inevitably become split.

translation.zh: 这就意味着，这些嫁接植物的产量非常低，跟你在宣传图片中看见的全然不同。
translation.en: That means the yields of these grafted plants are terrible and nothing like what you see in the marketing pictures.

translation.zh: 另外，作物成熟的时间也不同，要收割土豆就必须扼杀还没有成熟的番茄。
translation.en: Then there is the fact that the crops mature at different rates, so to harvest the spuds you have to kill the plants before the tomatoes have ripened.

translation.zh: 同时，宣传图片也隐含了很多极具迷惑性的花招。
translation.en: On the subject of marketing imagery, there's a lot of dodgy dealing here, too.

translation.zh: 我在一些目录中见过用 PS 处理成天蓝色的玫瑰花，还有一些果树结出的果实数量简直不可思议。
translation.en: I've seen roses Photoshopped sky blue and fruit trees with a physiologically impossible amount of fruit on their branches in some major catalogues.

translation.zh: 有的商家甚至从我 Instagram 上“借”走照片，在网购网站上谎称是他们的试验基地。
translation.en: I've even seen photos "borrowed" from my Instagram account and used by shopping networks as images of their trial grounds.

translation.zh: 这些少部分无良商家的操作，让你不得不以一种怀疑的眼光来审视这些宣传图片，尤其是来自网络的图片。
translation.en: Sadly the work of a small minority of cavalier companies mean you have to view advertising images, particularly online, with a very sceptical eye.

translation.zh: 如果它看起来好得不像真的，那估计确实如此。
translation.en: If it looks too good to be true, it probably is.

translation.zh: 说到蓝色玫瑰花，蓝色在植物界相对稀少，所以如果你看到新品种的绚丽帚石楠、兰花或仙人掌，在高浓度“消毒剂”下闪着蓝色光芒，那基本肯定是洒药或者染色了。
translation.en: Speaking of which, the colour blue is relatively rare in the botanical world, so if you see a dazzling new heather, orchid or cactus, shining out in the most intense "disinfectant" shade of blue, it's almost certainly been sprayed or dyed.

translation.zh: 如果供应商明确说明了情况，其实也没什么，但他们很少会这么做。
translation.en: Which would be fine, so long as vendors made this clear, but they rarely ever do.

translation.zh: 蓝色蝴蝶兰会变回原来的白色，然而仙人掌和帚石楠涂上一层抑光染料后很快就会枯萎。
translation.en: Blue moth orchids will revert back to their original white, but sprayed cacti and heathers, coated in a light-suppressing layer of dye, are unlikely to survive for long.

translation.zh: 最后，我必须曝光承诺能种出微型树的盆景套装，还有比盆景套装更糟的盆景种子。
translation.en: Finally, I have to flag up bonsai kits or, even worse, bonsai seeds, that promise miniature trees will sprout from their packets.

translation.zh: 盆景并非一种植物。
translation.en: Bonsai is not a species of plant.

translation.zh: 这是一种修剪技术，让人联想到远山上的古树。
translation.en: It's a training technique used to give the illusion of ancient trees on distant mountaintops.

translation.zh: 盆景一般是经过修剪成熟的灌木，然后再用线引导新的生长方向而形成。
translation.en: They are almost always started from mature shrubs that are hacked back and new growth wired in place.

translation.zh: 我清楚知道自己会继续迷恋这些园艺花招，这是实验的乐趣之一。
translation.en: I know I'll keep falling for gimmicks, it's part of the fun of experimentation.

translation.zh: 但避开这些问题，你可能有机会买到和卖家展示一致的实物。
translation.en: But side-step these ones and you may find one that actually has a chance of living up to its promise.

translation.zh: 西班牙隔离措施：在西班牙需要隔离吗？
translation.en: Spain quarantine: Do you need to quarantine in Spain?

translation.zh: 不用，但如果你在今晚 12 点之后从西班牙回来，你必须居家自我隔离 14 天。
translation.en: No - but if you return from Spain after midnight tonight, you will have to self isolate at home for 14 days.

translation.zh: 英国司法部长 Humza Yousaf 说：“本周早些时候我们决定不对从西班牙回来的人执行隔离措施，因为数据显示病毒传播情况有所改善。
translation.en: British Justice Secretary Humza Yousaf said: "The decision to exempt Spain earlier this week, was taken when the data showed there was an improvement in the spread of the virus.

translation.zh: 但显然，最新的数据值得我们担忧，因此不得不推翻原本的决定。
translation.en: But clearly the latest data has given us cause for concern to overturn that decision.

translation.zh: 我们知道这么做会令人失望。但是，我们一直清楚地表明，我们会密切监测各国的疫情，如果病毒在某个国家死灰复燃，我们可能会要求将其从不执行隔离措施的名单中剔除。”
translation.en: "We appreciate that this will be disappointing. However, we have always been clear we are closely monitoring the pandemic situation in all countries and that we may require to remove a country from the list of places exempt from quarantine requirements should the virus show a resurgence."

translation.zh: “病毒依然猖獗而致命。我们的首要任务是抑制病毒、防止病毒传播，并保护公众健康。”
translation.en: "It is still active and it is still deadly. Suppressing the virus, preventing it from being transmitted and protecting public health is our priority."

translation.zh: 政府目前还未公布关于英国人前往西班牙的规定，但如果你准备前往西班牙，你最好查阅一下自己所在区域的规定。
translation.en: No rules around UK travellers arriving in Spain have been announced, however if you are travelling to Spain you should check for local regulations in your area.

translation.zh: 西班牙应急卫生副主任 Maria Jose Sierra 表示：
translation.en: Spain's deputy emergency health director Maria Jose Sierra said:

translation.zh: “我们这里爆发了重大疫情。这可能是第二波疫情。我们得关注未来几周的情况。”
translation.en: "We have important outbreaks. It could be a second wave. We'll have to see what happens in the next few weeks."

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦队 Imam-Ul-Haq 热身赛受伤后仍可继续参赛
translation.en: Pakistan's Imam-Ul-Haq Declared Fit To Bat After Warm-Up Injury

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦队和英格兰队将作为对手在三场测试赛和三场 T20I 赛中相遇。
translation.en: Pakistan and England will be facing each other in three Tests and as many T20Is.

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦板球运动员 Imam-ul-Haq 在德比的一场队内热身赛中左手被击中受伤，队医宣布他已经可以参加比赛了。
translation.en: Pakistan batsman Imam-ul-Haq has been declared fit to bat by the team's doctor after he was hit on his left hand while batting in an intra-squad warm-up match at Derby.

translation.zh: 巴基斯坦板球委员会 (PCB) 在一份声明中表示：“这名习惯用左手的板球运动员在第二天的比赛开始前参加了一场热身赛。”
translation.en: "The left-handed batsman took part in warm-up session prior to the start of the second day's play," Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) informed in a statement.

translation.zh: 在比赛的第一天，PCB 白队的 Imam 和 PCB 绿队的 Naseem Shah 对击时，左手被击中。
translation.en: PCB Whites' Imam was hit on his left hand while batting against PCB Greens' Naseem Shah on day one of the match.

translation.zh: 周五晚上，Imam 的左手被 Shah 扔出的球击中后受伤，被迫退场，不过，他参加了早上的热身赛，将在第三天重回球场。
translation.en: Imam was forced to retire hurt on Friday evening after being struck on the left hand by a ball from Shah, but was able to take part in a warm-up session in the morning and will resume his innings on the third day.

translation.zh: 泰米尔纳德邦一银行逾 30 名雇员确诊新冠
translation.en: Over 30 Employees Test Coronavirus Positive At Single Bank Branch In Tamil Nadu

translation.zh: 印度泰米尔纳德邦蒂鲁吉拉伯利市政府部门及一家国有银行的官员表示，该银行位于蒂鲁吉拉伯利市的一个主要支行有至少 38 名员工的冠状病毒检测结果呈阳性。
translation.en: At least 38 employees of a national bank's main branch in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, have tested positive for coronavirus, officials from the bank and the local civic body have said.

translation.zh: 官员称，他们已经建议去过该支行的客户自愿参加病毒检测。
translation.en: According to the officials, the customers who visited the bank have also been advised to voluntarily appear for coronavirus tests.

translation.zh: 此前，该支行一名高级职员出现了其他并发症，后因罹患新冠肺炎去世。
translation.en: Earlier, a senior official of the branch who was suffering from other complications, had died of COVID-19.

translation.zh: 官员称，最近，他们对该支行进行了大规模的医学筛检，因此发现了这些阳性病例。
translation.en: The positive cases came to light after a mass medical screening camp was held at the bank recently, the officials said.

translation.zh: 支行领导表示，他们已经完成消毒，该银行或将于明天恢复营业。
translation.en: Senior bank officials said the disinfection process had been completed and the bank might resume operations from tomorrow.

translation.zh: 公司卫生官员正在联系去过该银行的客户。
translation.en: Corporation health officials are in touch with the customers who visited the bank.

translation.zh: 泰米尔纳德邦是印度确诊病例数量排在第二的邦，感染病例最多的是马哈拉施特拉邦，截至周六，泰米尔纳德邦报告的确诊病例总数已经达到 206,737 例。
translation.en: Tamil Nadu, with the highest virus cases in the country after Maharashtra, has reported an overall 2,06,737 positive cases of the virus as of Saturday.

translation.zh: 印度总理将出席建于争议地点的寺庙奠基仪式
translation.en: India's PM to attend temple groundbreaking at disputed site

translation.zh: 新德里（美联社）——据监督寺庙建设的信托机构透露，印度总理 Narendra Modi 计划于下月出席建在印度北部争议地点的印度教寺庙奠基仪式，该寺庙原址为一座建于 16 世纪的清真寺，于 1992 年被印度教狂热分子夷为平地。
translation.en: NEW DELHI (AP) - Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will attend a groundbreaking ceremony next month for a Hindu temple on a disputed site in northern India where a 16th century mosque was torn down by Hindu hard-liners in 1992, according to the trust overseeing the temple construction.

translation.zh: 仪式定于 8 月 5 日举行，组织者称这一天对印度教徒而言是大吉之日，但这一天也是印度议会撤销其唯一的穆斯林占多数的查谟和克什米尔邦半自治权一周年。
translation.en: The ceremony is set for Aug. 5, a date organizers said was astrologically auspicious for Hindus but that also marks a year since the Indian Parliament revoked the semi-autonomous status of its only Muslim-majority state, Jammu and Kashmir.

translation.zh: Modi 所在的印度教民族主义印度人民党（BJP）的支持者和反对者都不可能错过这个具有象征意义的日子，该党在其宣言中数十年如一日地承诺夺取克什米尔的自治权，并在莫卧儿时代清真寺的原址上建造一座庙宇供奉印度教神祇拉姆，庙宇选址地位于北方邦阿约提亚市，信徒们认为这里是拉姆的出生地。
translation.en: The symbolism was impossible to miss for both supporters and opponents of Modi's Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party, or BJP, whose manifesto had for decades included pledges to strip restive Kashmir's autonomy and to build a temple to the Hindu god Ram where the Mughal-era mosque once stood, a site in the city of Ayodhya in Uttar Pradesh state that devotees believe to be Ram's birthplace.

translation.zh: 新冠病毒仍在印度全境蔓延，据报道该国已成为全球感染病例数量第三的国家，有鉴于此，与印度人民党有盟友关系的印度教民族主义团体世界印度教会议（Vishwa Hindu Parishad）称，仪式将在国家电视台现场直播，会限制出席仪式的人员和观众的数量。
translation.en: Because the coronavirus is still rampaging across India, which has reported the world's third-highest caseload, the ceremony will be broadcast live on state television and the number of participants and spectators will be limited, according to Vishwa Hindu Parishad, or the World Hindu Organization, a Hindu nationalist group allied with the BJP.

translation.zh: 该组织发言人 Vinod Bansal 在周六的新闻发布会上表示，这座寺庙将成为“亘古永恒的社会和谐、民族团结与融合中心，唤醒印度教特性”。
translation.en: The temple will serve as "an enduring and immortal beaming center of social harmony, national unity and integration and awakening of the feeling of Hindutva," or Hindu way of life, the organization's spokesperson Vinod Bansal said in a news release Saturday.

translation.zh: 继印度人民党在选举中获得压倒性胜利后，涉及该地点长达一个世纪的争端于去年得到解决。
translation.en: A century-long dispute over the site was resolved last year following the BJP's landslide election victory.

translation.zh: 十一月，最高法院做出了有利于寺庙信托的裁定，称将另择他处向穆斯林请愿者划拨五英亩地。
translation.en: In November, the Supreme Court ruled in favor of the temple trust, saying that Muslim petitions would be given five acres at an alternative site.

translation.zh: 印度教狂热分子长期以来一直声称莫卧儿穆斯林侵略者在阿约提亚古城既有庙宇之上建造了一座清真寺。
translation.en: Hindus hard-liners have long contended that Mughal Muslim invaders built a mosque on top of a preexisting temple in the ancient city of Ayodya.

translation.zh: 1992 年 12 月清真寺被拆除之后发生的骚乱引发社区暴力事件，约有 2,000 人丧生，其中大多数为穆斯林。
translation.en: A December 1992 riot following the destruction of the mosque sparked communal violence in which about 2,000 people were killed, mostly Muslims.

translation.zh: 与此同时，特别法庭仍在审理清真寺拆除案件。
translation.en: Meanwhile, the trial in the demolition court case continues to be heard in a special court.

translation.zh: 来自 Modi 家乡古吉拉特邦艾哈迈达巴德的一位建筑师提议建造一个塔状砂岩结构的寺庙，高度为 161 英尺（49 米），带有五个穹顶。
translation.en: An architect from Ahmedabad, Gujarat, Modi's home state, has proposed a towering sandstone structure 161 feet (49 meters) high with five domes.

translation.zh: 印度新闻信托社（PTI）报道，北方邦首席部长兼印度教修士 Yogi Adityanath 要求阿约提亚举行特别的清洁和净化仪式，全市所有寺庙在 Modi 到访之前点燃油灯。
translation.en: Yogi Adityanath, Uttar Pradesh's chief minister and a Hindu monk, requested that Ayodhya hold a special cleaning and purification ceremony and for all of the city's temples to light oil lamps ahead of Modi's visit, the Press Trust of India news agency reported.

translation.zh: 印度新闻信托社报道称，Adityanath 表示这一仪式标志着一场“长达 500 年的纷争”宣告结束。
translation.en: Adityanath said the occasion marked the end of a "500-year struggle," PTI reported.
